choices: Tanya the Werewolf
Sabrina the Witch
Katie the Succubus
Vanessa the Vampire
More
1.content:
You lay on your bed in your room, staring at the ceiling and grumbling to yourself. Your parents had just left about fifteen minutes ago for their special anniversary date, and even though you repeatedly insisted that you were now fourteen, going on fifteen, and you were too old for a babysitter, they went and got one anyway, much to your annoyance and chagrin.

You guess the sitter was more for your little brother Dave than you. He was always doing his best to annoy you and drive your parents insane, so you can't really blame them for wanting to get out for a while. Still, you can't help but feel a tiny bit of resentment towards them for leaving you here with him while you wait for the babysitter that you didn't need in the first place.

Suddenly the doorbell rings, and you hear your little brother call out for you to answer it. You sigh, the little pest couldn't even be bothered to pause his Super Smash Bros. game for an instant to answer the door.

You reluctantly get up and go downstairs to let the sitter in. You open the door, and standing there on the welcome mat was...

Who will be your sitter for the night?


1. Tanya - A ten foot tall werewolf with thick black fur covering her body. In her human form, she is an unassuming seventeen year old dark haired girl. She's generally pretty mellow, but get in her bad side, and she'll show you just how monstrous she can really be.

2. Sabrina - A normal, sixteen year old nerd who just happens to be a witch. She can be rather nice, but make fun of her glasses, braces, or anything else about her, and she'll cast a nasty spell on you.

3. Katie - A smoking hot succubus and biker chick. Pretty much a wild card when it comes to personality.

4. Vanessa - A goth vampire girl, who will may or may not invite her boyfriend over after you go to bed. Can be rather moody, and doesn't seem to happy about spending her Friday night babysitting.
1.title: The Beginning of a Weird and Wild Night

choices: She licks her lips, “I’m hungry”
She starts laughing, having successfully scared you both
You both get up and run and Tanya gives chase
She yells at Dave and punishes him for forcing her transformation
You try to calm her down
11.content:
You opened the door and just as you were expecting, it was just an older teenager standing at the door. She had dark brown hair, wore a grey t-shirt with a varsity jacket over it and tight-fitting jeans. She absent-mindedly tapped away at her phone before looking at you, “Hey kid, what’s up. Name’s Tanya. I’ll be your babysitter.” She put her phone away and shook your hand, she had a really strong grip. You let her come in and as she entered into the living room she smiled a bit, looking down at Dave play his videogames, “Well, aren’t you a cutie!?” Dave just retorted, “Yeah, well you smell like wet dog lady.”

Tanya growled at that, clenching her fists, “What!?” Dave smirked, “You heard me. You smell like a wet dog that rolls in it’s own crap. And you’re face ain’t too pretty either.” Tanya snarled, her eyes changing, into yellow, wolf-like eyes, “You little snot!” Tanya then growled, a deep animalistic one. This made Dave squeak in fear. Thick, dark hair started growing all over her body. Dave remarked, “Ew, you should shave more.”

Her legs and body elongated, stretching her form to a towering eight feet, her legs bent and became hunched, her face elongated into a snout, her black-painted fingernails and toes stretched into claws. AAARRRROOOOOOOOO!!! Lumbering towards you two was not a late-teenage girl, but a towering werewolf, dressed in Tanya’s ripped varsity jacket and jeans. This was Tanya… your babysitter is a werewolf? In fright, you and Dave huddled together in fright, wondering what the approaching monster would do to you two.
11.title: Tanya the Werewolf

choices: Swallows him whole
Buries him outside up to his neck
Locks him in the basement
114.content:
"Now look what you've done!" The werewolf says angrily, surprising you both that it was capable of speech. "My clothes are all ripped, and it's because of you and your big mouth!" She says, glaring at your little brother. "Do you have any idea how much these cost? I think this calls for some discipline."

She grabs Dave by the throat and...
114.title: He had it coming anyway

choices: Do you mind playing fetch with me
How about I tell you all about The Monster World
Mind if I invite a few of my pack-mates over
1141.content:
The werewolf’s huge jaws part, strings of drool drip off her sharp teeth and her hot breath wafts out at Dave. Giving him no time to protest, the werewolf shoves Dave headfirst into her drooling maw, splatting his face against her nasty tongue. She closed her lips around him, shoving his entire upper body into her mouth. She starts licking Dave, enjoying his flavor, “Mmm, tasty.” You could tell your little brother was fighting like crazy in her mouth due to his kicking legs that suck out from between her lips. You weren’t sure if you should be doing anything to save him, since you were scared yourself about being put on tonight’s werewolf dinner menu.

Soon enough the werewolf tilted her head back, slurping up Dave’s legs like noodles and with a loud GLURK she swallowed him whole. A large, little-brother-sized bulge slowly slithered down her esophagus, reappearing in her rounded, extended belly. Now she looked heavily pregnant with a big, round dome of a belly that jiggled and squirmed with your protesting little brother inside of it. You could even faintly hear him yelling and calling her names from out here. Then you heard the werewolf belch in your direction, BBBBLLLOOOORRRRPPPPP. She sprayed you with werewolf saliva, “Ew, yuck!” The werewolf slapped her gut a few times, “Ah, hit the spot. Nothing like a brat for dinner.”

You shiver in fright as you look up at the looming werewolf. She gives her gut a few slaps and belches on you again. You wave her stinky breath away from you, “Tanya? Is that you?” The werewolf was to wrapped up in her meal to take notice of you. Her dinner-plate-sized eyes widened as she looked down at you and grinned, “Yeah, it’s me. Sorry if I scared you, but your little brother had to be punished.” You were still a bit frightened, “Y-you’re not gonna hurt him, are you?” Tanya chuckled, “Nah, he’s just in time out for now, I’ll barf him up before the night is over.” Then a sly grin form on Tanya’s muzzle, “I’m not gonna have to have you as seconds, am I?” You shook your head, “N-no! I’ll behave.” Tanya smiled, putting her paws on her hips, “Good! Now that you know I’m a werewolf…”
1141.title: Swallows him whole

choices: Throw the ball and I'll fetch it
Fetch the ball when I throw it
11411.content: Do you mind playing fetch with me outside? She asked. You just nod your head yes. She smiled and said that good because I want you to.....
11411.title: Do you mind playing fetch with me

choices: "No one will believe him anyway."
"Dessert time."
114111.content:
You and Tanya went out into the backyard. The werewolf stepped out the door and stretched enormously. She was hunched over in the house but now fully straightened. The 10-foot-tall creature towered over you. You could barely comprehend how powerful she was.
"So, are we playing?" She asked, meanwhile she playfully wagged her tail. So she looked more like a dog than a wolf.
You picked up one of your brother's balls and threw it away. Tanya immediately threw herself after it and caught it in the air with her teeth. Then she took it back and dropped the salivating ball into your hand.
"Harder." She instructed you.
You did it again with more force. Tanya caught it again and returned it.
"Stronger. What kind of man are you?" She teased you.
That's how you threw the ball for hours. By the end, you throw it so that it managed to fall to the ground. Tanya caught the wildly bouncing ball and brought it back to you.
"This last throw was quite tolerable." Tanya patted your shoulder. When..
"Ahhhhhhhhhhhhhh." There was a loud scream from the fence.
It was the kid next door. One of your brother's friends. He must have wanted to come over to play with your brother. He climbed up the fence to climb over, but then he saw the werewolf.
"Monster!!" He shouted and fell off the fence.
You heard his footsteps running towards his house behind the fence.
You look up at Tanya's face who says:
114111.title: Throw the ball and I'll fetch it

choices: You refuse, they keep teasing you
Your curiosity wins out, you kiss Anna
Tanya intervenes
11413.content:
"Mind if I invite a few of my pack-mates over?"

"Are they gonna e-eat me?" You ask, a shiver in your voice. You were still amazed that your babysitter not only turned out to be a werewolf, but she gobbled your little brother up whole. You could still see the occasionally lump push out from her belly as Dave was struggling to escape. Tanya seemed indifferent to his attempts to get out, keeping him down with ease. She looked at you with what was supposed to be a comforting smile. Unfortunately her big teeth make it look more creepy than comforting. Upon seeing you cringe away from her smile she laughs, putting a reassuring hand on your shoulder.

"Nah, I don't think you've got much to worry about. Little monster secret for ya, but the reason we only go after bad kids is the good ones taste horrible. Like trying to swallow the world's biggest hairball horrible. So unless you get all bratty like your little brother..." She pats her belly proudly.

You're still not certain about having a whole pack of werewolves in your house. Just one of them was already enough to deal with your brother. At the same time you couldn't help but feel incredibly curious. You had so many questions, not the least of which where the hell she came from. If werewolves are real, you'd have expected to hear more about them. Tanya looked down at you expectantly, trying her best version of puppy eyes.

"Okay, fine. But no shedding on the couch." You add with a smile. She laughs loudly, slapping you on the shoulder. Unfortunately she forgot her immense feral strength for a moment and knocked you over with her enthusiasm. One apology and a phonecall later the doorbell rang. Tanya excitedly bounces through the living room to let in her friends. On the doorstep stood what looked like several teenagers. Your babysitter explained that you and especially Dave already knew they were werewolves. Giggles and sighs of relief all around as the girls transformed into their true forms. They all came into your house and shook your hand. Unsettling toothy smiles seemed to be their calling card as each of them sent a small shiver down your spine. Why did you think this was a good idea again?

They all settled down in the living room. You were sat on the couch with Tanya next to you and another werewolf on your other side. She had a beautiful coat of silver-grey fur. You listened to their small talk and gossip. It was amazing how little difference there was between the monster world and the human world. Though it was all draped with a distinct monstrous tinge, the subjects were remarkably similar. Talk of clothes, boys and that one bitch that wasn't invited were common. Soon their attention turned to you.

"So? What's it like knowing werewolves are real?" The silvery wolf asked, hungrily looking at you.

"It's amazing!" You blurt out. You weren't sure what to say, but in a room full of werewolves it was probably best to stay on their good side. Especially with Dave already showing what happens to those that get on their bad side. "Eating my little brother aside, you guys are awesome." Tanya burped almost on command, making the others double over laughing. The silvery werewolf composed herself again and continued asking questions.

"Ever kissed a werewolf before?" You had no answer for her, turning bright red. The others hollered and howled, with Tanya rolling her eyes. "Anna! Leave him alone."

"What? I'm sure a handsome boy like him has kissed lots of girls already. I'm just asking if any of them were werewolves." She said, barely stifling a giggle. You weren't sure if you could physically be more embarrassed right now. Anna threw a reassuring arm around you, pushing you into her furry side. Before you could stammer out an answer she already leaned in and spoke softly. "You wanna try it?"

The werewolves all howled with delight, egging the two of you on to do it.
11413.title: Fun for the whole pack

choices: Another one of the pack members joins Anna in teasing you
You hear a rumbling come from Anna’s gut
114131.content:
You felt a little bit uneasy with this teenage werewolf girl coming so on to you, so strongly. You felt her heavy paw gently rub your thigh and she leaned her muzzle in close to you, you could feel her warm, meaty breath brush past you. It felt really weird to you, first knowing that monsters exist, and secondly having someone of a completely different species come on to you. You nervously chuckle, “U-um, that’s all right. I-I, um… I’m sorry. I’m kind of only into human girls.” All of the werewolves gasped in a very overexaggerated, and comedic way. Anna leaned in even more, moving her paw up to your chest, her muzzle nearly touching your lips, “So you’re saying you’re vanilla?”

Tanya rolled her eyes, and started tuning out of the conversation you and Anna were having. Your babysitter jokingly replied, “Don’t chew on him too hard Anna.” The pack of monster girls giggled as they started up their own separate conversation, giving you and Anna some alone time. You were just glad that you hadn’t done anything to piss them off yet. Anna pulled you in close and ran her large tongue across your cheek, “So, help me understand… what’s so wrong with us werewolves. We’re stronger than humans, so I’d be great at protecting you. I’m nice and furry for when you humans get cold. I’m a great kisser… I would think you’d be head-over-heels for someone like me?” Unbeknownst to you, Anna already had a boyfriend, but she just loved toying with shy boys like you.
114131.title: You refuse, they keep teasing you

choices: They want to play a game of Spin-The-Bottle with you
You ask them more questions about monsterkind
114132.content: You had kissed girls before… but never a werewolf. Anna had already gotten really up in your business and pressed you up against her big, muscular, furry body. You actually kind of liked how big and strong she felt around you. Anna raised a furry brow and smirked, showing you her huge teeth, “So… you gonna give momma a kiss or what lover-boy?” You lean towards her and pucker your lips and Anna follows suit. Soon enough you two kiss. The entire room lights up with giggles and cooing and sly remarks. The kiss actually felt really nice. Anna’s lips were much larger than yours and the huge werewolf seemed to guide you through it. Eventually you both broke the kiss and looked into each other’s eyes. Anna giggled, “So, the tasty little human has a thing for monstergirls… good to know.” You nervously blush as the entire pack of werewolf girls grin at you. What happens next?
114132.title: Your curiosity wins out, you kiss Anna

choices: Ana wants another kiss
Tanya beckons you to her
A different werewolf wants you
1141322.content:
"So, handsome, what did you think of that?" Ana asked with a sultry smile. You weren't sure what was the safest answer. For now placating the beast seemed the best choice.

"That was... unexpected." You say, a dopey grin on your face. "Not just the kiss... but all of this. I mean, werewolves are real. How is that even possible? Wouldn't humanity be at least a little aware? Especially since you can apparently order one online to be a babysitter? Does this also mean other monsters are real?"

Your barrage of questions was interrupted by Ana. She put a clawed finger on your lips and smiled. "Slow down there buster. You want answers? That's gonna cost you." She looked around the room with a toothy smile. "What do you think, girls? One smooch for one question?" All the werewolves burst into giggles. Even Tanya couldn't suppress a smirk. Ana looked back at you and continued. "To answer one of your questions... yes, they're all real. Werewolves, ogres, yeti's, krakens, gnolls and so much more. We all live in the Monster World, a different side of reality where we can be ourselves. Some of us like to blend in to keep an eye on the humans, but for the most part we stay in our own world, only interacting with children."

You look down at Tanya's wiggling belly. Some interaction that is. Ana lets you think about her answer for a moment before speaking again. "Now, who wants a kiss from this handsome boy next?" The others giggled before one of them beckoned you over with a single clawed finger. She looked more muscular than the others, but her goofy smile greatly diminished her intimidating figure. When you got close enough she grabbed your arm and pulled you into a soft hug. Ana might've been joking around when she said werewolves can give soft, fuzzy hugs, but she was right on the money.

"Hey there cutie, my name's Alicia. You ready?" She puckered her lips and you quickly lean in and give her what she wants. The others cooed and hollered as your lips met, Alicia taking hold of your head to keep you locked in this passionate kiss. Truth is, she didn't need to push anything. After Ana the weirdness of kissing a werewolf had faded and you happily shared this moment with the muscular beast. When your lips parted she excitedly put a big lick across your face, making the others giggle as you wipe away the trail of drool.

"Mmmm, you earned that one. Ask away."

"Well... uhm.... how do I say this... is it normal for a werewolf babysitter to eat the kids she should be looking after?" All the werewolves burst out in laughter, Tanya loudest of all. Once she'd wiped the tears from her eyes she patted her belly. "Don't worry about little Dave here. If we actually ate all the bad kids I'm fairly sure you'd hear about it on the news." You look at her incredulously. "Okay, let me explain. Monsters eat kids all the time, they're a delicacy among all of monsterkind. But we can't go around digesting people. We'd run out of children in weeks." You gulp. Math wasn't your strong suit in school, but unless Tanya was greatly exaggerating that meant monsters didn't just exist, there were many millions of them. "So instead of that, we bring them into a nightmare, seamlessly pulling them from reality. It's hard to explain, but long story short, Dave will wake up in the morning having had the most horrible dream where a big evil werewolf ate him. That's also why you hear so little about us. Is any of this real? Or are you dreaming too?"

"Spoiler alert, it's real." Alicia giggled, pinching your arm.

What they said made sense. You've definitely had nightmares about monsters chasing you before, but you always just thought those were bad dreams. Were all those horrible things real? And had they visited you at night? You look around the circle of giggling werewolf girls. Who was next to demand a smooch in return for some answers?
1141322.title: They tell you more about monsters... for a price

choices: Hide and Seek, werewolf style
Leave the house and cause trouble in the neighborhood
Find something to eat for the other werewolves
11413221.content:
"Over here, little guy. Don't you dare think you're getting away from me with just one itty bitty kiss." Anna pointed her clawed finger down before her. You were needed and Alicia reluctantly let you slide off her lap. Tanya just nodded, graciously passing her spot in the queue over to her friend. You were barely within arm's reach of the white-furred werewolf when she grabbed you by the hand and pulled you close. Not content with the human merely in her arms she span around, all but throwing you into the couch and looming over you. You gulp, looking up at the hungry eyes of your babysitter's friend. Drool began to leak from her toothy smile, but she wasn't interested in chowing down on you, was she?

The answer came shortly afterwards as she aligned her drooling maw with your face and plunged down. You feared she was going to bite, but you were overwhelmed by her passion. She seemed committed to breathe for the both of you, covering your nose and mouth with her muzzle and letting her tongue dance about freely in your mouth. You try to struggle against it, but hidden under Anna it's hard to see. The only thing you hear is loud slurping as your head is slowly encased in slobber and giggling in the background.

"Slow down, Anna, you're gonna scare him."

"Oh puh-lease. He watched Tanya scarf down his little brother and barely blinked. He's fine, aren't you?" Anna replied with a playful smirk. You only offered a weary groan, too shellshocked by what she'd just unleashed on your poor face.

She slowly rolls back around, holding you tightly against her chest and revealing your drool-soaked face to the others. "Oh my god, you're such an animal." Tanya joked. Anna didn't seem the slightest bit upset, instead appearing almost proud of herself. She looked down at you and smiled.

"Well, you've definitely earned your next question. Ask away."

You shake off what just happened as best you could and try to think of another good question to ask the group of werewolves currently lounging about in the living room. Of all the strange and unusual things that had happened tonight, there were two questions burning most in your brain. First, the easy one.

"Why an internet babysitting service?"

Tanya smirks and pats her belly. "Well, meeting new kids to eat is always a nice prospect. That aside we make sure we've got a decent enough disguise ready. Though you wouldn't believe how many parents let us walk right in even if there's a patch of fur or bloodshot feral eyes still visible. Whatever it takes to get them a few hours of time to themselves, right?" You gulp. Was your house really just a buffet at this point? How long until you'd be sitting inside one of their bellies. They said you wouldn't taste good because you weren't a brat like Dave, but how much of that was true?

"That was too easy. I think this boy is just fishing for kisses now. C'mon, ask us something difficult." Anna growled. What luck, you didn't have to lock lips and taste werewolf breath again. You turn to look her straight in the eye.

"Werewolves come from a curse. Do you need to be bitten or are there... other ways?" The white-furred wolf flew into a fit of laughter, her whole body shaking so much you nearly fell off her lap.

"Don't you worry your little head, human. I can't pass along this gift with just a kiss."

Tanya butted in with a huge smirk. "Yeah, there wouldn't be a human male left on the planet that hadn't been turned by now." The two exchanged icy glares before Anna continued. "It takes a bit of effort, so don't you be nervous now. We can kiss all night and you won't grow an extra hair." You looked at her with a tinge of disapointment. Being a werewolf sounded cool.

"Alright girls, I think that's enough questions and answers for now. How about we do something else?" Tanya suggested. The others nodded, all looking at you. What's next on the agenda?
11413221.title: Ana wants another kiss

choices: The werewolves want to prank the pizza guy
After a feast of pizza, they're still hungry
After a feast of pizza, they're feeling playful
114132213.content:
"So... I don't mean to scare you." Anna said with a cruel smirk. "But we're all getting kinda hungry. Well, except for Tanya of course. You got any more bratty little brothers?"

Almost on command the big belly you were laid upon growled, Alicia and the other werewolves responded in kind. The loud gurgling put a chill down your spine. If you didn't do something fast you were going to be next on the menu, no matter how poor your taste might be. You slide yourself from Anna's embrace and onto your feet. The kitchen didn't have nearly enough for all these hungry ladies. There were some things in the freezer, but that would take too long to thaw out. They'll have reduced you to dinner long before that was ready. Suddenly you had an idea.

"You girls like pizza?" Immediately all eyes were on you. "What am I saying. everyone likes pizza. I'll order some delivery." The room lit up with cheers and howls of delight. Sounds like you just found a way to get on their good side. You breathe a sigh of relief, well aware that their bad side was likely the inside of their bellies. You grab your phone and take orders.

"So, healthy werewolves probably need more than a pizza each, let's make it two a piece." All nodded, Alicia even putting on her puppy eyes for a third. You roll your eyes and agree. This opened the floodgates as a room full of feral glares turned into a puppy pen. You let out a big sigh. "Fine, three pizzas for everyone. And not a dime left in my piggy bank after this."

Tanya quickly chimes in "Oh, don't worry about that, I'll pay for them. I can't go and invite my friends in and then expect you to go bankrupt for them." You smile at your babysitter. "Thanks Tanya. Next question, what kind of pizza does everyone want?" They all shot you a blank, incredulous stare. "Take a guess..." Alicia said mockingly.

"Alright, pineapple pizzas for everyone." You joke.

"Do that and we'll have to add a bit of extra flavor and put you on our pizza." Tanya said with a laugh.

You smile and call the pizza place. Thankfully there was one almost in your neighborhood, so you wouldn't have to wait too long with five hungry werewolves in one room. Someone picks up and introduces themselves with a thick accent. "Welcome to Ray's Place, what's yer freaken order?"

"One pepperoni pizza..." The voice repeats your order and waits for more.

"...and fifteen meatlover's pizzas." The voice on the other end falls silent before responding.

"I heard that right? fifteen meatlover's? Kid, what kinda freakin party you throwin? Don't need to know, just hang tight. Yer pizza's gonna be there in about twenty minutes. Try to make sure yer guests don't friggin eat ya in the meantime." You could hear laughter on the other end of the line, but he had no idea how close to the truth he was. You hung up and gave your guests the good news.

"Twenty minutes?" Anna mopes with a drawn out voice. "That's like forever away. I'm hungry now."

"C'mon Anna, it's not so bad." Tanya chimed in. "Besides, we've got good company to kill that time with." You decided to ease their mood and get them a round of drinks. Twenty minutes fly past and soon enough you hear a car parking in front of the house.
114132213.title: Find something to eat for the other werewolves

choices: Hide under your bed
Hide in the kitchen pantry
Hide in your closet
1141322133.content:
The werewolves all voted for you to deal with the pizza guy, given that their unusual appearance might scare him and they were all too lazy to shift back into their human forms. Tanya gave you some money and when the doorbell rang you opened up to a stack of pizzas. You quickly handed the delivery guy his money and a small tip for not keeping you waiting. It didn't take a psychic to know what would happen to you if the pizzas would be late. The room burst into toothy smiles as you walked in with the heavy tower. The greasy smell quickly got everyone salivating and you hand all the werewolves their three pizzas. You opened up your own dinner and looked around to see your guests enjoying their meals.

Clearly table manners weren't much of a thing in the monster world, because the feral vigor with which these girls attacked their dinner was unsettling. They tore through their meal by the time you'd only gotten halfway through yours. Even handing them three pizzas each didn't seem enough for their appetites. Soon you had to contend with a row of puppy eyes staring intermittently at you and the few slices of pizza you had left. You held strong for a while, but when there were still two pieces left you promised they could have them if they didn't tear down the room determining who were the lucky ones. Tanya was first to opt out, feeling she'd already gotten some extra by eating Dave. Seeing the stalemate forming and tensions rising you sighed with pity. You walked into the kitchen and cut the remaining slices in half.

"There, now there's enough for all four of you." The werewolves didn't mind their smaller portions and quickly chewed through them. With all of their bellies full they sat back, patting their gut. Alicia was the first to let out a growling burp, soon followed by the others.

"That was tasty, little man. But now I think it's time we have some fun." Ana suggested. You gulp a little at the sultry tone of her voice.

"Oooh, I got it." Tanya interjected. "How about some hide and seek, werewolf style."

"W... Werewolf style?" You repeated anxiously.

"Yeah, you hide and five evil werewolves are looking for you. And if we find you, then... well... you know." She licked her chops staring at you. Her menacing glare was interrupted by another belch. "Actually, let's skip the eating you part and just sit on you."

"Hah, good one. Because you're the babysitter." Alicia chimed in with a snicker.

"Ooh, how's this. The faster we find him, the more of us get to sit on him at once." Ana added.

"That's a great idea. For every minute you stay hidden, there'll be one less of us sitting on you when we find you. If you can last the full five minutes, you win. But you better watch out, we werewolves are really good at finding scared little boys." Tanya said with a broad smirk on her face. You weren't getting any choice in the matter as she closed her eyes and began to count down from thirty. The others also closed their eyes. Great, now you didn't just have to hide from Tanya, but from an entire pack of werewolves. With precious little time you had to think fast. What would be a good hiding place from them?
1141322133.title: After a feast of pizza, they're feeling playful

choices: The werewolves swarm into your room and find you with ease
Something grabs your waist and pulls you deeper under the bed
11413221331.content:
Your head was racing at a million miles an hour. Where do you hide? 20! The werewolves counted down. Maybe the pantry? 18! No… no… NO! 15! That’s it, you don’t know how effective it’ll be but the first hiding place that popped into your head was your bed. You carefully tip-toe your way up the staircase. 9! You’re sweating bullets at this point. You silently shut your bedroom door and crawl underneath your bed. You could hear a muffled, “Ready or not, here we come”, from downstairs. You gulp as you hope the werewolves don’t find you. Being stuck under a bunch of chubby werewolf butts was not how you wanted to spend your night.

Then a thought came to mind. This was the most clichéd choice you could’ve picked! They’re definitely going to find you. Whenever a kid hides somewhere from a monster it’s always under the covers or under the bed. How stupid could you be. As you scold yourself, you remember something even worse… didn’t Tanya mention there were monsters under the bed? That couldn’t be right? At least… not anymore. You remember getting chased and almost getting gobbled by some monsters when you were younger, but you thought those were night-terrors… b-but… there’s no way there were any monsters living under your bed any more… right?
11413221331.title: Hide under your bed

choices: Four werewolves get comfortable sitting on you
You try to talk your way out of your punishment
One of the werewolves suggests an alternate punishment
114132213311.content:
From your little hideaway you hear footsteps coming up the stairs. Evidently your tip-toeing wasn't anywhere near quiet enough for those sensitive ears of them. You could only hope your choice of hiding place would prevail longer. The prospect of just one of them sitting on you was bad enough. You hear a door open at the end of the hall. Thankfully these beasts didn't know which room is which yet. Muffled chatter came from the other side of your bedroom door. With a villainous laugh they flung open the next door, only to burst into laughing when they realized it was the bathroom. They laughed even harder when they opened up the upstairs toilet. But now they were out of doors. Only your bedroom remained. With a creeping slowness you watched the handle go down.

You watched in horror as the werewolves were opening your door. Had it even been a minute already? The moment the door handle was down the door flung open, bright light from the hall flooding in. The sudden loud slam of the door hitting the wall almost made you yelp, but you kept quiet and shuffled back a little. More disturbing was the cavalcade of giggles and the distinct sniffing sound.

"Yep, this is the place." Tanya cheerfully announced. "This has got to be his bedroom."

"I dunno, the toilet looked like a solid option too..."

"Shove it, Anna. Now, where could the little guy be..."

From under your bed you watched them fan out and explore your room. Slender legs and footpaws came down all around you as they gave a running commentary on your room. You didn't dare to even breathe for fear of giving away your position. With a loud rustle Tanya confirmed you weren't in your bed.

"Heh, that would've been a bit too easy I guess. Hey Alicia, see if there's any monsters in his closet." The others all burst into giggles as Alicia opened up your closet and took a step inside. "Yup, there's a big scary werewolf in here." The laughs continued, but they were rapidly running out of places to look.

"Welp, looks like he's not in here." Tanya announced. The others looked at her and saw her winking, but from your low, hidden vantage point you couldn't see anything above their waists. You couldn't believe your luck. Did these monsters really not bother to look under the bed? It almost seemed too good to be true. Your attention was so focused on your babysitter you didn't even see the pair of legs on the other side of your bed kneeling down. Suddenly a whisper from behind you caught you off guard.

"Hey, who're we hiding from?" An unknown voice asked. You absent-mindedly respond. "These werewolves, dumbass." Only after your reply did things click and with a horrified glare you look behind you.

Anna hadn't just kneeled down to take a look. She'd already seen you and crawled under the bed too, laying right next to you. With a cutesy little "hello" she lunged towards you, wrapping you in a hug. You scream in horror from the sudden assault, fighting in vain to free yourself from the werewolf. All things considered it was probably a good thing she held you so tightly, since you would've almost certainly banged your head against the underside of your bed in your panicked attempts to flee.

"Gotcha!" She shouted triumphantly as the others all peeked under the bed to see her wrestling the human into submission. After mere seconds of futile battle against the much stronger werewolf you give up. She slides out from under the bed, still tightly holding you against her. With little fanfare she stands up, throwing you over her shoulder. "You're coming with us, little man. You've got work to do." Tanya announced with a smug grin on her face. She knew her finely honed senses would lead her straight to you. It was never even a contest. You were taken back to the living room and dropped on the couch.

"Well, you managed to stay hidden for a whole minute because Sherlock here thought you were living in a toilet. Still, that brings the total to... four butts in desperate need of a human to sit on. Buckle up, buddy."
114132213311.title: The werewolves swarm into your room

Shortly after, all 4 werewolves turned their bottoms towards you on the couch and giggled. Though, you attempted to get up and try to escape your smothering demise, Anna reacted quickly and slammed her butt down hard onto your chest keeping you pinned down on the couch and giggled playfully. You tried squirming and kicking to get her off, but the weight was far too superior compared to your weak human strength, "Hehehe, you're a cute little thing aren't you?" Anna tauntingly says with a playful bounce on your chest.

The others proceeded to sit down on your lower half of your body, completely pinning you down for good and leaving only your head visible, with Tanya looming right above and looking back with a devilish smirk. "Ooooh, I get the best seat hahaha." Tanya said with a playful tone and began taunting you by shaking her hips, leaving you looking up with a fearful expression.

"Please no. Let's play a different game now please!" you pleaded, but Tanya narrowed her eyes with a toothy smirk and proceeded to sit down upon your face, completely smothering you. "Mmmmgh!" was all that could be heard from underneath Tanya's butt and the girls began to laugh at your muffled cries. "What? Sorry I can't hear you." Tanya says and starts bouncing on your face while the other girls laugh at your humiliation. "How does it smell brat ?" Tanya laughs and taunts, "Hey Tanya, that's one good way to put him to sleep." Anna giggles, "Yeah, but he's doomed if you like let one go or something hahaha." one of the other girls stated. Tanya replies, "Yeah I might put him to sleep, I never thought of doing it this way, like with me literally sitting on his face."
1141322133111.title: Four werewolves get comfortable sitting on you

11413221333.content:
The last thing you wanted out of tonight was to get pulverized under a bunch of smelly, fat werewolf butts. You had to think of a place to hide. Maybe you should just flee your home all together… but that could piss off Tanya. Maybe the basement? No, you’d be trapped and have very bad vision in the darkness. How about the attic? Too creepy, and if monsters actually do live under your bed… one might live up there too. Your closet! It’ll be a good barrier to block them from coming in, you can use your pile of old clothes to mask your scent, and it might even be too small for a werewolf to even get into. That’s it then!

You run up your stairs as quietly as possible, get in your room, lock the door, and run into your closet, hiding yourself in the hung clothing and pressing yourself against the back wall. You only had to AVOID the pack of werewolves for five minutes, you didn’t have to completely evade capture. As long as your bedroom door keeps them at bay you’ll be fine. Then a thought crossed your mind. Tanya and the other werewolves said monsters live under kids beds… does that mean they live in closets too? A cold chill runs down your spine as you stare at your watch. Two minutes in, you’ve got this! Then, your heart freezes when…

Tanya slammed her paw on Anna’s muzzle, giving her an annoyed glare, “Alright Sir-Flirts-A-Lot, game over. You’re making him nervous.” Anna groaned, crossing her arms, “Oh, you’re no fun. He would’ve liked it.” Tanya growled, rolling her eyes. One of the other pack members, a timbre wolf-looking werewolf giggled and spoke up, “Well, now that that’s over with, how should we spend this wondrous night babysitting?” They decide to…

1142.content:
The werewolf hoists Dave up to her huge drooling maw and snarls at him, covering him in werewolf drool. Dave whined, “Gross, you need a tic-tac.” In her rage the werewolf stormed through your house, holding your little brother by the neck as she ran out of your backdoor into the backyard. You followed the huge, hulking beast as she drops Dave to the ground and places her huge clawed foot on his chest, holding him down as she started digging a hole.

Being a canine, it was fairly easy for the werewolf to make a decent sized hole. She then grabbed Dave and dropped the protesting boy in. Then, like the big dog she was, the werewolf used her hind legs to start kicking mounds of dirt back onto Dave until he was buried up to his neck. It was like being buried in sand at the beach, but a lot thicker. Dave tried to move but it wouldn’t work, he was trapped, “Hey, let me out of here, you oversized mutt.”

The werewolf snarled, “The name’s Tanya, you little snot. Are you hard of hearing or do you just have a two second attention span like most kids do nowadays?” Dave’s eyes widened, “You’re Tanya? Geez, and I thought you were ugly before!” The werewolf snapped her jaws at him, angrily, “Maybe I should’ve eaten you instead.” You meekly step out into the backyard, “Tanya?” The werewolf spins around and turns her threatening scowl into a smile, “Uh, hey kid. Sorry, about my little fit of anger. Just had to teach your little brother a lesson.”

You nod in agreement as you approach her. Dave continues to struggle against the dirt but it’s no use, “W-what are you gonna do now?” Tanya chuckled, “Leave you here. It’s time out, remember?” Dave struggled some more, “You can’t just leave me here!?” Tanya giggled and knelt down so her big muzzle was closer to Dave’s face, “Watch me little guy.” Tanya stands back up and turns towards you…
1142.title: Buries him outside up to his neck

choices: Something you find delectable!
Another thing you just find gross...
11421.content:
She sighed, leaning against a nearby tree and cupping her forehead with a hand as if this whole thing was giving her a headache. You were still in awe at her size. She was so big, she’d even dwarf the tallest of basketball players! She must be around twice your height! “Ugh! Just a couple minutes in and this whole babysitting gig is a disaster. James was right. I’m terrible at keeping secrets,” she sighs, pulling out a lighter and a packet of cigarettes from her jacket. “You mind if I have a smoke?” You shake your head, and she just smokes for a while in silence, relaxing while you stare at her unusual form.

Eventually, her breathtaking, glowing golden eyes glance open at you, a frown forming on her face as she stretched out her arms. “Well, now you know, kid. All those monsters you hear about in folklore, read in fairy tales or see in horror movies… they’re all real.” You shuddered at the possibility of running into one of your most feared horror movie monsters. This was all so much to take in! Your whole view of the world was being changed! “Now, that’s probably a scary thought for ya. But don’t worry! We’re a peaceful bunch. Honestly, have you been watching the news recently? Humans are WAY more dangerous than monsters could ever be.”

You remained silent, trying to take this all in. With a sigh, she crossed her arms, glancing at the ground. “Now, I can trust you not to go trying to tell other people about us monsters, right?” She pauses for a bit, thinking this through some more. “Well, I mean, hell, you can tell whoever you want, actually. It’s not like they’d believe you. But if I catch you trying to get photographic evidence or something, oh ho ho ho, believe me, I will be ANGRY.”

You immediately shake your head. “I-I wouldn’t do that!” You insist, genuinely. “I swear! I’m not gonna tell ANYBODY about monsters!” Whatever glory you’d gain by exposing the existence of monsters DEFINITELY isn’t worth angering literally everything that goes bump in the night. “To be honest, my brother might, though.”

She laughs, turning and looking at the boy who’s still wriggling in the dirt, loudly complaining. “Yeah. He doesn’t seem to be capable of keeping his mouth shut, huh?” She said, giggling as she kicked some more dirt into his face with a hindpaw, just to shut him up for a moment as he coughed and sputtered, trying to spit the dirt out.

“You can say that again,” you laugh, starting to feel a little more comfortable around the massive monster girl.

“Well, whatever. Like I said, it’s not like anyone will believe that brat!” She chuckled, taking one last draw on her cigarette before stubbing it out. “We should head back inside. I don’t want anyone seeing me out here.” Glancing around, you realize that the werewolf is, indeed, so humongous that she could clearly be seen from all your neighbor’s backyards! Luckily, nobody seemed to be out today, so the two of you were able to skulk back into the house unnoticed, completely ignoring Dave’s loud protests. You’re a little worried from him, but at the same time, you’re happy to see him finally getting his comeuppance.

“Now, what’s there to do around here?” She stretched out as she walked into the house, returning to her regular, chilled-out self now that Dave wasn’t constantly bothering her. She perked up when she noticed the Switch hooked up to the TV in the living room. “Aw, sweet! I’ve been wanting to get one of these babies… but money’s been tight, y’know?” For a moment, you were a little surprised that a werewolf would play video games… but then you remembered that, at her heart, she was just a normal teenage girl, just with an… unusual power.

She sorted through the games you had, and before you knew it, the two of you had the entire afternoon planned out. The two of you were gonna chill, watch movies, play video games, and order some ‘monster food’. You don’t know what monster food entailed, but Tanya seemed to be enthusiastic about it, so you try to keep your hopes up. Eventually, while you were right in the middle of a Mario Kart match, you jump, startled, at the sound of talons on your roof as what sounds like an immense bird lands on your house! “Oh! That must be the delivery girl!” Tanya smiled. You could hear the talons tear from off your roof as the giant avian jumped into the front lawn, and Tanya rushed out to greet her.

You glance out the front door curiously, only to be awed at the sight of an absolutely massive bird woman handing Tanya some grub, before practically blowing you off your feet with a flap of her massive wings as she takes off! You sit back on the couch as Tanya excitedly walks over, carrying the strange-looking basket of food under her arm. “Ohh! Trust me when I say monster cuisine is gonna blow your mind!” She smiled, her tail wagging excitedly as she sits down next to you. ”First off, these are my absolute favorite… gummy boys!” You tilt your head curiously as she produces a little container, pulling the lid open to reveal what seem to be gummy bears inside. Wait… these gummy bears look exactly like tiny people. And they’re moving!

Your eyes widened in awe as you realized that the ‘food’ Tankya had presented was alive! Or, at least, it looked that way. The various ‘gummy boys’ in the container gazed up at the two of you, curious expressions on their faces… before you gasp when Tanya picks one up by his shirt collar, and plops him into her mouth! Before you can react, she gulps him down, and the bulge moves down her throat! “You just… ate him!” You shudder, horrified!

“Oh, don’t worry! They’re not actually alive,” she laughs, waving it off. “They’re just magically enchanted to make it look like they are. They’re basically like… robots. Tasty, magical robots. Wanna try one?” She offers you one of the ‘gummy boys’, but you just gag at the thought, declining her offer. Sentient or not, they look too human-like for comfort! In response, she just giggles and shrugs. “Heh! More for me, then!” With that, she happily wolfs down the rest of the ‘gummy boys’, bulge after bulge travelling down her throat as she swallows two or three of them at a time.

For some reason, you’re a little fascinated by the sight… but before you know it, they’ve all disappeared into her belly. She caps off her satisfying meal by unleashing a thunderous belch right into your face, before giggling and blushing a bit when she saw you gag. “Sorry!” She chuckled, before reaching back into the basket. “Okay, so I get you don’t like the gummy boys, cause they do look sorta like you. But this next thing, I guarantee you’ll like!” With that, she pulls out...

The huge werewolf lumbers her way towards your basement door. The menacing beast lowly growled and bared her teeth at Dave the whole time. Dave squirmed and wiggled in her grasp, trying to punch her arm to make her let go, “If you hurt me, my parents will sue your furry-ass!” Tanya chuckled, “I’m not gonna hurt you kid, plus, I doubt your parents can sue a creature you humans don’t even believe exists.” Tanya pulls the basement door open and grins, “Now, stay down in the basement for a while and think about what you’ve done. One of my friends will be joining you shortly.” The werewolf set Dave down on the top stair and swiftly shut the door, locking it.

You could both hear Dave yell and bang on the door from the other side, screaming obscenities a kid his age probably shouldn’t use or even know of. The werewolf rolled her eyes, pulling out her phone and calling someone, “Hey, it’s Tanya. You mind sending another sitter to the basement of… address, address… 204, Maple Street? You’re sending Hera? Great!” The werewolf quickly hung up the phone and sighed, looking down at her tattered clothes, “And these were my business clothes too.” She then noticed you still gapping at her, she chuckled, showing off her huge knife-like teeth, “What’s the matter with you kid? You look like you’ve seen a ghost… or a werewolf.” There was an uncomfortable silence until she continued, “It’s me! Tanya! Your babysitter.” You mutter in fear, “Y-you’re a werewolf?” Tanya chuckled, “Yeah, well… you humans aren’t the only intelligent species on the planet ya’ know.”

"Hmm..."

12.content:
Standing on your doorstep was a teenage girl about five feet tall, with large glasses and braces on her teeth, with frizzy red hair and freckles. "Hi." She said with a sort of nasally voice. "Um...hello." You say "Are you the babysitter?" She nodded "Yes, I'm Sabrina. May I come in?" You step aside and let her in the house before showing her to the living room where your brother was playing his video game.

"This is my brother Dave, and trust me, he will do everything he can to make this night a living hell." You say, to which Dave turns around to say "I'm gonna tell mo-" only to cut himself off when he sees Sabrina. "That's our babysitter?" He says before he begins to laugh hysterically. "That's got to be the ugliest girl I've ever seen!"

At this, Sabrina scowled. "You know, it's not nice to make fun of a person's appearance. I'll give you one chance to apologize." But this only makes Dave laugh harder "What will you do, put me in time out?" Having had enough of your brother, Sabrina reaches into her pocket and pulls out a six inch piece of polished wood, before giving it a little flicking motion, and in an instantly, your brother's voice was silenced. For a brief moment, it looked like he was still laughing, but when he realized no sound was coming from his mouth, he began to panic.

"What did you do to him?" You ask, astounded at what you just saw. "Just a little silencing charm." Said Sabrina "Basically its like a mute button on a remote control, but for people." Now it was your turn to laugh as you watched your brother try to shout and scream as hard as he could, but to no avail, as though his voice box had been removed.

"How did you do that?" You ask, once you've caught your breath. "Oh, it's just a simple spell. I've been studying magic for a few years now, and I've gotten pretty good at it, if I do say so myself." Sabrina then kneels down to Dave's height and says "Here's the rules, shorty. If you can behave the rest of the night, I'll give you your voice back before I leave. But do anything to anger me or get on my nerves, and I'll cast an even worse spell on you, got it?"

Dave just glared at Sabrina in silence for a few moments before reluctantly nodding. "Good." Sabrina turns to you and says "So, any ideas on what to do while we wait for your folks?"

13.content:
You answered the door, and your jaw dropped. Grinning down at you was a voluptuous, red-skinned lady. She had a pointed tail, scaly red skin, pointed claw-like fingernails, tusks sticking out of her luscious lips, goat horns on her head, long black hair, a pair of thick thighs, large breasts, a bubble butt, and an intoxicating smile. She wore a pair of shredded black jeans, a revealing black top with a flaming skull on it, and a worn black leather jacket, she also had a few nose and lips piercings. You just stared up at her, awestruck. The succubus giggled, reaching down and ruffling your hair, “Hey little guy, I’m Katie, your sitter. Mind if I come in?”

Silently you move out of the way, allowing entrance into your house. Katie giggles as she enters, “Nice place ya’ got here kid. So, I was told there’s two of you?” You nearly choke on your own tongue, “U-um, yeah. My little brother is in the living room.” Katie smirks and winks at you as she turns to walk into the living room, shaking her hips at you as she walked in, “Hey there pipsqueak! How ya’ doing?” Dave turned around and was seemingly unphased by her presence, “… What are you supposed to be, some kind of demon?” Katie giggled, “Bingo, we got our winner here!” Dave just scoffed, “It’s not even Halloween yet lady?” Katie giggled, “Well, it’s not a costume. I’m the real deal!” Dave grinned and sneered at her, “Oh yeah!? Then prove it!” Katie grins evilly at Dave as she approaches him.
13.title: Katie the Succubus

132.content:
Katie walked over to an empty wall in your house and looked at it for a moment. You and Dave just stood there confused wondering what she doing.

Using her long black claw like nails, Katie began to trace what looked like the outline of a door on the wall. As she traced the door a red light came from the outline as strange new magic door appeared inside your house. Katie pushed open the door as a strange black void appeared on the other side.

“You boys are first.” Katie said with a wicked smile.

“Umm....where does it lead?” You asked both curious and terrified.

“Why would I spoil the fun? Now I’m ya go!” Katie said as she grabbed your wrist along without Dave’s and pushed you through the portal she just opened in your living your.

As you passed through the black void it felt like you were free falling. You and Dave both screamed at the top of your lungs as all you saw was bright lights and strange shapes until.....

Everything suddenly came into focus. You were standing again with Dave as both of you looked visibly shaken. It only took a second to realize something. You were no longer in your house....

The two of you were standing on some kind of street corner. However it was different from any place you had ever seen before. The buildings and roads all looked....strange...You saw billboards and ads for things that didn’t make sense.

“Werewolf fur shampoo? Vampire sun screen? Zombie replacement parts? What the heck was this place?” You thought looking around.

“Having fun?” A familiar voice said as Katie appeared behind you.

“What is this place?” You asked.

“This is my home. The land of monsters. It’s where all the monsters you have heard of live whenever we visiting the human world. Every kind of monster you have sever seen in a movie, read in a book, or heard about comes from here.” Katie said.

“All the monsters live in harmony here?” Dave asked amazed.

Katie laughed at that questions. “Please....Do all humans live in peace together? We tolerate each other but monsters have the same fights and issues as you humans have with each other. That’s why so many of us come to the human world to escape all the petty drama and problems of this world.” Katie said.

“Wow....this is amazing can we explore some!” Dave asked as he jumped up and down.

“Sorry boys...The land of monsters has one strict rule above all others....no humans allowed. You two would be captured on sight. I broke the rules just bringing you hear. I just wanted to prove myself. Now come one let’s head back.” Katie gestured.

“Please! There has to be a way to desguise us!” Dave said as all his favorite Halloween fantasies were coming true. He didn’t want to leave without seeing this world.

“Hmm....Well...There is one. I have to turn you both into monsters. Are you sure you want that?” Katie asked.

“Heck Yes!” Dave said jumping up and down excited.

“Umm...as long as it isn’t permanent....”you said a bit more nervous than Dave. You wanted to see this world but you weren’t sure you trusted Katie.

Katie smiled a bit as she began to wave her hands a bit. “Alright you are up first.” She said pointing to you.

“I think I will make you....

1323.content:
She pointed at you and grinned, “I’ll make you a zombie…” Then she pointed to Dave, “And you a vampire.” She waved her hands in the air, chanting an incantation. Two puffs of smoke enveloped you and your brother. Once the smoke dissipated you realized your skin was pale and your body felt heavier, and kind of numb. Dave opened his mouth and poked at his fangs, “It worked.” Katie giggled, “Of course it worked. Since you’re monsters now, wanna go off and explore. I’ll meet you kids back here in an hour or so?” You were both really excited. Dave bounced up and down, “Yeah, yeah, thanks Ms. Katie!” The succubus grinned and ruffled Dave’s hair, “Do mention it little guy. Have fun.”

As you both wander off together into the spooky looking neighborhood Katie’s grin grew more evil. She chuckled to herself, “The costume spell worked perfectly. And they actually think I could turn them into monsters. I simply poof-ed some Halloween costumes on them. Kids are so gullible. Oh, well. They’ll figure out I tricked them soon enough. In the meantime, momma needs a nice relaxing Friday night.” Katie headed back towards her apartment on skeleton way as you and your brother fearlessly walked down the street, believing Katie’s lie and thinking you’re actual monsters. You turn to your little brother, “Where should we go first?” You look around the town and it is teaming with life at night. Neither of you notice some of the puzzled looks some of the locals give you. Some monsters like Dragons and Werewolves can smell human scent, and they definitely smelt it from your direction. Dave points towards…

14.content:
You open the door to see a tall, sickly pale girl who looks to be around seventeen, with black hair tied in pigtails wearing a black dress, fishnet stockings and high heels, with skull shaped jewelry on her fingers and ears. She looks down at you with a scowl, as though you just spat in her direction.

"Are you the babysitter?" You ask. "That's right. I'm Vanessa, and believe me, I'm no happier about having to watch you dorks tonight than you are. I'm only doing this because I need the money, understand?" You nod and let her in. She didn't seem like a very pleasant person, but at least you wouldn't be the only one who was miserable tonight.

She sees your brother in the living room playing his game. "Hey squirt! I think it's about time you went to bed." Dave ignored her, causing her to growl in anger. "I said go to bed!" Dave simply turned to face her and blew a loud raspberry at her before returning to his game.

Having had enough, Vanessa reached behind the tv cabinet and pulled the plug. The instant the tv shut off, your brother let out a whiney cry of "HEY!" "Listen to me, you little brat!" Said Vanessa, getting madder by the moment. "I'm in charge while your parents are away, so what I say goes, got it?" Much to your surprise, Dave actually gave Vanessa the finger in response to her demand.

You expected her to lay him over her lap and give the brat a hard paddling for that, but instead she grabs him by the shoulders and glares into his eyes. Your brother stood transfixed by her gaze, until she said a single command. "Sleep!" In an instant, your brother was in dreamland, and she let him fall to the floor with a light thud.

"How did you-" You tried to ask, unable to believe what you just saw. But she cuts you off "Nevermind that, just go to your room and keep quiet. Do whatever you want, just stay there and be silent. Okay?" You definitely weren't going to argue with her, you you quickly run upstairs. When you get to your room, you peek out the crack of your door to find Vanessa...
14.title: Vanessa the Vampire

A human nerd

141.content:
Vanessa reached into her pocket and pulled out a small smartphone, before dialing a number with it. "Hey baby! Guess what? I'm all alone now, and was hoping you felt like spending some time with your girl! No, I'm not actually at my place, I got stuck babysitting tonight, so you'll have to come to this address. Love you too, see you in a bit!"

After she hung up, she dragged your brothers unconscious body across the floor and locked him in a nearby broom closet. A while later, your doorbell rang once more and she opened it to find...

Dave wakes up and starts annoying Vanessa again

142.content:
There was something very off-putting and strange about Vanessa and her behavior. As you peered downstairs you saw something that made you almost shriek in terror. Looming over your little brother was Vanessa, but she had two large fangs sticking out of her mouth. She seemed to be drooling and licking her lips hungrily. You thought she looked oddly pale. She must be a vampire, a real life vampire! How was this even possible? There was no time to lose, you had to stop her! You burst out of your bedroom and ran downstairs confronting her, “Hey, stop that! Don’t eat my brother!”

Vanessa shot you an annoyed glare, “Oh my god, are you kidding me? I thought I told you? Room! Quiet! Stay!” You shook your head, “I won’t let you eat my brother!” Vanessa rolled her eyes, “I wasn’t going to hurt him. I was gonna suck some of his blood and that’s all. He’d still be human, he wouldn’t die, I’d just get a little snack. That’s all!” Vanessa glared at you angrily, like you were misjudging her and she had to stand her ground. You blurted out, “I don’t believe you.” Vanessa smirked, rolling her eyes again, “I wasn’t expecting you to. You humans are so stubborn, you’d never trust a monster. Why do you think we keep ourselves separate from you humans, huh? I bet you didn’t even know monsters existed before tonight, huh small fry?” She had you there, you didn’t trust her, and it was partly because she was a vampire. On the flipside, you didn’t like the idea of your vampire babysitter using you and your little brother as midnight snacks.

15.content:
Jenny - A seemingly joyful and plucky blonde babe. Strangely arrives on your doorstep dressed as a clown, and is a shapeshifting creature that feeds on fear, especially those of children. Especially unnerving to you because you're kind of afraid of clowns.

Sylvia - A pinkish red slime, who seems to be rather interested in getting close to you and cuddling, enveloping you in her translucent jelly-like body.

Nancy - A fifteen foot long naga with a bit of an attitude. She doesn't seem to be too fond of humans, and might end up swallowing you and your brother whole before the evening is over if you annoy her too much.

Cerena- A beautiful and motherly centaur, always happy to look after the little ones. Might offer to take the two of you out on the town for the night, instead of hanging around inside.
15.title: More Babysitters

choices: A pack of balloons
A rubber chicken
A cream pie
151.content:
There on your porch stood the strangest yet simultaneously most frightening thing you've ever seen. It was a young woman with long blonde hair and sparkling blue eyes, but the scary part, at least for you, was she wore a big red nose, white makeup on her face, red lipstick, and was dressed in a goofy outfit with long floppy shoes and ridiculously baggy multicolored clothes. In other words, she was dressed as a clown.

Which was greatly unsettling to you, because ever since you were five, you had sort of a fear of clowns, they just made you uncomfortable. "Can I help you?" You hesitantly ask "Hi kid!" She said in a sickeningly cheerful voice "I'm Jennywize the Giggling Clown, but you can just call me Jenny. I'm here about a babysitting job."

She can't be serious. Why would your parents hire a circus performer to babysit you and your brother? Without even being invited, she strode on into your house. It was only now you noticed she was carrying a large sack over her shoulder.

"She went into the living room where Dave was. "Hiya Dave!" Dave turned and let out a slight scream when he saw Jenny. "Oh, don't be scared. I'm your babysitter, and you and your brother are in for an evening of fun!"

With that said, she set the sack she was carrying on the floor and pulled out...
151.title: Jenny the Clown

choices: Try to find somewhere to hide in the kitchen
Try to escape the monster chicken in your bedroom
While you're running away you both end up tripping
1512.content:
Jenny dug her hand into her sack, you could hear her rummaging around, her hand bumping against tons of different items that clanged and bumped together. Eventually her face lit up, “Ah-ha, my favorite toy.” She pulled out a rubber chicken from her bag that looked completely deflated and destroyed, yet she held it up like it was the coolest thing ever, “Tah-dah!” You and Dave were both still a little freaked out by this clown lady, but that wouldn’t stop Dave’s attitude, “That’s just a dumb rubber chicken.” Jenny smiled, “Very observant kid. But watch what happens when I water him.” She pulled out a glass of water from behind her back, seemingly from midair and poured the water on the chicken.

Dave frowned and you gapped as the water she spilt got all over the wooden floor. You groan, “Oh geez, mom and dad are gonna be so mad at this.” Dave chimed in, “Yeah lady, what gives you freak.” Jenny dropped the chicken on the couch as she held up her hands, “Hold on, hold on boys. I swear. Thing’s will get way more entertaining in a minute, just trust me.” She was right about that, although ‘entertaining’ would not be your word for it. The rubber chicken started to move and inflate itself. It started getting larger and larger, and moving on it’s own. BUCAWK! Did that chicken just make a noise?

You three turn around and come face-to-beak with a huge, twelve-foot chicken monster. It had glowing red eyes, sharp claws on it’s scaly feet, huge wings and a beak that drooled green, slimy saliva. The beast stared down at you and Dave with a hungry stare and a greasy grin on it’s beak. Dave shrieked in fear, “What is that thing?” Jenny chuckled nervously, “Um, well, that’s my pet chicken Jojo. Bought him off a witch. I didn’t think the water would make him that big.”

Dave whimpered a bit as you both stared up at the massive approaching beast, “H-he looks hungry.” Jenny chuckled as if there was nothing to worry about, “Yeah, well… his favorite food is kids after all.” You both blurt out in terror, “What?” Jenny giggled, “Sorry, I think I read the manual wrong, see I thought it said one 12oz glass of water for 12 inches but I think the guide meant 12 feet! …Oops.” BUCAWK! You both scream as you run away and the monster chicken gives chase.

Jenny slurps her tongue against her lips and rubs her stomach, getting filled up on your fear, “Ok, maybe that wasn’t such a bad mistake after all. If this keeps up, I’m gonna be stuffed before the nights even half over. And it looks like Mr. Bucawk will be too.” You both scream and run, Dave tearing up as you feel the chicken’s hot breath on your neck. He’s right behind you, and you definitely don’t want to become chicken food. Where should you run to?
1512.title: A rubber chicken

choices: The window
The closet
Stand and fight!
15122.content:
You both manage to reach your bedroom and slam the door behind you, just as the monstrous chicken slams into the outside of it. You quickly lock the door and you and your brother huddle together, shivering in fear as the overgrown bird repeatedly rams itself against the door, trying to bust it down.

"What do we do, what do we do, what do we do!?" You brother cries, starting to hyperventilate. You look around your room in panic, trying to come up with a plan.

The door is starting to crack. Soon the chicken will have broken through, and then... you don't want to think about what happens after that! You see only two possible solutions, climb out your window, or hide in your closet and pray it doesn't find you.

What do you do?
15122.title: Try to escape the monster chicken in your bedroom

choices: A basilisk
A manticore
151221.content:
There was no way you were fighting this thing off or hiding from it. You had to keep moving, you shout at Dave, “The window.” You run to your bedroom window and swiftly open it. After you both crawl out onto your roof you make sure to shut the window as not to alert the monster where you might be. You both delicately shimmy your way across the roof towards the drain pipe that you’d both slide down. You tried to keep your arm over Dave’s chest, he was still hyperventilating, and although you wanted to freak out to you need to stay calm.

You both made it to the drain pipe and slowly but surely shifted your way down it. Once on the ground you looked around your backyard, realizing the only way to get back to the street is to go through your house. You weren’t sure whether to run through a few of your neighbor’s backyards or risk going back inside to make it to the main street. You didn’t have time though when you heard a BUCAWK from your bedroom and some stomping, it was leaving to come and find you two. Dave whimpered, “What do we do?”

The beast burst out of your backdoor and into the backyard, it’s stomach growling loudly. Then you heard Jenny’s voice, “Settle down Fido!” The clown girl walked towards the huge chicken, rubbing her stomach and letting out a belch, “Wow, that was filling. Thanks kids.” You were both confused, “What did we do?” Jenny looked at you like you asked her the most ridiculous question ever, “What do you think you do? I’m a monster! I feed off fear! And you boys gave me a lot of it.” The clown sprinkled some salt over the chicken monster and it started to shrink back down.

Dave approached her, looking angry, “You big, ugly goof. You scared us just cause you were hungry?” Jenny chuckled, rolling her eyes, “Well, yeah kid. That’s what I do. What did you expect from a monster?” Dave growled and barreled at her, hitting and kicking her as much as he could. Granted, since she was the size of an adult human, he didn’t do much damage. Jenny smirked down at him, “Well, I mentioned I was a shape-shifter. I could turn into anything I like. Since you two clearly didn’t wanna pet Fido, wanna see what I could do?” Dave squeaked, “No.” Jenny giggled, “Well too bad, I’m the sitter and I’m doing it anyway.” What horrifying monster does Jenny turn into?
151221.title: The window

choices: You two struggle inside the chicken’s stomach
You hear Jenny talking outside of the belly
151222.content:
You point towards your closet, “Let’s duck in there.” You don’t have to ask Dave twice as he sprints into your closet. You shut the door but leave it open a crack to see what the chicken monster is doing. You hear another crack and a crash. You bedroom door shatters. If you don’t end up getting eaten tonight you’ll have a lot to explain to mom and dad. You nearly scream when you see the monster chicken skulking around your room, sniffing around. It digs its beak into your clothing draw before poking it’s huge head back up and swiveling it to the closet. He’s found you.

You try to shut the door but before you even can the large avian’s clawed foot snatches the door and tears it open. You and Dave huddle into the back of the closet as the huge chicken knelt down and pokes its head in. His hot breath blasts over you two. His slick bird tongue slithers out from his beak and licks you two, coating you in stinky chicken drool. And you can bet the chicken really likes what he’s tasting. Instead of having a chicken dinner, you’re about to become a chicken’s dinner. You suddenly regret all those times your Dad took you to KFC. Looks like this is a dose of karma.

The chicken BUCAWKS at you one more time before opening it’s beak nice and wide, to give you two a nice view of his gullet and… CHOMP! In one quick bite you and your brother are out of the closet and hoisted into the hungry chicken’s beak completely. It was fairly hot, cramped, stinky and wet in the chicken’s beak. Plus, his annoying tongue pushes you around and slaps into you both as you desperately tried to push the beak open. Unfortunately, the chicken has different plans, specifically you two in it’s belly. The monster avian tilts its head back and GULP! A kid-sized bulge wiggles its way down his gullet as you two are painfully squeezed down his esophagus and into his belly. Satisfied with his meal, the monster chicken let’s out a nasty belch.
151222.title: The closet

choices: You body-slam into it, knocking it off balance
The monster chicken has little trouble eating you both
151223.content:
You pick what is quite possibly the dumbest option, you’re going to fight it. You run across your room and grab the hockey stick you used for Junior Hockey. Dave squeals, “What are you doing?” You groan, “I’m gonna fight it!” Dave shrieks, “You can’t fight it. It’s gonna kill us!” You turn to your little brother and put your hand on is shoulder, in any other situation he’d just be a pest but you knew he was genuinely scared, “Don’t worry. I promise I’ll protect you.” Dave tears up as the avian beast smashes it’s way through your door.

THUD! THUD! SMASH! The monster barrels through the door and leers down at you two. You swing your hockey stick back and forth at it, “Back monster! Back! The chicken eyes your weapon, lazily bobbing it’s neck too and fro to avoid it. Then it launched it’s beak outwards and snapped it’s beak onto your hockey stick, ripping it out of your hands and snapping it in half. You were petrified, but knew you had to do something. Maybe you could fight it? Your mom did pay for those two months of karate lessons, maybe they’ll pay off?

You lunged at the chicken’s abdomen, kicking and punching at it. The un-phased chicken simply smirked at your pathetic attack and kicked you across the room and into your bed. You were temporarily dazed as the chicken monster set its sights on your little brother. Dave grabbed a teddy bear and huddled into the corner, clutching it tightly. Tears streamed down his cheeks as he whimpered lightly, “Don’t, don’t, please no, don’t.” The chicken could care less, he was just really hungry, and Dave looked absolutely tasty. Meanwhile, downstairs Jenny was rubbing her own stomach and licking her lips, “This is amazing. Such tasty fear, keep fighting you two.” The chicken opens it’s beak nice and wide, giving your little brother a nice little preview of the chicken’s horrid breath and hungry gullet. The monster bird lunged it’s open beak at Dave and…
151223.title: Stand and fight!

choices: Just because you're prepared doesn't mean she can't still scare you!
You're going to help her scare other people!
She's had her fill of fear for now.
15123.content:
You were already nervous enough when some weird clown woman walked into your house all of a sudden… but even your idea of the ‘worst case scenario’ wasn’t as bad as THIS! This was like something straight out of a horror movie! You could hear the chicken’s warm breath against the back of your head, and you knew it was only a hair’s breadth behind you, cackling and chirping like some crazed beast! You had no idea how this sort of thing was possible… it violated everything you thought you knew about reality… but you could ponder THAT once you weren’t at risk of becoming bird food!

Your little brother stuck right by your side as you sprinted towards the stairs, hoping that the massive chicken would have a difficult time navigating them… and indeed, it did, ending up clucking angrily as it was stuck at the bottom of the stairs. What you forgot to account for was that one of the stairs was half an inch higher than it should be! This is something your dad promised to fix, but never got around to. It’d been a pain in your behind for months… but now, it was potentially lethal, as both you and Dave both simultaneously stub your toes on the stairs in your panicked rushing, and end up faceplanting!

Stunned, the two of you end up rolling and sliding down the carpeted staircase… and with a smug smirk, the chicken leans down and slides open its massive beak, its mouth waiting for you at the bottom of the stairs! You both let out panicked screams as you try to grab onto the railings… but it’s no use! All you can hear is Jenny’s uproarious laughter as you both fall right into the massive chicken’s mouth! Triumphantly, the bird rears back, two pairs of kicking legs hanging from its maw!

You were both crying out in panic, thinking that the chicken was going to chew you up with its massive, powerful beak… but the reality was almost scarier! Instead of chewing you, it just brought you deeper into its maw… and your heads ended up slipping into its cavernous throat! Your panic reached its peak when you realized the massive avian wa going to SWALLOW YOU WHOLE! “Mm… this is the most scrumptious fear I’ve had all month! Sure am glad I took this job!” You could faintly hear that sadistic clown giggling.

You never particularly liked the smell of chickens, but the stink within its beak was the worst of all, especially as you’re covered in its saliva as it prepares to gulp you down. Jenny gluts herself on your terror as the chicken takes another gulp, its throat pulling you in up to your chests, as your knees start to enter its beak. It waves your legs around playfully, savoring its meals… before, with one last gulp, your feet disappear into its beak completely, as you’re sealed entirely within the grossness and warmth of its body!

Its throat squeezes painfully tightly around the two of you as you’re reduced to a massive bulge, travelling down its long neck. Eventually, you’re deposited into its big, roomy stomach completely, as the chicken let's out a satisfied cluck. “Have fun in there, boys!” She smiles, poking the chicken’s big, swaying, feathery gut as she feeds on the terror of the boys within. You were both kicking and pounding against the walls, crying out in terror, believing you were about to be slowly digested!

… but wait. As you slowly tuckered yourselves out, you began to notice something. There wasn’t any acid in here! After thinking about this whole situation for a moment, you finally put two and two together. “Dave! Dave! Wait!” You grab him by the shoulders, preventing him from struggling for a moment. “We’re not actually digesting! See? It’s safe in here!” He pauses, looking around, and although he was still shaken up, he seems to calm down a bit when he realizes there indeed wasn’t any acid gurgling away at you. “If we wanna defeat that clown… we just have to not be afraid!”

“W-what do you mean?” He asks, confused.

“I think she’s feeding off our fear somehow!” You say, judging based on the weird things the clown has been saying. “So… whatever she does… we just have to not be afraid!” He looks at you, a disoriented expression on his face as your words sink in. When they do, the clown claps, shaking her head.

“Welp… looks like you figured me out!” She chuckled a bit. “See, this is why I don’t tend to babysit older kids! They figure the whole thing out too quickly!” She crosses her arms as she leans against the chicken’s big, round gut. “Jojo, let ‘em out!” She snaps her fingers, and immediately, you’re roughly pulled back up the chicken’s gullet, groaning as its throat squeezes you again. Before you know it, you’re dropped back onto the ground, covered in saliva… and when you look behind you, you see that Jojo is just a regular rubber chicken again.

You’re both relieved to have survived your trip to an avian’s gut… but you quiet down when the clown looms over you. “Still, I’d hate to end the fun so soon!” She smiled warmly, before announcing the next step of her plans...
