15123.title: While you're running away you both end up t...

choices: A manticore
A giant snake
151231.content:
You were confused by Jenny’s line of reasoning. Dave spoke up, taunting her, “Nice try freak. We already know you’re trying to scare us! You just admitted to it. We just won’t be scared no matter what you do. Stupid clown.” Jenny giggled and patted Dave on the head, “Such a cute kid, so naïve. Do you have any idea how fear-response works little guy?” Dave groaned and swatted her hand away, “No, and I don’t wanna find out. You sound like my teacher.” Jenny cackled and licked her lips with a serpent tongue, “Simply put, you humans have an innate fear-response to any and all potential predators. You’re hardwired to be afraid of certain things… like giant snakes, werewolves, dragons, a lot of monsters really.”

Dave wasn’t really following her but you were starting to get an inkling of and idea of what she had planned, and you didn’t like it. Dave snorted at her, “Yeah, so what? You’re a clown! You’re none of those things. Unless you’ve got all those monsters on speed-dial you’ve got nothing to scare us with.” Jenny smiled widely and poked Dave in the nose, “That’s where you’re wrong short stuff. Remember how I mentioned that I was a monster… a shape-shifter in particular?” Dave was about to mouth off to her until his eyes widened and he realized what she was getting at. He shrunk backwards, “Oh… uh, really?” Jenny nodded, “Yep, so I’ve got all those scary monsters on speed-dial and then some. Matter of fact, I think I’m in the mood of turning into…”
151231.title: Just because you're prepared doesn't me...

choices: Dave brings Jenny to one of his friend’s houses
You elect for Jenny to scare your mean next door neighbors
151232.content:
Jenny narrowed her eyes at Dave and snorted in anger, digging her hands into her pockets, “I guess you’re right.” Jenny growled and lightly kicked you in the shin, “Stupid older brother, gotta ruin my fun.” You groaned, “What did I do?” Jenny simply answered by opening her mouth and growling at you, a growl so deafening it didn’t sound like it was coming out of a teenage clown, but a huge lion. You shut your mouth as Jenny put her hands on her hips and looked down at you two with a grimace, “Since you two are such little smarty pants’, I think I’ll use you two to help me scare some folks. I could still easily go for seconds… maybe thirds.”

Dave smirked, “And what if we say no?” Jenny barked back, “You can’t say no, I’m the sitter.” Dave chuckled, “Well I just did?” Jenny snarled, “You wanna sleep inside Jojo’s gut tonight kid?” That immediately made Dave shriek in fright, “Um, no!” Jenny grinned, “Good. Than help a hungry shape-shifter out will ya’.” She gestured for you two to follow her as she walked out of your house and onto your front lawn, “So, first things first, I need to humans to scare? Know anybody I could scare.”

Jenny turned to Dave and knelt down, pinching his cheek, “How about it cutie pie? Got any other little friends I can terrify?” Dave slapped her hand off of him, “Get offa me! I don’t have any friends.” Jenny licked Dave’s cheek with her forked tongue, “You’re lying. I can smell it.” Dave groaned, “How can you tell?” Jenny cackled, “I can’t, but you fell for my lie. So you do have friends. Have any that’d like a visit from ol’ Jennywise?” You didn’t want Jenny to scare any more innocent people, but you also didn’t want her to torment you for the rest of the night.
151232.title: You're going to help her scare other people!

choices: You
Dave
1513.content:
Your brothers eyes light up as Jenny pulls out a pie from inside her bag. He always has had a huge sweet tooth, especially for baked goods. "Are you boys hungry?" Jenny asks, your brother nods vigorously while you shrug. You weren't really hungry, but what the hell, if this weirdo clown lady brought you both pie, maybe she's not so bad after all.

"The thing is, I only brought one pie. So how about we play a little game to decide who gets it? I'll flip a coin, and whoever calls it gets the pie to themselves." She pulls a quarter out of her pocket and tosses it in the air. "Heads!" Dave cries, which means you get tails.

What Jenny didn't tell you, was that the pie was made with a transformation potion in it, and she was literally going to shove it in the face of whoever wins the coin toss, causing them to turn into a random monster.

The coin lands in Jenny's gloved palm and she grins as she raises the pie and says "Open wide!" as she shoves the pie into one of your faces.

Who won the coin toss?
1513.title: Transformation Treat

choices: You’re kind of hungry and your little brother looks appetizing
Go up onto the roof and attempt to fly
15131.content:
Jenny grabs the pie and throws it straight into your face, covering you in the dessert. You groan in anger as your clothes and face are covered in the mess. You shouted at Jenny, “What’d you do that for?” Jenny giggled, “For fun. Just wait and see?” You growl, “Wait and see what?” Then you felt a weird rumbling in your stomach, and a strange tingling all over your body, “W-what’s going on?” Jenny chuckled, “You’re transforming.” You shriek, “Transforming? Into what?” Jenny replied as-a-matter-of-factly, “A monster, duh!” You shriek in fear as you feel your body get bigger, you arms and legs get longer. A snout starts stretching itself out from your mouth. A tail sprouts out from your tailbone. Your nails turn to talons, two bat-like wings sprout from your back and your skin hardens into scales.

You lumber into your downstairs bathroom, barely fitting inside to see what you’ve become. As you duck your neck down to see yourself in the mirror, a huge, hulking, red-scaled European dragon stares back at you. You scream at the mirror and duck out of the bathroom, “I’m a dragon!” Jenny chuckled, “You betcha!” You’re about to cry, “Change me back. Change me back now!” Jenny grinned, “Hey, relax kid. I’ll reverse this before your parents get home, just think of this as a gift. You get to see how the other-half lives for a night… the monster-half.” You had no choice but to trust Jenny, then you heard your brother complain, “Why does he get to be a monster and not me?” Jenny smirked, “Because you’ve been a disrespectful little turd, that’s why.” Jenny turned back to you, “So, whatta you wanna do first big guy?”
15131.title: You

choices: Let him out now!
He's staying in there for the night!
151311.content:
Your heart was practically in your throat! You were letting out panicked little groans as you moved around, disoriented by your new body. Everything felt… different! You didn’t even know how to walk, now that you were walking around on four legs instead of two! Even your eyelids felt heavier, and your footsteps louder! You ended up trying to freeze in place and take deep breaths, trying to keep from having a panic attack.

Of course, your little brother didn’t make it easy on you. “Well, whatever! Like I want to be a stupid monster anyway!” He rolled his eyes and plopped himself on the couch, crossing his arms and pouting obnoxiously. “Like, seriously, bro. Just when I thought you couldn’t get any uglier… you up and turned into some oversized iguana!”

You growl. “Dave, I am REALLY not in the mood…” You give him the most intimidating glare you possibly can, showing off your huge, sharp fangs… but it does nothing to quiet his obnoxious complaining.

“Oh, like I care what mood you’re in! You’re not even human anymore! You, like, don’t have any human rights! The government should lock you in some lab and poke you with needles all day!” He shouted, seemingly outraged. “Seriously. Wah wah wah, ‘not in the mood’. You’re ALWAYS complaining! It’s so annoying! You know, YOU’RE the reason our REAL dad left mom!”

You freeze up. Even the clown lady looks a little surprised. A huge glare spreads across your face as you loom over the boy, and Dave suddenly seems nervous. “How DARE you!?” You sound less like his brother, and more like one of those giant, villainous dragons he’s seen in cartoons! Your voice is so booming, it breaks windows! He looks ready to flee, but it’s too late - your maw descends upon him!

He let's out a muffled cry as you close your jaws around him, lifting your head and letting out an amused hum as you feel him writhe around in your slobbery maw! He punches at the side of your cheeks, making little bulges… but ultimately, he’s so tiny compared to you, there’s really nothing he can do. You swish him around in your mouth with your tongue, just to torment him some more. It was nice to finally be able to give him his comeuppance… and besides, he was the most delicious thing you’ve ever tasted for some reason!

This was all fun and games… at least, until one of his punches landed right on your uvula! Your maw shuddered open as you let out a gag, your entire head shuddering for a while as a nauseous feeling overtook you. Once the feeling subsided… you realize you couldn’t feel Dave in your maw anymore! You try looking around for him… only for the realization to slowly sink in… you’ve accidentally swallowed him WHOLE!

“Oh… oh God! What have I done?” You shuddered, beginning to shake uncontrollably as you realize what you’ve done. “I… I ate my own brother! I-I’m a monster!”

Jenny rolled her eyes. Your and your brother’s fear was delicious right now… but she couldn’t let you go on thinking you’ve just killed your own brother! Even she wasn’t THAT cruel! “Hah! Well, you’re right about the ‘monster’ thing at least,” she reassured you. “But don’t worry. He’s not being digested in there! … I think.”

You pause, doing a double take. Just now, you notice that your brother is actually… still alive! You look down at your round, scaly belly, and you notice he’s so small, he doesn’t even make the slightest bulge… but still, you can feel him deep in there, indignantly punching and kicking the walls. He didn’t seem to be running out of air or getting digested or anything. “Wait, so… he’s going to be okay?”

“Yeah, don’t worry about him. Monsters have full control over their digestive systems, so they don’t digest anything unless they specifically want to,” Jenny shrugs, nonchalantly. “So that brat - unfortunately - isn’t going to end up as dragon fat any time soon.”

“How do I let him out?” You ask, not fully trusting the clown for obvious reasons.

“Oh, what? You’re going to let him out ALREADY? After he’s tortured you all these years?” She almost looks disappointed. “You’re missing out on your once-in-a-lifetime chance to get revenge! I have a better idea; why don’t you keep him in there, and let me feed off his fear. And in return, I’ll take you to see The Land of Monsters! A big ol’ man-eating beast like yourself should fit in perfectly there!”

You think about it for a moment. Apparently, he wasn’t going to be harmed in there… and feeling him move inside your stomach was actually rather pleasant, and it felt great knowing you were getting your revenge, and there was nothing he could do about it. Besides, The Land of Monsters sounds cool. Eventually, you come to a decision...
151311.title: You’re kind of hungry and your little brother...

choices: Madame Curse’s: Witchcraft, Spell & Magic Store
Abraxis’ Abhorrent Appetizers: Monster Fastfood Restaurant
1513112.content:
You thought it over, and once you were over your initial fear that Dave might be digested you didn’t feel all too bad about leaving him in your gut. You pat your scaly belly with a claw and chuckle, letting out a belch, “Mmm, tastes just like chicken.” You chuckle, feeling your brother wiggle in your gut. This felt perfect, not only were you getting revenge on your little hellion of a brother, but there’s no way he could tattle on you. There’s no way your mom and dad would believe you turned into a dragon and ate him. You smiled and nodded at Jenny, “Sure, sounds like a deal.” Jenny smiled widely, “Wonderful.” With a snap of her fingers your living room changed immediately to a dark, creepy street.

You look around the strange neighborhood you were teleported into. Old, creepy victorian-era houses and gothic castles lined the streets. You saw convenience stores advertising strange products and even a movie theater with what was probably supposed to be attractive monster celebrities on the theaters array of movie posters. You scanned the area with a quizzical look on your snout, “So, this is it, huh?” Jenny nodded with a smile, “Yep, home sweet home! Don’t worry, big guy, it’s way more exciting than it initially looks. Come on, I’ll show you a really cool place.” You follow Jenny, stomping your way through the dimly lit streets. You two walk past a group of chatting vampires and a werewolf couple a few minutes later. You looked at them with a look of awe, while they ultimately ignored you and your clown companion. You then heard Jenny squeal, “Here we are!” You look back up to see you’re in front of…
1513112.title: He's staying in there for the night!

choices: See what you can have for dessert!
Fly around the realm and do some sightseeing!
15131122.content:
The Land of Monsters… what an intimidating realm! The sky was a vibrant and ominous shade of red, with what appears to be a storm circling above… the houses all looked ancient and veiled in shadow… but despite all this, the inhabitants all seemed to be rather bright and cheerful, if a little sinister. You got a few funny looks from passersby, as it was obvious that you were a stranger in a strange land. You’d probably be terrified here… if it wasn’t for the fact that you were so much bigger than most everybody else.

“It’s probably a good you swallowed ‘im, really! Your belly’s probably the safest place to be around here,” Jenny laughs. “A boy like him probably wouldn’t go on for long here before being snatched up and gobbled down by some demoness or something.” You shuddered at the thought, laying a hand of your scaly gut and hearing the movements deep inside. Dave definitely doesn’t seem to like it in there, but at least he seems to be safe. With his struggles, he’s been tiring himself out, and soon all he can do is try to get comfortable inside your stomach.

Eventually, you find yourself staring up at the most ornate, odd and fancy restaurant building you’ve ever seen! It almost seems non-euclidian in its architecture, a towering silhouette against the scarlet sky. “Now THIS is the best joint around, for all connoisseurs of monster cuisine! Of course, nothing’s tastier than spoiled brats...” Jenny calls as she disappears through the double doors into the restaurant. “... but the food here is the second best thing!”

The doors are big, but still, you have to fold your wings behind your back and crawl just to fit through the door. Once you were inside, though, you were stunned by the sheer size of the place! You could hear a cacophony of spooky voices as every monster you’ve ever heard legends of, or even seen in movies, was all here! You gawked as you stumbled past an xenomorph flirting with a purple people eater… a grey alien doing tricks to impress his rakasha girlfriend… this place really had EVERYTHING!

“Urgh… it smells in here…” You groan. A barrage of the worst stench you’ve ever smelt was pouring from the kitchen! Although, even as you scrunch your face up on impulse at the stench… it’s actually not all that unpleasant. In fact, you actually sort of liked how bad it smelled!

“Smells so GOOD, you mean!” Jenny said with a sway of her hips. “Everything you found gross as a human, you’ll find wonderful as a monster! Trust me!” You walked up to the counter… only to see the restaurant was being manned by an absolutely massive kraken woman, who was actually a little larger than you were! You were in awe at her size, as her single huge eye glanced down half-interested at the eager clown woman.

“I’ll have some fried fingers, a royale with cheese, and some gummy boys for the road,” Penny smiled, before pointing over her shoulder at you. “And a landfill burger for my friend here!” The kraken had a bored expression on her face as she rung her up, before the two of you found a table. Jenny took a chair, while you kind of had to awkwardly lay down on the floor, waiting for them to bring you your orders.

As you gawked around the restaurant in awe, you couldn’t help but notice a gnoll woman eagerly rubbing her lips as she looked over her meal. An entire buffet was laid out for her - apparently, judging by her weight, she was a big eater. The centerpiece of that buffet? Well, lying there on a tray, tied up with an apple stuffed in his mouth, was a boy about Dave’s size! He struggled against his bindings, his protests muffled by the apple, as the hyena woman licked her lips as she looked down at him with hunger in her eyes, a big bib on her neck reading ‘EAT YOU’.

You can only watch as the gnoll slips her ‘meals’ feet into her mouth, cooing at the flavor before pulling them into her throat with a gulp. All the boy could do was squirm futilely as he was brought deeper and deeper in with every gulp, the gnoll’s slobbery lips coming up to his waist in no time at all, the ropes binding him rendering him seemingly helpless. All he could do was wriggle as her hungry jaws travelled over his belly, and then his chest, until most of his body has disappeared into that darkness…

Once only his head was sticking out from between her jaws, he finally managed to spit that apple out! “No! Please! Not again! Somebody! Help-! Mph!” His loud, panicked shouting fills the restaurant for a moment, but it was too little, too late. One last gulp was all it took to reduce the boy to a bulge in her throat, and then, her belly. She let out a thunderous belch as she leaned back, her hands wrapping around her much rounder gut.

“Sorry about that, everyone! This one’s a fighter!” She sheepishly apologized to the other customers after that loud outburst, although most of them seemed to be either amused by it, or indifferent towards it. Even now, you could see the hand and footprints of the boy inside, as the gnoll sits back seeming ecstatic at the feeling, her tail wagging behind her. “Tasty, though. My compliments to the chef!”

You shivered, a little disturbed by the sight… but you had to remind yourself that at least that boy wasn’t getting digested. Heck, it’s not like you even had any room to judge, considering you’ve just eaten your own brother yourself! Still, it begged the question of why the boy was even here. “I didn’t know they served PEOPLE at this restaurant,” you noted.

“Oh, yeah. They serve pretty much anything you can imagine,” Jenny laughs.

“But what was that kid even doing here, in The Land of Monsters?” You ask. “Isn’t it just for, like… monsters?”

“Well, sometimes, when a brat is as bad as, say, your little brother, their parents send them here for a few months to be properly ‘disciplined’,” Jenny explained. “It’s not a nice place for a brat to be, for sure! There’ll be exposed to their worst fears… eaten over and over and over again… basically tormented 24/7! They always end up becoming little angels, though. The brattiness gets scared right out of them.”

You shudder at the thought… and yet, the more you think about it, maybe some of them do have it coming. Like Dave, for example. You couldn’t help but like the thought of letting these monsters give him the discipline he needs, so he’ll stop being the utter, nightmarish thorn in your side that he always seems to be. Before you can contemplate this some more, your food’s finally ready! Jenny gets a more traditional meal laid out for her… while you have an entire table wheeled over to you, boasting the largest hamburger you’ve ever seen!

This time has to be at least a thousand pounds! Even for someone of your sheer size, it was definitely a filling meal! However, the more you smelled and analyzed it, the more you learned why it was called the landfill burger. Pulling the buns back, the burger was completely full of rancid garbage and rotten food! The stench was absolutely overwhelming! “Jenny! Is this supposed to be food? It’s disgusting!”

“Oh, don’t be such a baby! Just give it a try,” she rolled her eyes as she chomped down on some weird french fries, which looked ominously finger-shaped. “Trust me, now that you’re a monster, you’re gonna find this sort of food delicious!” You’re about to protest… but the awful stench of the burger is sort of appetizing for some reason. And the more you look at all the garbage filling it, the more your stomach starts to growl…

Eventually, you work up the courage to take a bite… only to smile as the flavor delights your tastebuds! Sure, it wasn’t as tasty as Dave was… but it was still the second tastiest thing you’ve ever eaten! “Mmmm! This IS pretty good!” You smile, chewing and swallowing your meal before going in for another bite. You were soon chomping happily away at the burger, enjoying the new flavor!

Meanwhile, Dave’s struggles intensified as he was covered in rancid, disgusting garbage inside your stomach! But it’s not like you cared about that. In fact, back when you were a human, you were used to how bratty Dave was… but now that you’re a monster, it’s starting to make you angrier and angrier to think about. How DARE he be so rude, so inconsiderate, so selfish all the time? It was almost like your natural monster instincts were driving you to want to punish the brat! So, covering him in garbage inside your stomach was immensely cathartic to you.

Soon, the burger was gone, and your stomach was now a lot fuller… and a lot grosser. You let out a satisfied sigh as you rubbed your scaly gut, your tongue hanging from the side of your maw. Now that you’ve finished dinner, what’s next?
15131122.title: Fine Dining

choices: Swallow the harpy!
Try to flee from this realm!
151311222.content:
Normally, you’d be too self-conscious… but here in The Land of Monsters, you have no hesitations letting out a satisfied belch as you walk out of the restaurant. After all, most of the monsters around here seem to pretty gassy after a good meal, and they don’t bother to hide it. Now that you’re full, though, one question lingers on your mind. “Hey…” You glance at Jenny, your massive wings coming unfurled. “Do you… do you think I could fly with these things?”

These new wings of yours are big, but you’re not sure they’re big enough to carry your massive form. Still, Jenny just rolls her eyes. “Well, duuuuuh! A dragon that can’t even fly… why, that’d be a sorry sight!” She said. “Go ahead and stretch your wings while you have ‘em, buddy. I’ll wait for you right here by the restaurant.” You were a little nervous as you trotted away, preparing to fly. You have no idea how flying works! What if you just immediately fell into a building or something and got into huge trouble?

Still, you couldn’t chicken out now! You closed your eyes and held your breath… before taking a big flap of your wings! You let out a little gasp as they propel you into the air! However, even though you’ve never flown before, your dragon instincts kick in immediately, and you start flapping yours wings until you’re hovering in the air. You let out a little, relieved chuckle, realizing you’re really flying for the first time! You hover there for a while, flapping your wings while you build up your courage… before lifting yourself into the sky!

It was a little nerve-wracking, flying so far from the ground. Even with your thick scales, if you fell from this height, you’d get seriously hurt! Still, at the same time, it was extremely liberating. I mean, who doesn’t want to be able to fly whenever they want, wherever they want? You were pretty much living the dream! Now that you got an aerial view of The Land of Monsters, you were starting to learn a lot about this place.

It seemed the whole ‘land’ was just a massive, gothic city built on a big, flat hunk of rock. The rest of the realm was just a hazy red void, stretching on infinitely. You were fascinated by the sight, wondering how exactly this realm came to be, and what its history was. As you hovered there, however, you were suddenly distracted by a low voice. “You’re really bad at flying, pal!”

Before you know it, a harpy lady’s landed on your back, sitting on your shoulders! She was about 7 feet tall, which still paled in comparison to you. You blushed at her teasing, as she giggled. “It’s… it’s my first time…” You whimpered.

“Whaaat? A dragon that’s never flown before?” She laughed. “Never thought I’d see the day…”

“No! It’s not that! It’s just...” You paused, wondering if you should tell her this, before giving into the humiliation. “This… this is only my first day as a dragon. I was only transformed an hour ago…”

Suddenly, the harpy’s mood soured. She hopped off your back, flapping your wings as she hovered in the air in front of you. “Oh. I see Jenny’s up to her old tricks again,” she scowled. “You know, transformed or not, HUMANS aren’t allowed in The Land of Monsters without the express approval of the queen! Which I’m 99% certain you don’t have. So I’m gonna turn you in, and then you’re gonna be sorry, brat~” She stuck her tongue out at you, before flying off.

Your heart leaped in your chest! You didn’t know being here was illegal! Were you going to end up like that boy you saw in the restaurant… just being constantly tormented by gross, powerful monsters? A fight-or-flight response kicked in as the harpy started to soar away, as you tried to figure out how you were going to avoid getting thrown into some sort of monster jail...

Meanwhile, a storm seems to be brewing in the scarlet sky above...
151311222.title: Fly around the realm and do some sightseeing!

choices: Explore deeper into the cave system
Making it up to the duo for eating them
1513112221.content:
Your heart was practically pumping out of your chest! If she turned you in for trespassing, would you suffer the same fate that boy from before was… being constantly tormented by every monster in the realm, without relief? Worse, since you weren’t sent here for a specific amount of time, did that mean they’d be able to keep you here… forever? That thought chilled you to your very bones! You knew you had to find a way out of this situation… but how? You considered fleeing… but then, another part of you demanded you prevent the harpy from ratting you out in the first place.

The harpy was flying luxuriously through the air… until she suddenly let out a bird-like screech as she felt your massive, scaly hand wrap around her! She was letting out angry little shouts as you held her up to your scaly face. “H-hey! What are you doing? Let go of me, you big stupid lizard!” As you glanced at her, wondering what to do next… your stomach growled once more, despite already being filled to the brim. You suppose you do, indeed, have one safe place to keep her. She let out a squeal as you slid open your massive jaws. “No! Don’t you dare!”

“I’m really sorry…” You whimper… before unceremoniously stuffing the bird woman into your jaws! She immediately tries to get up and hop out, but you smack your jaws shut before she can, sealing her inside your maw completely. You push her around your maw with your tongue for a while as she squirms and wriggles, trying your best to maneuver her into a good position to be swallowed down. Eventually, she slid to the back of your tongue, pressed against the back of your throat… and despite her efforts to hold onto your tongue, your powerful throat pulls her down all the same.

You let out a groan as you feel that squirming bulge slip down your scaly throat, before she disappears completely into your massive belly, getting squeezed in with all the horrible garbage in there. “Oh no, oh no…” You whimper, contemplating the situation. “Now I’m REALLY in trouble!” Trespassing was bad enough… but eating one of the monsters here? Now you DEFINITELY couldn’t get caught! If they caught you eating one of their own kind, you couldn’t even imagine the sorts of horrors they’d subject you to! … although, after knowing that monsters like to eat kids so much, being able to eat a monster as payback was kind of cathartic.

Still, adrenaline was rushing through your veins as you start to fly again, heading back towards that restaurant. You have the diner in your sights as you draw near. “G-gotta find Jenny. She’ll know what to- YIPE!” Your heart leaps as your ears are wracked by the boom of thunder, as a massive, red lightning bolt slams into the restaurant right before your eyes, causing a huge explosion! You look up, and notice that that ominous red storm is in full force… and you can hear similarly explosive lightning cracking all over the city! “Oh crap! Ohhh crap!”

You turn around, seeing the storm rain lightning down on the little city beneath you. Building after building seemed to be destroyed by the onslaught from the skies! “Oh my God…!” You mutter to yourself, wondering just what kind of storm this could possibly be. You wonder if being up so high makes you a target… but it was too late to fly back now. “Auuugghhh!” You let out a pained cry as one of those lightning bolts cracks right into your back, your entire body tensing up as a strange, overpowering energy shoots through you!

It doesn’t actually hurt you… instead, it just drains you of your energy. Still, you’re panicking as you’re sent flying down to Earth, without any energy left to beat your wings. All you can do is let out a terrified roar and brace yourself for the impact! All you can see is the ground looming every nearer with every passing moment… and, in the next moment, darkness…

…

… “Get UP, you big idiot!” Your slumber is interrupted by the feeling of tiny hands beating along your side, along with the sound of your brother’s voice. You let out a groan, clutching your head with a clawed hand, groaning as a headache wracks you. You felt yourself lying on some cold, cave floor, hearing what sounded like muffled rain and thunder outside. Your huge eyes lazily slide open… only to see Dave and that harpy, still covered in garbage, looking down at you angrily.

You let out a yelp as Dave reached forward and poked you in the eye! You immediately reared back, clutching your eye with a claw. “THAT’S for eating me and covering me with garbage, you shithead!” He loudly protested. You sighed, guessing you probably had that one coming. Still, you were wondering just what on Earth was going on! Looking around, you seemed to be in some type of subterranean cavern, that storm still raging outside. Strange, exotic glowing flora covered the cavern, and bioluminescent streams ran through its chambers.

Sighing, the harpy rolled her eyes and stepped forward to explain things to you. “Look, pal. When you crashed, you smashed into the ground SO hard that you ended up burrowing into this little underground cave system here,” she grumbled. “Probably a good thing, really. I’ve never seen a soul storm this bad!”

You gazed down at the two of them with a thousand questions flying through your head… one chief among them. “How did you two…?”

“... escape from that PUTRID stomach of your’s? Well, while you were unconscious, crawling up your gullet was a simple enough task,” the harpy gagged at the memory of being trapped in your grimy gut. “Now, you BETTER not have been planning to digest us in there, or I swear-!”

“N-no! Of course not! I would never!” You stuttered, shaking your head. You take a moment to try and calm yourself down, glancing around the cave. It seems like you were going to be stuck in here for the time being, while that ‘soul storm’ raged outside. You had no idea what it was, but it seemed that rain and lightning drastically drained people’s energy for some reason, and that lightning was able to level buildings in a single crack. You can’t imagine how much property damage was being done! You hope nobody’s gotten hurt.

Now it’s all a matter of what to do while you wait it out in this cavern...
1513112221.title: Swallow the harpy!

choices: You easily find Jenny
Your babysitter is nowhere to be found
15131122212.content:
You glance down at the two, still grimacing at you. You felt really bad, “Look I’m sorry. I didn’t mean it.” Dave simply growled at you, “You didn’t mean it, huh? Then why’d you eat me and keep me in your gut for so long?” You grimaced back at him, “Because you brought up mom and dad, you jerk!” Dave spouted, “So?” You turned your attention towards the Harpy. The more you thought about it… Dave still kind of deserved to be eaten. He was an evil little brat, and he definitely had it coming to him. The thought crossed your mind once again of leaving him here for a few months to be tormented by the residents of The Land of Monsters.

You tried to put on your best ‘puppy dog eyes’ and said to the Harpy, “Look, I’m really sorry for that. Is there anyway I could make it up to you?” The Harpy grinned, “Actually there is. Once we find your sitter and she turns you back into a human… I get to eat you.” You were shocked, “What? No way!” The harpy grimaced, “Then good luck finding her in the first place… let alone your way back home.” You turn back outside to see the storm had died down, and strangely enough, the buildings that were knocked down were… rebuilding themselves. You turn back to the Harpy with a look of worry on your snout, “Fine, you’ve got a deal.” The Harpy licked her lips and rubbed her belly, “Wonderful. Follow me, kids.” As the Harpy walks out of the mouth of the cave you and Dave follow her.
15131122212.title: Making it up to the duo for eating them

choices: Tell him the truth, you’re trespassing
Lie and tell him your parents sent you two here
1513112222.content:
Your heart sank as the harpy woman flew off into the night. You were too new to flying and too clumsy with your wings to follow her. You had to find Jenny and get out of here. You quickly spot the clown and swoop down to her, your landing shaking the ground near her, “Hey kid, what’s the rush?” You grimace at her, “I didn’t know being here was illegal!? Change me back and bring us home!” Jenny rolled her eyes, “Alright, fine. Kill joy! Come here.” Jenny walked under your stomach and gives you a swift punch in the gut. You cough and heave until… BBBWWAARRFFFF! You burp up your little brother, he’s dazed and covered in dragon drool and chewed-up garbage.

You hear Jenny chanting some words before you feel yourself shrinking back down to your normal size. Your scales soften and smooth back into skin, your horns descend back into your head, your wings get sucked back in your back along with your tail, and your claws revert to fingernails. Soon enough you’re back to being a young, human teen. You huff and puff from the odd experience, now feeling weird being human again. You turn to Jenny and smile, “Thanks.” Before Jenny could bring you two home you feel a huge clawed hand wrap around you. You and your little brother are hoisted up to the scowling snout of a dragon, dressed in a uniform similar to how human police dress, he must be an officer. The dragon snorted in your face and talked in a deep, rumbling voice, “Well, well, well, what are you two boys doing here? Did your parents send you here for punishment?”

You stumble on your words, trying to think of something to say. The huge, scaly face of the giant dragon terrified you. Is that what you used to look like? You smile nervously at the huge beast, “W-well the thing is sir, our babysitter was this shape-shifting clown who…” The dragon roared, “What shape-shifting clown?” You were able to pull your arm out from the tight grip of the dragon and point down to the sidewalk, “Right there!” When you look down you almost scream, Jenny was gone. The dragon rumbled, “I’ll ask again, are you here because your parents are punishing you or do I have to book you two for trespassing?”
1513112222.title: Try to flee from this realm!

choices: Dave gets slurped up into Sylvia’s body
You help pull Dave from Sylvia’s grasp
Sylvia wants you to join in on the hugs
152.content:
As you opened the door you were flabbergasted at what you saw. A tall pink woman was standing in the doorway, nearly eight feet in height, she towered over you. She had thick hips, a large bubble butt, and round breasts covered by a bra and a tight-fitting pair of shorts. The weird part is that her bra and shorts seemed to be apart of her body… and her whole body seemed to be made of a translucent, pink, jello-like slime. Before you could say anything the slime woman cooed, “Oh, aren’t you the cutest, little human.” She knelt down and pinched your cheek, leaving a slimy residue. You asked, staring up at her, “Um… are you the babysitter?” The slime woman giggled, “Well of course I am, I’m Sylvia by the way.”

You sized her up with a quizzical look, “But you’re a-“ Sylvia cut you off, “Slime monster!” You nodded, “Uh… yeah.” Sylvia giggled again, “Aw, so cute. Don’t’cha know that monsters exist kid? We’re all over the place. I mean, all ya’ gotta do is look under your bed and in your closet.” So you weren’t crazy when you told your parents there was a monster under your bed when you were eight. Sylvia gestured for you to let her in and you did. She stepped into the house and looked around the place while you shut the door. It was shocking, a monster for a babysitter. Sylvia then stepped into the living room where you’re brother was playing videogames, “Hey there, little guy, wanna hug?” Dave turned around and sneered, “Who the hell are you, lady?”

Sylvia smiled, “I’m your babysitter, silly. I’m Sylvia, I’m a slime monster!” Dave saw the slimy texture of her body and groan, “Ew, gross.” Despite this, your little brother’s protests did not break Sylvia’s good mood, “Aw, you’ll get used to it, I promise.” Sylvia knelt down and hugged Dave tight, he protested, “Hey, get offa me you freak.” Sylvia simply cooed and hugged him tighter. Dave kicked and squirmed as he started to sink into Sylvia’s jelly-like body, “Hey stop, you’re eating me!” Sylvia giggled, “No I’m not, it’s called a hug!” You wanted to stop this but thought it would be the perfect revenge for all the headache’s your little brother has given you.
152.title: Sylvia the Slime

choices: "I'm in the mood for more snuggles!"
"Want to play a game?"
Reader's Choice
1521.content:
With a loud slurping noise, Dave is absorbed into Sylvia's slimy body after several moments of struggling. If you look closely, you can still see your brother's outline, still struggling inside her semi-translucent form.

Sylvia turns to you with a big smile. "Well, he was quite tasty! And it's kind of feels nice to feel him squirming inside me." You chuckle nervously. Sure, your brother deserved some payback, but on the other hand, you kind of hope he's okay. If nothing else, so you don't get in trouble when your parents return.

"Um, Sylvia? Is my bother going to be alright?"

She giggles, causing her whole body to jiggle a bit. "Of course! He can still breathe and everything. Eventually he'll get tired and fall asleep. In the meantime..."
1521.title: Dave gets slurped up into Sylvia’s body

choices: Sylvia eventually lets you both out
While you’re both tucked away Sylvia decides to exercise
15211.content:
You were basking in the glow of the moment, your little terror of a brother finally getting what he deserved. Then, once Sylvia said her last sentence your blood ran cold. Before you could run away or look for a safe place to hide, Sylvia was on you. She wrapped you gooey arms around you and for someone made out of goo, she had a very strong grip on you, nearly crushing you in her gooey embrace. She snuggled up against you, “Children are so cute. I love hugging you little guys.” Was she completely unaware that hugging you so close basically makes her suck you both into her? She cooed and giggled as she nuzzled you, guess she was clueless.

Soon enough you found yourself falling victim to what happened to your little brother, you were sinking into her gelatin like body, “Hey, let me go. Please. I don’t wanna go inside you.” Sylvia was oblivious, “Such a cute boy.” Soon enough your head was slurped up, your torso, your arms and legs. You were slurped in just like your brother, and Sylvia let’s out a deafening belch, “Excuse me, you two must be giving me gas.” The slime girl giggles cutely as you both wiggle as much as you can in her slimy body, trying to alert her to let you out. You and your brother now made an impressive bulge in her belly. Sylvia kicked her feet up on the living room table and lounged on the couch, letting out another belch, “I don’t get what all those monsters complain about? Looking after human kids is so easy.”
15211.title: "I'm in the mood for more snuggles!"

choices: Let's get to know each other
Something else
15213.content: She said in the meantime..."
15213.title: Reader's Choice

choices: Let's get something to eat
Something else
152132.content: She said in the meantime
152132.title: Something else

choices: Your little brother keeps annoying her
You both decide on pizza
You already had dinner and offer to play games with Nancy
153.content:
You open the front door, annoyed expression on your face from your annoying little brother’s antics. You try to brighten up though for the babysitter, “Uh, hi. It’s nice to meet you Ms.-“ A scream of terror freezes in your throat. Standing on your doorstep… well… coiled on your doorstep was a huge Naga woman. A huge, ten foot tail, twice as thick as your own body and covered in thick muscles and green scales made up her lower half, while her upper half had pale, scaly skin, with a light green complexion. She wore a black t-shirt over her upper-half, with straight black hair running down her back. Her face wore a stern and annoyed look, her face looked fairly human save for the slit reptilian eyes and the large fangs in her mouth.

The Naga woman groaned, “You’ve gotta be kidding me! Stuck babysitting humans again! I can’t believe I quit my librarian job for this. Alright, out of the way kid. I need some room here!” The huge snake lady shooed you out of the way as she slithered into your house and shut the door. Your brother yelled from the living room, “Is that the sitter?” You yell back, getting more annoyed, “Yeah Dave.” Not looking all too pleased herself, the Naga starts to slither her way into the living room. Dave notices the large shadow cast around him and he turns around and squeals in fear, throwing his game controller at her, “What is that thing? Help! Mommy!”

The Naga growled and grabbed Dave’s wrist, “Listen you little twerp, I’m your babysitter. Name’s Nancy, and unless you want an express trip to my belly you’re both gonna behave, am I clear?” You entered the room and obediently nodded at her request. Dave was not so cooperative, “Oh yeah, well if you eat us our mom and dad will find out and then you’ll be in big trouble.” Nancy grimaced, “I’m in charge here kid, I’ll punish you however I see fit. Now what do you two want for dinner… or am I gonna have to TURN you both into dinner?” Nancy folded her arms, looking down at you both with a stern glare.
153.title: Nancy the Naga

choices: "How about you rub my belly while you're standing there?"
"Off to bed, now!"
"What did you want to have for dinner?"
1531.content:
Your little brother was always a slow learner, especially when it came to knowing when people had enough of his shenanigans. So you weren't very surprised when he continued to mouth off to your babysitter. "If you're a snake, you probably eat rats and other gross things, so whatever you're serving, I'm not eating!"

Nancy glared at him. She had warned him not to push her, and he didn't listen, as usual. "That's it! Don't say I didn't warn you, pipsqueak!" Quick as lightning, Nancy lunged forward and wrapped her long, serpentine body around Dave. "Hey! Get off of me!" He cried, but his plea fell on deaf ears as she began to squeeze, not enough to crush him, but enough to make him pay for running his mouth.

Then, Nancy opened her mouth wider and wider, until she could swallow your brother whole, and that's exactly what she did, engulfing his head and shoulders in her jaws, before sucking up the rest of him like spaghetti. Tilting her head back, she let gravity help her swallow, with you watching as the bulge in her body that was your little brother slid down her throat and into her stomach. You could hear muffled screams and cries for help coming from the bulge in her belly.

Turning to you, she growls "Am I gonna get any more sass tonight?" You quickly shake your head. "Good." You turns to look at the struggling lump in her snakelike body. "Now you listen to me, runt. If you behave until I leave, I'll spit you back out later. You hear me?" She could only assume Dave heard her, because his voice was smothered by her scaly skin.

"Now then..."
1531.title: He just can't take a hint

choices: She wants to play a game of hide and seek
You start to chat with her about monsterkind
15311.content:
You gulped as she asked you that question. Although you were kind of glad Dave was getting punished for being a brat, you were a bit shell-shocked that he was INSIDE a snake monster’s belly. You nervously nodded, “Um… sure.” You silently walked over to her as she slithered over to the couch and sprawled herself out, enjoying the fullness of her meal. A nasty belch escaped her lips, “Oops, excuse me. Kids make me gassy.”

You made your way to where your brother’s bulge was in her huge, thick tail and started rubbing it. This made Dave start to squirm again, clearly not knowing what was happening but you shushed him, “Hey, chill out in there. You want her to barf you up don’t you?” This made Dave simmer down as you continued to circularly rub the large snake’s gut. You could hear Nancy moan in pleasure, “Mmm, maybe babysitting humans wasn’t such a bad thing after all.”

You nervously look up to see a big, toothy grin on her face, her serpent tongue lazily hanging out from the side of her mouth. You really hoped you wouldn’t end up seeing that mouth up close. Nancy readjusted herself to sitting up as she looked down at you with a smug smirk, “You’re pretty good at belly rubs. Thanks for that kid. Now that it’s just you and me, what should we do for the rest of the night?”
15311.title: "How about you rub my belly while you'r...

choices: A group of more nagas
A group of all different monsters
15312.content:
"Off to bed, now!"

It wasn't even eight thirty, and nowhere near your normal bedtime, but you were smarter than your little brother, and really didn't want to find out what the inside of a giant snake-lady looked like, so you didn't dare argue. You quickly ran upstairs, put on your pajamas and brushed your teeth.

As you were getting ready to lay down, you overheard Nancy talking on the phone downstairs. "Yeah, it's me. I'm stuck looking after a couple human kids again. I know, it sucks, tell me about it. I ended up eating one because he wouldn't shut his mouth. Anyway, I was thinking, how about you and the others come on over and we'll have a little party? The brat's parents won't be back until after midnight."

About half an hour later, you heard the doorbell ring again. You peeked out the crack of your door, which was at the top of the stairs, and saw Nancy answer it, to let in...
15312.title: When the Parents Are Away, The Snake Will Play

choices: You slyly creep downstairs, hoping not to be spotted
A naga is slithering her way upstairs towards your bedroom
153121.content:
When Nancy opens the front door she is greeted by a group of other female nagas. They all squeal happily and hug each other, happy to be reunited with their friends. Nancy gestured for them to enter the house as the all slithered inside. There were tons of them, how many people… uh… nagas did she invite? Nancy sighed with relief, “And I thought my night was gonna be ruined by this babysitting gig.” They all convened in the living room so they were out of your line of sight but you could still hear them.

Apparently one of them was looking at your family photos, “So which one of these twerps did you eat again?” Nancy giggled and replied, “The little one. I gotta say, humans are a pain to babysit but at least they make for good snacks.” All the nagas laughed at that. One of her friends asked, “You think they got any booze in this house?” Nancy replied, “I wouldn’t doubt it. But their bottles are all human-sized. Probably only get us a little buzzed.” One of her friends replied, “Better than nothing. Let’s get this party started, get some drinks and some music going.”

You duck behind your bedroom door a bit when you notice Nancy slithering across the main downstairs hall to the kitchen. You could hear her sifting through cabinets while in the living room you could hear someone messing around with a remote and then you heard the loud, booming sound of EDM music fill your house. You certainly weren’t much of a fan of Nancy, granted she did punish your brother, but she seemed pretty mean from the get-go. Maybe if you made it to the house phone in the kitchen and call your parents, that’ll force the naga’s to scatter and force Nancy to barf up your brother and leave. But then again, you didn’t want to risk getting eaten yourself.
153121.title: A group of more nagas

choices: A werewolf woman
A tipsy dragoness
153122.content:
Nancy opened the door and happily greeted a huge mob of monsters awaiting on your front porch. Initially you were awestruck, seeing all of these mythological creatures that you thought weren’t real enter your house. There was a basilisks, werewolves, vampires, kitsune, dragons, trolls, ogres, gnolls, cat people, and so many more. Then you realized, you didn’t have to watch a ton of high school party movies to figure this out, they were going to wreck your house… and Nancy was probably going to blame it all on you and your little brother.

You could hear the opening and shutting of your parent’s liquor cabinet, and out of nowhere you heard EDM music blast over your dad’s home stereo system, bumping the bass-heavy music all throughout the house. You grimaced a bit. You knew she wanted you to go to bed so she could throw a party… but how did she expect you to sleep through this!? You had to come up with some sort of plan to put a stop to this. Maybe if you called your parents that would get the monsters to flee, but your cellphone ran out of battery an hour ago, you accidentally left your charger downstairs, and the nearest landline was in the kitchen.

You gulp, not wanting to venture down into the literal sea of sweaty, partying monsters downstairs, but it seemed you had no choice unless you wanted to be grounded for the rest of your life. You slowly creaked your door open, you were sort of glad the loud music was playing, no one could hear you over it. You slowly crept your way down the staircase. So far, so good. You tip-toe your way around some oblivious, drunk monsters until you accidentally bump into someone. Someone big! Really big! Your blood runs cold as you hear a female voice happily coo, “Oh, hey there. I didn’t know Nancy had party snacks here too.” You fearfully look up and stare into the glowing, hungry eyes of…
153122.title: A group of all different monsters

choices: You introduced yourself.
You asked her if she really was hungry.
1531221.content:
She was about the same age as you were, and she looked... really beautiful.
You were like frozen, just from looking into her beautiful eyes. It seemed official.
You have fallen in love.
Like they say... love at first sight.
1531221.title: A werewolf woman

choices: She leaves the party and goes home... taking you with her!
Nancy finds out she ate you, and makes her spit you out!
She eventually just spits you out on her own.
1531222.content:
You stare up in awe at a massive, purple-scaled dragoness, whose tail was wrapped around a little plastic cup she was sipping from. She was so huge, she had to lean her head down lest her horns scrape against the ceiling… and from her tone, expression and mannerisms, she had already had a little too much to drink tonight. Hearing what she said, your heart dropped as you looked down at her massive scaly tummy, which swayed beneath her! She was even bigger than Nancy, so if that naga could swallow you up, this dragoness definitely could! “N-no! I’m not a… party snack!” You insist.

“Whaaat?” She giggled, visibly woozy as she looked down on you with a dopey, amused expression. She apparently can’t hear your tiny voice over the blaringly loud EDM.

“I said you’re not supposed to eat me!” You repeat, cupping your hands around your mouth as you shout out at the top of your lungs, hoping to clear up this misunderstanding before it’s too late.

“I’m not supposed to GREET you?” She tilted her head, visibly confused by this. “Well, why not? What’s wrong with saying hello?”

“No!” You crossed your arms, visibly annoyed by the continuing misunderstanding. “I said 'EAT me'!”

“EAT you?” She laughed, a little surprised. “Well, you’re being awfully insistent, little man… but sure, if you say so!” Before you could respond, she had one of her massive claws gently wrapped around your torso, easily hoisting you into the air with her terrifying strength! Your heart dropped as you found yourself being dangled over her massive maw, and looming, cavernous throat! Her insides seemed to be all purple, notably, just like her scales.

“Wait! No, no, no, no-“ You screamed at the top of your lungs, but it was too little, too late. In another moment, the dragoness simply drops your tiny body into her massive, powerful maw, snapping her jaws shut to seal you inside. You let out a frightened whimper as her tongue pressed you against the roof of her mouth, then swished you around against her cheeks as she toyed with you in her maw. She smiled as she savored your delicious flavor! Just like the fairy tales and storybooks claimed, it seems kids really were a monster’s favorite food!

Soon, you were completely coaked in her thick, sticky, gross saliva, and her tongue was starting to press you towards her throat! You let out a nervous yelp, grabbing onto her uvula and hanging on for dear life… but that only caused her to gag, making you lose your grip, and immediately descend into her depths! Instead of squeezing around you like you expected a throat would, the dragoness’ throat was more like a water slide… you just slid down along the smooth, purple flesh at an incredible speed, before finally landing in her stomach proper!

“Oh! That really hit the spot!” She laughed, patting her massive, round belly, as she feels you slip easily inside. You really were just like a bite-sized treat to her; you were so small, you didn’t even make the tiniest of bulges in her belly. In fact, her stomach was incredibly roomy, so big you can stand up and walk around inside of her! Of course, it was hard to keep your balance, with her belly constantly swaying beneath the dragoness as she walked around.

Immediately upon landing in her stomach, you start pressing against and kicking at the walls. “P-please! Let me out!” You cry, frightened. But unfortunately, her stomach walls were far too thick for you to be heard, and all your struggles amounted to was giving the dragoness a relaxing belly massage. Soon, you just tuckered yourself out, and just sat there in her tummy, leaned against a wall, thinking about this whole situation. It seems that she wasn’t going to digest you, at least… but it was still pretty gross and uncomfortable in here!

All you could do is sit back and wait it out, the EDM now just a very faint cacophony in the background, drowned out by the sound of her heartbeat and the gurgling of her stomach. Eventually, it started to seem rather relaxing in there. You ended up taking a nap in the dragoness’ stomach while the party resumed...
1531222.title: A tipsy dragoness

choices: Alexis wakes up and picks up
Looks like you’re bunking in a dragon gut tonight
15312221.content:
As time went on the dragoness forgot about you, too drunk to even remember ten minutes ago, let alone the kid she gobbled down over an hour ago. You forgot what was happening as well. In your slumber you dreamt of sailing there high seas for the first time, a dream that was assisted by the wet insides of the dragon belly and the sway of her gut. While the dragoness twerked and bounced her scaly butt to a bass-heavy EDM banger you dreamt of a dangerous hurricane on the horizon of your ship.

Eventually the party ended. All of Nancy’s monster friends went home. It was midnight. The kids parents wouldn’t be home until at least 1 a.m. maybe 2 a.m. Nancy stretched her arms and patted the bulge Dave made in her gut, “And a good night was had by all… well… at least us monsters. I don’t know about you kids. But you’re really only good at being monster snacks so… who really cares, am I right?” Nancy slithered up the stairs and opened the door to your bedroom, flicking on the light, “Hey kid, party’s over, you can wake back up now if you’d like.” The naga gasped when she realized you weren’t there. Nancy looked around in a panick. She bent over and wretched her stomach, barfing up Dave, waking him up from his stinky, wet slumber in her belly. Nancy shook Dave like a ragdoll, “Kid? Boy? Whatever your name is? Where is your brother?”

Dave choked, coughing up some of Nancy’s drool, “How should I know? You ate me.” Dave then sneered, “Looks like you’re… eating your words, huh?” Nancy growled and yelled, “Look, you’re brother is missing. If he were to leave, where would he go?” Dave shook his head, “My older brother wouldn’t leave the house. Mom and Dad taught us to always call them if there was an emergency at home.” Nancy nearly shouted in Dave’s ear, “Ok-alright-cool. So where would the phone be?” Dave replied coldly, “In the kitchen.” Nancy looked down the staircase and towards the kitchen realizing that was where the party was. There were no parents coming yet. Which means… one of her friends left with him!

She only had, at best, two or three hours until your parents got home, she couldn’t let your parents find out she wasn’t human, she’d never get a job here again, on top of that she had to find one of their kids, probably inside one of her friend’s stomachs. Nancy slapped her hands over her eyes and shrieked, “THIS! NIGHT! SUCKS!” Nancy’s near panic attack was interrupted by Dave’s snickering, “What are you laughing at your hairless rat!?” Dave giggled, “You’re the worst babysitter ever. You really suck at this.” Nancy scowled and before Dave knew it he was reintroduced to Nancy’s slimy mouth. The large naga popped him into her mouth like a piece of candy as he protested, bulging out her cheeks nicely. She tilted her head back and gulped, sending the boy down her bulging neck again and into her snake belly.

A satisfied belch escaped her lips as she patted the wiggling bulge under her scales, “Nothing like seconds, huh, little guy.” The naga pulled out her phone and started furiously calling up every friend she had in her phone book that she invited. Unfortunately, the dragoness that ate you was a friend of one of Nancy’s friends that dragged her along. Nancy slithered down the stairs and out into the night, diligently talking on her phone, “Hello, Jamie? It’s Nancy? Did you happen to see a human kid wandering around the party?”

Meanwhile, the tipsy dragoness had now become a plastered dragoness as she stumbled down the hallway of her apartment complex, Ghouls & Acres. She nearly tripped over herself, grabbing her doorknob for support. She belched, tasting it and smacking her lips she muttered, “Drunk food is… THA BEST FEWD!” The dragoness giggled to herself as it took her a good five minutes to fish her keys out of her butt-pocket, fit them into the door and jiggle the lock open. Once inside the drunk dragoness screamed into her empty apartment, “Home sweet home, BITCHES! Another killer party! Can’t wait for Jakes frat party tomorrow… ugh, then I gotta study for my Monster V.S. Human Political Science Exam… gross!”

The dragoness grabbed a large 64 oz. can of Coke, although it was rebranded for monsters as Croak! The huge reptile slumped herself onto her couch and turned her tv on. There was never anything good on at 12:30 a.m. but she channel surfed until she came upon on of those cheesy sitcoms ‘Honey, I Married A Monster’. The show was about some human man (played by a vampire actor) who unwittingly marries a crocodile woman. A huge croc woman steps into a kitchen set with a leash hanging between her lips while her human husband cooks and ogles her, “Honey! Did you eat the neighbor’s dog again?” A laugh track played as the croc woman shrugged, “Maybe.” The human husband scoffed at her, “Well that’s the fifth one this year.” A louder laugh track played. The croc shrugged again, seemingly chewing on whatever was in her mouth, “Beats the time I ate the neighbor’s son. He was real mad at me for that.”

The dragoness’ eyes widened and she put a scaled paw on her ample chest, “Oh my god, me too. That’s so relatable. I still can’t believe that creep had the nerve to yell at me for swallowing his son whole. Like these are some real first world monster problems. UURRRPP!” She gave her belly a slap as she cracked the soda can open and started downing it. In your dream, your ship had been wrecked and you were up to your neck in sea-water, with only a few scrambled pieces of driftwood as your life raft. In reality your unconscious form was floating in a small pool of beer, vodka, and now soda at the bottom of a dragon’s stomach. The belly slap and the soda trickling onto your hair woke you up, “huh, wha… HEY! HEY! WHERE AM I? LET ME OUT! LET ME GO!” You scream as you kick and punch against the slick, purple belly walls.

The dragoness burped a few more times and even let out a nasty fart or two. She clutched her fat, scaly belly, “Hey, calm down in there kid. I’m trying to watch tv!” You shriek, “I wanna go home!” The dragoness rolled her eyes, grumbling, drumming her claws on her belly, “Geez kid, you act like you’ve never spent a night in a monster’s belly before?” You shout back, “Cause I’ve never been eaten by a monster before. Now take me home, before I call the cops.” The dragoness giggled, slapping her gut, “I don’t you’ll get good reception in my belly. Now if you’ll excuse me, a girl’s gotta get her beauty sleep.” You continue to scream and protest, which is only met with an uncaring yawn and a thunderous fart. The dragoness snuggles up on her couch with a nice corny tv show on and a belly full of beer, vodka, soda and kid. You slosh around in her stomach for some time but soon hear her start to snore.

After about thirty minutes of nothing but her heartbeat, her gurgling belly, and her obnoxious snoring, you hear a cellphone ringtone. It was the dragoness’ cellphone she left on her coffee table. The vibrating and ring stopped. The dragoness’ voice spoke the voice message, “Hey, it’s ya’ home-girl Alexis, I’m either partying, on the toilet, or ignoring you. Leave a message if you’re not my ex.” The message rang and Nancy’s panicked voice could be heard, “Alex, it’s Nancy. Did you see a kid wandering around the party? I need to find him, call me!” As soon as the message recording stopped the phone vibrated again, Nancy was calling a second time. Does this wake your dragon captor up or will she let it go to voicemail again?
15312221.title: She leaves the party and goes home... taking yo...

choices: You join your little brother in her belly as the party rages on
Nancy forces you to be the personal party servant for all her guests
15312222.content:
The drunk dragoness stumbles around the party for the next fifteen minutes. She drinks some more shots, showering you in gin. She dances around, sloshing you all around her gut. And she socializes with other monsters as they tease you and poke her wiggling gut. Eventually the dragoness catches sight of Nancy slither towards the kitchen and squeals, “Nancy!” The naga turned and smiled, “Alexis! You made it!” The two reptiles slithered up to each other and hugged, “You look great Alexis.” The dragoness nodded, “You do too Nancy, you’re super hot.” Nancy waved a hand in front of her nose, “P.U. Alexis have you been drinking? Your breath smells worse than a gnoll.”

The dragoness chuckled and put her claws on her hips, “First of all Nancy, that’s racist. Secondly…” She clicks her claws and sha-shays her hips side to side, in her drunk, slurred voice she giggles, “Ya’ girl’s been getting’ down, partyin’, drinkin’, met a hot vampire named Vex, and I even gotta snack!” She pressed out her wiggling, screaming belly as it happily wobbled about. A werewolf frat guy leaned over, poking her gut, “That a kid in there?” Alexis smiled and nodded, the werewolf giving her a hi-five, “That’s what I’m talking about. Just snackin’ and drinkin’. We were gonna hit up the scout camp grounds for a late night snack after the party.” Alexis clawed her paws together, burping in the werewolf’s face, “Oh I… UUURRRPP… LOVE scouts! They go so good with marshmellows.”

Alexis turned back to a grimacing Nancy, “Yo Nance, what’s wrong?” Nancy pointed at her squirming gut, “Is that who I think it is?” Alexis smiled drunkenly, “Uhhh, Prince Albert in a Can?” Nancy swiftly punched Alexis in the gut, making the dragoness keel over and start to cough and hack. It didn’t help that she was already tipsy and woozy. The dragoness craned her neck and barfed you up. You were dragged up her waterslide-like esophagus and rode a wave of belly slime and booze to your freedom and you were hacked up onto the floor. Nancy put a hand on Alexis’ shoulder, “I’m sorry girl, but I have to handle this.”

You tried to run away but the slick dragon saliva that coated you made it hard to move without slipping on yourself. You’re all tired out from your protests and slowly drift off to sleep in a small sea of sloshing booze and dragon drool. The drunk dragoness happily stumbles and fumbles her way through the party. She takes shot after shot, going harder than she ever had before. She was on her… one hundred and tenth shot? She lost count at ninety-one, oh well, dragons were big monsters, they could handle a lot more liquor than your average monster, let alone your average human. So did the rest of the party guests, making them way more rambunctious, some started wrecking the house. Whether it was on purpose or by accident since this house was not built for monster use, the crowd started tearing into the place… literally. Claws slashed into couches and beds, elbows obliterated family pictures, paws stomped into furniture, drool and slime got everywhere.

The dragoness marched upstairs in search of a bathroom, her stomach a bit upset. Someone ended up bumping into her, the motion of her getting pushed and her gut wobbling made the dragoness loose it. She was going to vomit! She bent over and barfed. A torrent like stream of dragon drool and alcohol flooded out of her maw. You too were pulled up her esophagus and awoken from your sleep. BWARLF! You were spat onto the floor. The dragoness got back up, paying you no mind as she wiped strands of drool from her snout and continued on her search for a bathroom and a towel to clean herself up.

You have to stop this party, or your parents are going to blame it all on you. You run around screaming, “Everybody get out. This is my house. You can’t stay here you need to leave.” You run into your parents room, there are monsters playing spin the bottle, taking shots, and you notice a gnoll woman walking out of your parents bathroom waving a paw in front of her snout, “I wouldn’t go in there,” she cackles. You yell at the top of your lungs, “Everybody out! Now!”

This gets the attention of all the monsters in your parent’s bedroom. They all glare at you, making you feel small like a mouse. One basilisk guy smirks at you, showing off his razor-sharp teeth, folding his scaly arms he scoffs at you, “And what if we don’t?” A vampire girl smirks at you, “I think the kid’s just got a sour attitude, let’s cheer him up.” A werewolf slams the door and locks it shut as the vampire girl grabs your wrist and drags you further into the crowded bedroom, “How about we play a game? Meanwhile, Dave has found himself in some sort of nightmare! Instead of spitting him out, though… your head drops as you hear a loud gulp, and the bulge in her cheeks disappeared, replaced with a similarly sized bulge in her throat! She let's out a satisfied belch, patting her gut with a hand as she feels the boy land in her stomach proper.

“You… you ate him…” You stuttered, never witnessing such a sight in your life. Not only did she eat him, but she swallowed him… whole! And with complete ease, too, like your brother was just some bite-sized snack!

“Why, yes I did! And I’ve still got plenty of room in here,” she smirked, poking her belly and making it obvious you could join him in there. “So while you’re under my care, I expect you to be in tip-top shape! Capiche?” You nod eagerly, horrified at the thought of ending up inside her huge, gurgling gut. Even now, you were fighting back tears, thinking that was the last time you’ll ever see your brother again. “Good boy! Now, your brother, on the other hand, deserves a time-out, I think. How about an hour?” She says, walking over and lounging on the couch, which creaks beneath her weight.

You blink, a little confused. What did she mean, a ‘time-out’? “So, you’re not going to digest him?” You sheepishly ask, your voice almost a whisper.

She gives you a weird look. “What? No! Of course not. Why would I?” She says, as if that much was obvious. “I may be a little ‘intimidating’, but I ain’t a monster! Well… okay, I AM a monster, but not a MONSTER monster.” She pats her gut. “I just believe in good ol’ fashioned tough love, just like how all ogres raise their kids! "You mean... you're still up for it after..." She stammers, prompting you to laugh.

"Hah, parents embarrassing you happens in every reality it seems." You give her a knowing smile. Granted, if your parents walked in on this scenario they'd probably scream and run, but you could hardly blame them. It wasn't every day you found yourself snuggled up to an ogre, especially one as cute as Bell. "Now put me on top so I can return the favor."

Bell looked at you confused, but for a laugh decided to play along. She hoisted you up on top of her with ease, laying back and wondering what the hell this funny little man was up to. He shuffled around a bit on her belly, his wiggles feeling real nice against her greasy skin. He tried to get a bit close to her face, but his torso was getting wedged between her boobs and soon he couldn't advance any further.

"Are you feeling the love yet?" You said with a silly grin. Bell just shot you a confused look. "I'm smothering you beneath me as best I can, but I feel a little outclassed." Finally the ogre understood what you intended when you wanted to return the favor and she burst into laughter. Her whole body shook, sending you bouncing up and down atop the fatty surface. As this hilarious earthquake came to a close she wrapped you in a loving embrace, pulling you up until your groin was wedged between her boobs and your mouth was back in kissing distance. She plastered her thick lips against your face for another breathtaking kiss. You held on to her as best you could as you felt your love for her growing. Though it wasn't just a metaphor. You felt your pants strain slightly as they were forced to conceal a small bulge now. Hopefully Bell hadn't noticed it was your turn to be embarrassed now.

After another lengthy kiss her lips detach with a wet pop and she looks at you amorously. What did Bell have in mind next?
155113111221.title: A mostly unawkward approval
