1551131112212.content:
You feel Bell's body relax again after that overwhelming kiss. If she could feel your bulge poking against her boobs she sure wasn't showing it. You quietly thank whoever will listen for that, as you're uncomfortable thinking about what things she might do to you if she discovered you were such a pervert. Then again, given how romantic this was feeling, she might well react by taking it up a notch and putting you between her legs. You're not sure which prospect is more terrifying. You look up to her to see if your daydreaming has raised any curious eyebrows, but it seems like the ogre is lost in thought as well.

"Whatcha thinking about?" You ask carefully.

"Do you think I'd be able to live in your world?" She asks jokingly.

"Well, you wouldn't fit in any house, but I suppose there's some woods close by. People see weird things in there all the time and after what I've seen today, I can honestly believe you wouldn't be the first monster to live there."

"Hmmm... These woods... Are they close to your house?" Bell's expression went from teasing to intrigued as she waited for your answer.

"Oh yeah, we live right on the edge of town. The woods are literally just outside our back yard." You reply enthusiastically, not quite catching on to what she's referring to.

"So if some pretty ogre girl were to live in those woods, would you mind her sneaking into your yard and stealing you away for a few hours for cuddles and kisses?"

Finally the penny dropped and your felt a shiver run down your spine. She was serious about this, wasn't she? Including the part about abducting you out of your own house. You gulp as you imagine her reaching in through your bedroom window and grabbing you. You hastily stammer out a response. "Well... I would prefer it if they called ahead."

Bell burst out into giggles, causing you to bounce up and down on her jiggling chest once more. "Hehe, alright. I'll make sure me stealing you away fits in our schedules. Silliness aside, do you think I could manage it? Like... for real?"

You gulp, not wanting to insult her outdoor skills, but you had absolutely no frame of reference for how well she might do in this scenario. You decide that honesty is the best policy. "Well, I don't really know how outdoorsy you are, but I imagine you could handle it. There's a garbage dump a few streets away that you could probably sneak into for supplies. But I don't exactly live someplace tropical."

"Teehee, that's okay. I'll keep you warm." She illustrates her argument by pushing you between her boobs. Your whole torso was smothered between the two soft, fleshy walls. Her greasy skin smelled offputting, but you couldn't deny that it was comfortably warm. You smile awkwardly before continuing your train of thought.

"Then there's food and drink. I suppose the little creeks running through the forest can get you some clean water but when it comes to eating I've got no idea how to tackle that. The dump's got food on it, you could sneak in and steal people's trashcans, but fresh human food is gonna be hard. Because even with the best will in the world I'm afraid my efforts wouldn't amount to much compared to your big belly."

"Aw, you're so sweet." She squeezed her breasts together, intensifying their sweaty embrace. "But we ogres didn't get this big by being picky. I'll be able to handle myself. You should still bring something small to eat with you though, just for the taste." She hastily added that last line, salivating a little at the thought of fresh human food. Silence fell between the two of you, but you could see her busily thinking about something. You worry now that this was far more than a hypothetical situation. She really wanted to go through with it, didn't she? Were you that much of a catch that she was willing to give up the comforts of home just to squat in the woods?

"Let's not... uhm... do anything hasty here, shall we?" You stammer, but her mind seemed set.

"Oh, don't worry. I'm not gonna go live in the woods permanently. Just for a couple of weeks. It's like an exciting adventure! And you'll be involved too." She hugged you tightly before shuffling out of bed and onto her feet. With you still firmly wedged between her boobs she went downstairs to talk to Orna. She and Reekers were sitting on the living room couch. Dave was all but missing from the picture save for his feet poking out from underneath Orna's rear. She was taking this babysitting gig a bit too literal it seems. With all the composure she could manage Bell spoke up.

"Mom, dad, can I go on vacation into the human world for a few weeks? I promise I'll call you lots and I'll be out of sight. I just want to go out there and-"

"Is this about that boy you've got there?" Orna interjected with an amused smile.
1551131112212.title: She's happy to just cuddle and talk for a while

choices: It's getting late, you and Bell sleep together
You share an intimate moment before going to bed
Bell tells you she's feeling horny
15511311122123.content:
"A little" Bell grumbles, blushing brightly. Her parents look at eachother knowingly. Their daughter was smitten by the little man and wanted more time with him. It was adorable.

"As long as you take good care of yourself, sweetie. This one might be cute, but most humans are not."

The ogre holding you rolled her eyes. Her mom just didn't understand how people like you were harmless at worst. I mean really, what could a human possibly do to harm her? Nevertheless, it sounded like she had permission to go live in the woods for a couple of weeks. She was about to turn around to pack together some things for the trip when Orna stopped her.

"Hold on. Before I watch you leave the house for a few weeks, I do want something in return."

Bell sighed. She knew her mother well enough to anticipate a catch. What would it be this time...

"I want to see if the human loves you too. I want you two to kiss, right here and now." She said with a smile.

"Oh, that's all?" Bell said with a small shrug. She worried it might've been something difficult. You had little time to brace yourself as those big, pursed lips closed in. Soon your face was covered completely by them, saliva flowing richly. With what little direction you had you spread your arms wide and wrapped them around the ogre's head. She returned the favor, cupping most of your head in her palm and pressing you into her puffy lips even harder. Her breath was still bad, even with all the mints taking the worst of it away. With a loud smack she pulled away, leaving you gasping for air. Your face was glistening from the aftermath and the ogre defiantly turned to face her mother.

Orna and Reekers exchanged another glance before smiling. "Well, I'm convinced. You better hope you're ready for this, human. An ogre's love is no easy thing to handle."

"That's for damn sure." Reekers added with a laugh.

"Go on, you two start packing. I'll make sure little Dave makes it home. After we're done babysitting of course." She grins, sitting back down on the couch and hiding the lower half of Dave beneath her butt. Both ogre parents fart in unison. It was nearly enough to make you pity your little brother, but you had other things to worry about.

Your world shook as Bell carried you up the stairs in an excited sprint to her room. She dropped you off in there and left to get a bag. When she returned the ogre-girl started to manically pack things into the scuffed sports bag. Some clothes, other supplies, snacks and more. You had to be quick on your feet lest you'd be caught underfoot by the cheery ogre. Getting trampled by those sweaty stompers seemed like a less than ideal way to start this little adventure. With her bag packed Bell finally slowed down enough to consider you again. She quickly slung the bag onto her back and picked you up.

"Next stop, human world." She cooed as she snapped her fingers. Much like her mother did before, she produces a bright light, blinding you. When your eyes readjust you notice you're in familiar territory. Bell had taken you to your backyard, looking around with fascination. She'd made trips to the human world many times before, but it was always exciting.

"Where shall we begin..." She mulled over her options before turning to you. "I know, how about you go into your house and get us something to eat."

The ogre-girl set you down and you quickly entered the house. You grabbed some bags of sweets you'd kept stashed in your room. Among them was mercifully a large bag of mints. Something told you they were going to be lifesavers. You wandered back out to see Bell carefully stepping over the back fence. She didn't want to destroy it or leave any evidence, even if her large footsteps would assuredly do so. But when you looked at the ground, not a trace was present. Before you could pry further she beckons you over, picking you up and lifting you over the fence with ease. Before you stretched the woods. They were as ominous as ever in the darkness, but now that you had a monster on your side, you didn't feel as afraid of them.

"Heh, pretty scary, huh?" She mused. Her monster senses could pick up fear with ease. The little guy carried that distinct smell. Not a big surprise when one faces an ogre, but somehow the dark had him more on edge than the monster that could gobble him up in a heartbeat.

You found yourself picked up again. This time she wrapped you into a hug, her strong arms pushing you into the soft mass of her belly and boobs. Your head nearly slipped into her cleavage completely before she adjusted herself. "There, much safer." She mused as she began to wander into the woods.

After only a few minutes she came across a small creek. The ogre-girl set you down and threw down her bag. "There we go, camp's made." She said with a giggle. It was already getting late, but that wasn't about to deter the adventurous ogre. What surprised you more is when she suggested she'd get in her sleeping clothes. You were curious to see what she was referring to, but to your surprise she simply undressed.

"Oh, I should've told you, I sleep in the nude."

"I... uhm... you look beautiful." You stammered out, not wanting to make things awkward. "But isn't it cold?"

"Hah, not when you've got some insulation." She bellowed, patting her jiggling gut.

Not wanting to join your brother under her giant, stinky butt you smiled and replied, “S-sure Ms. Onra… I’ll go get the menu for the Chinese food place across town.” Onra held up a large green hand, “Oh, that won’t be necessary honey. Onra smiled and nodded, “Add two more Maggot Burger to that order, please.” So much for that.

Onra joyfully kicked the door shut as she stomped her way towards you with a brown bag of food in both hands, “Time for dinner boys.” She set the brown bag down on the kitchen table and dug her hand into her butt crack, fishing Dave out, who sputtered and coughed on the floor.

You bring the disgusting piece of 'food' to your mouth and breathe; slowly preparing yourself. Orna is watching you intensely. You can't be very good at your job if you can't cater for human children too!" you tell her exasperatedly. Dave wasn't really paying attention. He was more fixated on why his burger was moving. Orna however, stood up; beaming at you. "Is that right? Well let me show you how good I can be at my job. It's time-out for you" she said in a calm-angry tone. It was spine-tinglingly scary to see her towering over both of you. Although Dave was still prodding and poking his burger, trying to illicit a reaction from it.

You decide the best course of action is to try and run. There's no way you're spending any amount of time in that bulging gut of hers. Especially not right before or after she's been eating, you think to yourself. You dart by the side of her as suddenly as you can to catch her off-guard. "HEY! Where do you think you're going you little twerp!" she roars as she starts to bound after you; her belly jiggling as she does, almost as if to taunt you.

You reach your bedroom door and slam it shut, falling against it. You begin to scan your room for a hiding spot but before you can make any sort of decision, Orna starts banging the door and it shook every time she hit it. After a few attempts, it burst open and sent you hurtling towards the floor a few feet out in front of her. "Ha Ha Ha! I've got you now little one!" she jested menacingly. Walking swiftly towards you with her massive frame, you decide it's time to go on the offensive. You spring up and launch both of your arms into her in order to shove her back. Almost as if she could see the future, Orna grabbed both of your arms and twisted them; making you bend to your knees like clockwork.

You look up and see her flashing a victory smile at you. Her hands released your arms and clamped themselves around your upper arms; pinning them to your body. Orna lifts you up to face level, she was out of breath from all of the sudden movement. "Now it's time for your Time-out!" she pants, laughing wheezily. "First things first though".

You're suddenly overcome with a bizarre feeling. It feels like your skin is getting tighter. You look down at your body, trying to suss out what's going on with you. You look back at Orna to ask her what she's doing but you instantly realise; Orna is a lot bigger than before. "What's happening to me!?" you yell. "It's Ogre-magic, Einstein" she replies half laughing at you. "Ogres know magic?!" you quiz back. "We didn't always. Millenia passed before my people let magic into their lives. Now all the tribes have at least one Shaman" Orna explains to you as you continue to shrink. You never noticed as it was happening but Orna was now holding you with one hand and you're still getting smaller.

A few more horrific moments of shrinking go by. When it stops, you're about an inch tall and standing in the massive great palm of your ogre babysitter's hand. "Well now, I'd say that's about the perfect size. Wouldn't you?" Orna asks you in a coy tone. "Is this even reversible?!" you shout back, hoping she'll be able to hear you. "Oh yes it is, but you'll need to earn that!" she laughs. "Right...snack time" she says smiling dangerously at you. "Please don't eat me Orna! I'll be good I swear!" you plead desperately. "Too late shrunk-stuff" she replies. "Don't worry, you won't get digested. I've seen to that" she adds. Before you can say anything else, you fall back as her hand begins to ascend.

Her fingers close over you, sealing you in darkness only for a moment before she opens her hand again, keeping you between two fingers. "Down the hatch!" she instructs you. Before you can give any attempt at a protest, her fingers let go and you plummet towards her open, gargantuan maw.
Feeling you landing on her slimy tongue, Orna quickly shuts her mouth and tilts her head back. She opens her mouth once more to let you see the outside world before you go for your time-out.

A loud and obnoxious gulp drags you into her throat and you begin sliding down immediately. Tossing and turning all the way down seemed like hours before you eventually came to the end. You land in a large pool of green sludge. There are large chucks of dinner floating around and the smell was almost unbearable. Very suddenly, you're taken of your feet by an immense shaking.

Outside, Orna had begun to grab and slosh her rotund and quite large gut around. "That'll teach you. Enjoy the ride, squirt!" she laughed. "I'll let you out when I think you're ready to start treating me with some respect!" she cackles in a haughty tone.

'Great!' You think to yourself. "What now?" You say out-loud quickly realising you are talking to a cavernous ogre's gut.

A large puff of grey smoke blows in your face as you open the door. You can’t believe what you’re seeing before your eyes. Standing at a massive, fifteen feet in height was a huge red-scaled dragoness. She smirked down at you, giving you a good view of her sharp teeth, “Hey, you must be the kids I’m supposed to babysit.” Her huge clawed hand reached down and grabbed you. Daneera chuckled as she saw you both gaze at her home, “What’s the matter? Thought I lived like some kind of savage?” Dave turned around and asked, “What did you say about treasure? Can I have some?” Daneera smirked and shook her head, “Oh dear, a dragon’s treasure is a special thing. You can’t just take it away from me.” Dave whined, “But I want some.”

Dave looked ready to argue about the treasure some more, an idea you knew could only end badly. You briefly war over letting him continue to dig his own grave or talk him out of it. (UN)Fortunatly your brother never got the chance to argue as sounds drew your attention.

Claws clacking onto the wooden floor you see two small dragons bounding happily up to Daneera. Well, small when compared to the full-grown dragoness anyway.

The smaller dragon, light blue scales and silver horns was about your height. Maybe Daves' at minimum. The larger one was easily taller than you with the same dark red scales as Daneera and looked like he could pin you with one hand. Paw? Claw? Whatever their front legs were!

The large dragoness cooed happily and nuzzled the smaller hatchlings as they jumped around the larger dragon happily, preventing you from getting a good look at them. Clearly both younger dragons were staying with Daneera as well, and either knew each other very well or were related in some way. Or both.

You briefly wonder just how good of a baby sitter Daneera was since she seemed quite happy to leave her other two charges alone for a bit to collect you and Dave. But at the same time she did bring you all back to her cave and they were dragons so probably not as helpless as you originally thought.

Ok my little ones. The dragoness cooes in a soft voice catching both excited younger dragons, one in each paw. I’m going to be looking after these two for a bit. So while I know you are excited I need you to play nice. Can you do that?

Both nod rapidly though they appeared to be calming down now. And with then now staying still you come to a realization about them.

The two younger dragons were
1553322.title: Two smaller dragons, around your ages come out

choices: Dave starts running his mouth to Penny
Dave decides he actually likes this girl, and they both team up on you
155333.content:
To your surprise, the girl standing on your doorstep looked to be no more than eight. She wore a pink tank top and children's jeans with little white sneakers, and holding a teddy bear in one hand. "Can I help you?" You ask "I'm here to watch a couple of kids. Is this the right place?" You almost laugh "Is this a joke?"

She scowls "You think I'm kidding? I'm here to watch you and your brother, now move!" But before you can move an inch, she simply passes straight through you and into the house, as if you weren't there at all!

"What the!?" You say and you now notice that the girl is actually levitating slightly off the ground. "What are you?" You ask "Never seen a ghost before?" Just then, your brother comes in and notices the girl. "Who is that?" He asks, and you realize you never even got this girl's name. "My name is Penny, and you two had better be nice to me, or you'll regret it!"
155333.title: Penny the Poltergeist

choices: Marcy the Mermaid
Danielle the Drider
Samantha the Sphinx
Still Even More Sitters
155334.content:
Marcy - A mermaid in a wheelchair and a fishbowl full of water around her head. She's rather naive and curious about humans, but thinks they're kind of cute as well.

Danielle - A black widow drider that cocoons naughty children and leaves them hanging for a while in time out. Can be a bit of a flirt, regardless of the object of her affection's gender.

Samantha -A sphinx that loves to play a game of riddles with humans. If they win, she does something nice fir them, if they loose, theymust do whatever she asks, be it rub her belly or let her swallow them whole for a while. Is rather kind and motherly, but can be fierce and scary when she needs to.
155334.title: Even more still

choices: Dave keeps insulting Danielle so she cocoons him
Danielle sits down with you on the couch and starts talking with you
1553342.content:
A shriek of terror freezes in your throat when you answer the door. You were greeted by the smiling face of a pale woman… but she had four eyes… four, round, insect-like eyes. She was also incredibly tall, nearly eleven feet tall. Once you scanned down her body you understood why, her body below her waist was that of a giant spider. Your babysitter was a Drider! You looked back up when you heard her gentle voice, “Hey there, cutie. I must be the luckiest Drider in town to be babysitting such a cute young man. Name’s Danielle.” She reached down and pinched your cheek. You shivered a bit, “Uh, hi Danielle. Thank you. C-come right in.”

Her huge, spider body barely fit past the door as she squeezed her way in. The huge Drider surveyed the house as she stepped into the living room, noticing your little brother playing video games, “Hi there!” Dave turned around and squeaked in fear, “Hey, little guy. Don’t be scared, I’m a nice monster. I’m Danielle, your babysitter.” After getting over his initial fright Dave retorted, “More like… UGLY.” Danielle raised an eyebrow and frowned, “Hey, that’s no way to talk to your babysitter little guy. Am I gonna have to punish you?” Dave spat back, “It’s punishment enough having someone so ugly in the house.” You chimed in, “Enough Dave, you shouldn’t call a pretty woman ugly like that.” Danielle shot you a steamy smirk and winked at you, lightly hip-checking you with her huge spider-abdomen, “Thanks cute stuff.”
1553342.title: Danielle the Drider

choices: Dave pulls on her tail, the Sphinx gets really angry
You start the game with your first riddle
1553343.content:
You were shocked at who was standing at your doorstep. Towering over you at nine feet in height was a Sphinx woman. She had the body of an anthropomorphic lion and the head of a human woman. She wore an Egyptian robe and a pair of baggy black satin pants, as well as a golden head-band encrusted with jewels. She greeted you with a warm, motherly smile, showing off her mouth full of sharp lion-like teeth, “Hello there sweetheart, I’m so sorry if I scared you. My name’s Samantha, I’ll be your babysitter. May I come in?”

You move out of the way, allowing the huge monster woman to enter. She smiled, looking around your house, “Ah, such a cute home. Now where’s your brother?” She sniffed the air and picked up his scent, roaming into the living room. You heard Samantha say ‘hello’ and heard Dave scream, “Ah, monster! Get away.” You heard Samantha chuckle warmly as you made your way into the living room, “You’d be right little one, I am a monster. A sphinx, to be exact. But you have nothing to fear… unless you make me angry of course. Then you’d have A LOT to fear.” Samantha giggled as you joined your brother in the living room.

The sphinx put her paws on her shapely hips, “Now then, I’m a big supporter of education, especially for children. So I like to play little riddle games with the kids I babysit. If you guess right, I’ll do something nice for you. If you guess wrong I’ll have to punish you, and once I tell you the correct answer you’ll get to learn a little something too.” Samantha smiled down at you both. You nervously scratch the back of your head, not liking the ‘punishment’ part of the game, “I’m not sure Ms. Samantha. Can’t you just teach us the lessons instead.” Samantha giggled and patted your head with her huge paw, “Oh, don’t be silly, this way is much more fun. Now, shall we start?”
1553343.title: Samantha the Sphinx

choices: "A coffin!" (Correct)
"Water!" (Wrong)
15533432.content:
You try to think of a riddle you know. Then one comes to your mind, albeit not a terribly difficult one. "What ancient invention allows people to walk through walls?" You ask, and Samantha smiles "That's easy, a door." You probably should have known she'd get that one. "My turn. Let's see...Who makes it, has no need of it. Who buys it, has no use for it. Who uses it can neither see nor feel it. What is it?"

That one was one you'd never heard before. As you're thinking of an answer, Dave suddenly blurts out "I know the answer!" Samantha looks down at him smiling. "Okay then, tell me the right answer and I'll do whatever you ask." Dave replies...
15533432.title: You start the game with your first riddle

choices: He points at you and tells the sphinx to eat you
He asks Samantha for infinite wishes, which is against the rules
155334321.content: Samantha smiles widely down at your little brother, “You’re correct Dave. Since you answered correctly I’ll do whatever task you like. Just know that once you make your request you can’t take it back and I can only perform one request per-riddle. Understand?” An evil grin formed on Dave’s face as he rubbed his hands together, “Yeah, I know exactly what I want to ask for!” What does your little brother request?
155334321.title: "A coffin!" (Correct)

choices: Eats him up
Uses him as her own personal cat toy
155334322.content: Samantha teasingly giggled down at Dave, baring her huge teeth at him she answered, “Sorry sweetheart but that’s wrong. The correct answer was a coffin. Oh well, time for you punishment sweetie pie.” She looks down at your little brother like a cat eying it’s lunch. She tapped a clawed digit against her chin as she mulled her options over, “Now what to do with you, child!?” Her feline eyes widen and her grin grows larger as she seems to get an idea. What does she do to your little brother?
155334322.title: "Water!" (Wrong)

choices: "Is it your wallet?" (Wrong)
"Nothing?"  (Damn it! She got it!)
1553343222.content:
The next thing your brother knew, he was tied up with a rope and being dragged throughout the house by you, as Samantha chases him on all fours, swatting her paws at him whenever she got close enough. You couldn't help but smile to yourself while this was going on. Ever since your brother learned to speak, he's been giving you a hard time with pretty much everything. It was about time you got some payback.

This went on for about an hour before Samantha gets bored and decides to stop. "Well that was fun." She says with a grin "Now it's your turn again, boys. Ask me a riddle."

You both try to think of a really hard riddle, lthen an idea comes to your mind. You just hope she hasn't read The Hobbit. "Alright, What have I got in my pocket?" You ask, and Samantha gives you a look of confusion. "I'm not sure if that even counts as a riddle, sweetie." "Tell you what." You say "Guess right, and you can punish the both of us. Guess wrong, and you do whatever we want for the rest of the night." Samantha's eyes gleam with interest. "Okay, you're on."

She spends several moments trying to think of a guess to make, before finally saying...
1553343222.title: Uses him as her own personal cat toy

choices: You ask Samantha to sit on Dave to shut him up
Dave commands Samantha to chase you
15533432221.content: Samantha ponders to herself, deep in thought for a moment before her feline eyes widen and she smiles, seemingly having an answer. Licking her lips and rubbing her paws together in anticipation she triumphantly replies, “I know the answer… you’re wallet!” Dave snickers and blurts out, “Nope! I’m too young to own a wallet you big, dumb cat. You lose!” Samantha grimaced and was about to swat her paw at Dave before he continued, “Now you have to do whatever we say for the rest of the night. And I say… “ You interrupted, knowing Dave would command her to do something awful to you, “Don’t I get a say in this?” Dave groaned, “Well what about me?” You retorted, “We should ask for something we both agree on.” Dave just stuck his tongue out at you.
15533432221.title: "Is it your wallet?" (Wrong)

choices: She teaches you the wonders of her digestive tract
She teaches you about the food chain and ‘hunts’ you two
15533432222.content: Samantha pondered and furrowed her brow a bit, deep in thought until she blurted out, “Um… I’m not sure… nothing?” Dave’s jaw dropped and you went pale, “Was she right?” Dave simply nodded in response. You gulped as you looked up to see Samantha smirking down at you smugly, “Well boys it looks like you’ll be punished for the rest of the night, but don’t you worry one bit. I’ll make sure that your punishment is as educational as possible. Can’t have young, healthy minds like your go to waste. Now, what shall be your first punishment?”
15533432222.title: "Nothing?"  (Damn it! She got it!)

choices: Gloria
Joyanne
Alice
More!
1553344.content:
How about some less 'traditional' monsters?

Gloria - An over 7 foot tall gnoll woman with a competitive spirit! She absolutely loves making wagers and dares, and if you want to earn her respect, you're going to have to best her at something; be it arm wrestling, playing video games, or whatever other test of skill you can come up with! If you lose though, well... she has very poor hygiene and a relentless appetite, both of which she will not hesitate to use to 'punish' you! For the most part, though, she is pretty friendly and playful, if a bit rambunctious and... sort of gross.

Joyanne - An 8 foot tall bunyip who only VERY hesitantly agreed to this job, due to one simple reason - it takes place on land! For some reason, she seems to get increasingly anxious whenever she's on land for too long, to the point of potentially having panic attacks! Luckily, she does have some coping mechanisms that calm her down - getting a belly rub usually does the trick, bonus if it's from the inside. Still, in the end, she might just end up dragging you to the local swimming pool. Aside from this, she's quite a shy and demure lady, and speaks with a distinct Australian accent.

Alice - A 12 foot tall ahool whose too big to even fit through your front door! No need to worry about that, though... she'd be caught dead wasting her time stuck in some cramped, claustrophobic little house! No... this bat lady would rather take you and your brother through adventures to through the air, flying you around to wherever you might be interested in going! She can fly at ridiculous speeds, reaching over 500 knots, so if she's flying at full power, you're either going to have to hang on for dear life, or get a much safer, 'internal' seat to wait out the flight. She's nice enough, but a bit dense and eccentric, often oblivious to how scare she can accidentally come across as being.
1553344.title: Still Even More Sitters

choices: Hide and seek
Arm wrestling
15533441.content:
You almost couldn’t believe what you were seeing. Standing in your doorway as a tall hyena-like woman. She was definitely taller by a head or two than either of your parents, she wore fairly normal street clothes, tight-fitting grey pants to go with her fur and a brown shirt. Her clothes had some small rips, holes and stains on them. You also quickly find out that this lady has never heard of a shower, a smell that could only be described as a ‘super dumpster’ invaded your nostrils.

You remember reading in a storybook about creatures like her… they were called Gnolls. You prayed this was just some mix-up, this this was not your sitter and you wouldn’t have to spend all night with her. As if on queue she smiled, giving you a whiff of her malodorous breath and waved a paw at you, “Heya, name’s Gloria little man. I’m your sitter.”

Still surprised, expecting a teenager to watch you, not a hyena woman, you respond, “Um, hi. Come right in.” She doesn’t have to be asked twice as she nearly pushes you out of the way and enters. Gloria snorts a bit and groans, “How can you two live in this place. It’s so clean! Too clean! We’ll have to fix that.” Once Gloria enters the living room Dave immediately notices her and sneers at her, “Hey freak, Halloween’s still a long ways off.” Gloria put her paws on her hips and chuckled, “Oh, ha-ha-ha, good one little guy. But this ain’t no costume. I’m the real deal.” Gloria eyed the videogame Dave was playing and then peered back down at him, a sly grin on her muzzle, “You like games kid?”

Dave nodded, “Yeah, what’s it to you mutt?” Gloria replied, “Well I’m a fan of games myself… bets and dares to be exact. Wanna play?” Dave shook his head, “No.” But Gloria was not taking ‘no’ for an answer, “Great.” She knelt down and grabbed Dave by the waist, picking him up and nonchalantly dragging him to the couch, sitting down next to him. Gloria leered down at Dave, “So… what game shall we play…?”
15533441.title: Gloria

choices: Gloria is angry, Dave is getting punished
Gloria is amused, she won the bet and Dave's gonna feel it
Gloria is bored, she wants to play a game with you instead
155334411.content:
"Oh, I got it, how about hide and seek?" The gnoll suggested.

Dave rolled his eyes at such a childish idea but mid-roll he paused. You could tell an idea was brewing in his head. You didn't doubt that it would be an incredibly stupid idea, but whatever works to get this smelly beast out of your house.

"Alright, you hide and I'll seek. But let me tell ya, I'm the best seeker in this neighborhood. I bet you can't even stay hidden from me for five minutes." Dave said proudly.

"Five minutes? Too easy. Make it fifteen!" The gnoll seemed uncannily confident in her ability to hide. Surely the smell alone would be enough to easily track her down. You didn't exactly need a bloodhound to follow her stench around.

"You're on!" Dave said and Gloria hopped off the couch. "You got thirty seconds to be gone." Your little brother added, the gnoll already looking around for hiding places.

"30, 29, 28..." The smelly beast ran off, up the stairs. You weren't so sure about letting this walking stink bomb camp about inside your house. What if she'd hidden under your bed? Your room would smell like fetid gnoll sweat for weeks. You pray to whoever would listen she'd find her way to Dave's room instead.

Your little brother was still counting, but he'd already opened his eyes, the little cheater. Moreover he was walking back to his video game and sat down before the tv. When the count finished he even loudly announced he was coming for her without making any inclination to move a muscle to do so. He'd effectively got the babysitter to leave the two of you alone for at least fifteen minutes. As effective as his little ruse was, it was a plan earmarked by his usual shortsightedness. It didn't take a genius to imagine the gnoll was going to be mighty pissed if she found him like this. Even in the best case scenario, he was still letting her win the bet. But whatever got him his game time, right?

Not wanting to be facing an angry gnoll you begin walking about, curious to see where the muscular beast might've tried to hide. From behind you your little brother called out.

"Don't bother with that bitch. She's gone and I'd like to keep it that way."

As was practically the law for big brothers you ignored him, walking up the stairs as he was quickly getting way too absorbed shouting at his video game. Much like you'd expected the smell was easy to follow. With a mounting sense of dread you opened the door to your room and... nothing. Phew, at least you didn't have to worry about her contaminating your stuff with her stink. Next up, Dave's room. Again the door creaks open, but no gnoll to be found. You turn to the bathroom and as you get close the smell gets worse. You open the door and a smile forms on your face. Standing in the shower, curtains drawn to cover her presence was Gloria. She peeked just past the side of the curtain. You quietly winked at her, her secret was safe with you. She smiled in return. You softly closed the bathroom door as she whispered to you.

"See you in ten minutes."

You grinned a little, knowing she'd be right. After all, hiding is easy when nobody's looking for you. As you went down the stairs Dave shot you a dirty look.

"Well, did you find the bitch?"

"Nope." You lied, shrugging your shoulders.

"Bullshit, where's a fat freak like her gonna hide? Oh fuck, she's not in my room, is she?!"

"She's not." You shook your head before sitting back on the couch. Minutes ticked by and as Dave's time to find the gnoll ran short he seemed just as committed to ignoring her as before. He could've saved himself so much trouble if he took thirty seconds to hop up the stairs and find her like you did. But after twenty minutes had passed you could hear your babysitter's footsteps upstairs. Gloria walked down the stairs with a massive toothy grin on her face. She'd handily defeated that little twerp. But when she saw Dave sitting in his chair playing games it quickly dawned on her he'd never even bothered to look.
155334411.title: Hide and seek

choices: Swallows him up
Shoves him in her buttcrack
1553344111.content:
The toothy grin on Gloria’s muzzle quickly disappears when she spies Dave simply playing his videogames. The gnoll snorted and growled at Dave, baring her teeth, “You little brat, you weren’t even playing were you? You just did that to get rid of me?” Dave simply chuckled and pointed at her, “Well, duh! And you were dumb enough to fall for it. You’re dumber than you look!” Gloria snarled at Dave as she stomped her way towards him, he was too preoccupied with laughing at her to notice… that is until she forcibly grabs him by his shirt collar and hoists him up to her muzzle.

She snorts in his face, spraying him with gnoll mucus. Dave sputters and groans, “Ew, gross. What was that for?” Gloria retorted, “For misbehaving. You seem to be quite the troublemaker so it looks like I’m going to have to punish you.” Dave chuckled and flicked her wet nose playfully, “Oh yeah? What’s the worst you could do? What are you gonna do… stink me to death?” Gloria growls at your little brother as she ponders over how to punish him. After a few seconds a wicked grin spreads across her muzzle as she teasingly flicks Dave’s nose with her claws, “Oh, so you want me to show you my worst, huh? Challenge accepted lil’ guy!” How does Gloria punish your little brother?
1553344111.title: Gloria is angry, Dave is getting punished

choices: My gassy butt
My footpaws
1553344112.content: Once Gloria made her way down the stairs and back into your living room she spotted Dave playing videogames. A sly smirk grew across her muzzle. She raised a brow, putting her paws on her hips, “So… videogames too distracting to play a game with your babysitter, huh? Well, I won and you… well, you definitely lost! So it looks like you’ll have to do whatever I say.” Dave grimaced, throwing his videogame controller and standing back up, looking up to look at your babysitter in the eyes. Dave snorted, “And what if I say no?” Gloria kept her chipper demeanor and giggled, “Well then I’ll force you to silly. I’m much stronger than you little guy.” Gloria’s huge paws came down and scooped up your brother, Dave struggled but it was no use. Gloria brought Dave up to her grinning muzzle as she thought over her punishment for Dave, “Hmm, what to do… I’ve got it! You’re gonna massage…"
1553344112.title: Gloria is amused, she won the bet and Dave'...

choices: Truth or Dare
She pulls out a game, “Cards Against Monstrosities”
1553344113.content:
Gloria’s smiling muzzle soon turned to a disappointed grimace when she saw Dave attentatively playing his videogames, forgetting their game of hide and seek. The gnoll woman groaned, “Aw, you didn’t even play, did you?” Dave just snorted, “Hell no, Hide and Seek is a baby game. Plus, why would I wanna play with a smelly freak like you.” Gloria growled angrily, “That’s it kid. You’ve tried my patience.” Gloria stomped over to Dave and grabbed him by the collar of his shirt. Your little brother protested, “Get off of me you freak, you smell like shit!” Gloria stomped her way over to your basement door and flung it open. She ran downstair, forcibly throwing Dave onto an old, dusty couch and jogged her way back upstairs. Gloria shut and locked the basement door before Dave could even make it up the stairs.

You both soon heard Dave banging on the door and screaming, “Let me out. I’m telling my parents you did this. They’ll arrest you and the government will experiment on you and…” Gloria nearly punched a hole through the basement door to get Dave’s attention, “Hey kid, did you know monsters live in the basement. Hungry one’s that eat little boys like you.” Dave spat, “Bullshit. That’s all made-up fairytale crap.” Gloria pulled out her cellphone and dialed a number. She smirked at the basement door and replied, “Really? Monsters aren’t real? Then explain how I, a gnoll, a monster, happen to be standing right here, in the flesh, in your house?” Dave didn’t reply, he was going to say she was wearing a costume, but deep down he knew she was the real deal.

The other person, or monster, picked up Gloria’s phone call. The gnoll smiled, “Hey Tia, I know it’s a Friday night and you’re technically off duty for the night, but I have this bratty kid I’m babysitting who really need to be taught a lesson, and you’re the best basement-monster I know. Think you could teach him a lesson? Great! I’ll even throw in some of my tip your way. Thanks beautiful, see you later.” She hung up the phone and knocked on the basement door with a sly grin, “Hey Dave, one of my best friends is coming to play with you down there. She skipped dinner by the way… play nice.” Dave continued to bang on the door and protest while Gloria gestured for you to follow her back into your living room, “Don’t worry, Tia can handle him.”

Gloria’s old, big, happy grin returned to her muzzle, she sighed, “So now that that’s out of the way, I’m REALLY itching to play another game. Whatta ya’ say?” You smiled up at Gloria and nodded, she seemed pretty scary when she was mad, but really sweet and kind when she was happy. She was definitely kind of stinky, but you wanted to stay on her good side. Gloria clapped her paws together and jumped up and down, making the floor beneath you shake, “Oh boy! Now, what game should we play?” Before you have a chance to answer she waves her paws in the air, “Oh, I know!”
1553344113.title: Gloria is bored, she wants to play a game with ...

choices: "Leave me alone and go play with Dave."
"Make me something to eat."
"Take a shower."
15533441131.content:
"Let's play Truth or Dare! You know that game in the human world, right?"

You smiled in response. "Yeah, we've got that here too. You ask a question, I reply with the truth. Or if I don't or can't answer it right, you set me a challenge. From there it's mostly improvising. As long as you don't eat me, I'm sure we'll be fine."

"Why would I eat you? You're a decent kid, those taste horrible. Your brother on the other hand..." She started salivating at the thought before shaking herself out of it. "Eh, Tia's got him covered."

"Is he going to be okay?"

"Is that Truth you want or do you want to Dare me to show you?" Gloria said with a cheeky smile. You sigh and relent. The truth about this would be nice. Until today you had no idea monsters were real. And now you're playing games with one whilst another is doing who knows what with your brother.

"We can't really kill anyone. Just when you might think you're going to digest in our stomach or suffocate on our farts you'll wake up. Same with your brother. He's going to wake up in the middle of the night bathed in cold sweat, horrified at what he just experienced. Then he's going to wonder for the next few months if it really was all just a bad dream. And if he doesn't learn from it, then he'd better make sure to check under his bed and in his closet, because he might well find himself with a visitor." Gloria flashed her biggest, toothiest grin. There was little comfort in this knowledge. But before you got too sad, the gnoll encouraged you.

"Aw, don't be scared. You're a good kid. The only way you're going anywhere bad is if you lose some really bad Dares. Speaking of which, I think it's my turn. I'll start you easy. Tell me the Truth, am I the smelliest monster you've ever met?"

You laugh a little at the hulking hyena woman. Composing yourself, you answer her. "Well, you're the only monster I ever met, so you kinda win that by default. And if I'm honest here, you also handily beat every single human I've ever met when it comes to stinking."

Gloria blushed brightly at your remarks. She didn't think you were being flirty now did she? You were a bit young for romance and she was a bit too tall, smelly and not to forget: a gnoll. Before things got too awkward you pushed the game along. "Alright, my turn. Truth or dare?"

"Let's make things interesting. Dare. What would you have me do?"
15533441131.title: Truth or Dare

choices: She lets Tia eat him
Gloria takes Dave and tortures him with her stink
155334411311.content:
A sly grin appears on your face as you get an idea, “Ok, how about you join Tia downstairs with Dave. I’m sure Tia will appreciate the help and Dave will like spending time with you.” A sly grin grew on Gloria’s muzzle too, “I see. Sounds like a good idea. But don’t think our little game is ending. When I come back it’ll be your turn to tell the truth or take a dare.” She playfully slapped you on the shoulder before turning back to the basement door. She quickly slipped inside and closed the door behind her. You sighed in relief, enjoying the much fresher air now.

Meanwhile, your gnoll sitter crept down the stairs with a devious look on her face. Her acute hearing picked up Dave whimpering, she could smell him too. She licked her lips and cooed, “Oh Dave… I’m kind of hungry. Mind joining me for lunch.” She heard Dave squeal, “Go away.” Gloria shook her head as she crept through the dark basement, “Nope. I’m too hungry Dave. My belly is growling right now. It needs a snack.”

She then heard some boxes get knocked over and heard Dave shriek, “Get off. No! Please!” Gloria rounded a dark corner and saw Dave wrapped up in the tentacles of a huge, blue scaled, kraken-like monster. Gloria smiled, “Tia!” The kraken eyes the gnoll, “Hey Gloria.” Dave squeaked, “Yep, and you’re in for a wild ride little guy.” Dave growled, “I’m gonna tell my parents all about this you bitch!” Gloria and Tia both laughed. Gloria replied, “And you think they’re gonna believe you, huh?” Dave was about to reply but stopped, “Well… maybe… I…” Tia turned her huge rubbery head towards Gloria, “Can I have him Gloria?” The gnoll pondered for a minute…
155334411311.title: "Leave me alone and go play with Dave."

choices: Gloria isn't done yet
Tia grabs Dave, she's feeling playful
Tia grabs Dave, she's feeling hungry
1553344113112.content:
"You want to eat him now? Or... do yo want me to 'season' him first for you?"

Tia's eyes grew wide at her friend's proposal. The slithering mass of tentacles unfurled from Dave, all but throwing him at the gnoll. Gloria made sure he could enjoy his newfound freedom by scooping him up in her strong arms and giving him a might bearhug. Not a single snarky remark could escape from him before the air was crushed from his lungs. His eyes were watering at the sheer horrible sweaty stench radiating of his captor. Things couldn't get much worse for him, or so he thought. With a wicked smile the gnoll squeezed her prey tighter, she was just getting started.

One muscular arm released Dave's body, only to lift her shirt and shuffle him underneath it. The horrid stench grew tenfold as he was smeared against the greasy, sweaty fur of the gnoll. What little air he could breathe was like breathing soup, The humid air was the least of his worries as he felt the gnoll slide him upwards. Her soft boobs added a distinct sour note to the stench as they surrounded the boy's head. Gloria briefly squeezed them together, just to feel the little pest squirm. Finally she pulled him back out, letting him flop onto the basement floor.

Tia looked on in admiration. Her massive size tended to interrupt playtime long before she could do fun things like Gloria was doing. Those tasty boys just can't handle a good tentacle hug it seems. So what if those hugs used to be able to sink ships?

Gloria got down on all fours, looming menacingly over the shivering troublemaker. Dave looked up and almost gagged at the sight. The gnoll's toothy grin was leaking saliva on him. Slowly she leaned down, opening those fearsome jaws. This was the end. He was about to be messily torn apart and devoured by this beast of a babysitter. The boy's shivers seized when he felt a large, warm tongue splat down on his neck and drag itself along his throat. Gloria began to lick the little pest all over and the stench of humid saliva was added to the foul cocktail tormenting Dave's nose. But with his body not being crushed anymore he found his voice again.

"For fuck's sake, get off me you dirty..." His complaints were interrupted by a large tongue dragging across his mouth. Gloria stared daggers at him and growled softly. "Speak again and we're going to find out how far I can drive this tongue down your neck."

Dave scoffed at her threat. "Try that and I'll bite your damn tongue off!" But the gnoll only appeared more excited by his words. "Challenge accepted" She cackled as she grabbed Dave's head with both hands. With her immense strength she pried his jaws open and kept them opened. From her corner Tia chimed in, just in case the little pest had missed it. "Gloria loves a fighty victim, you're in for it now, kid."

The gnoll dropped as low as she could, taking most of Dave's head into her maw. Everything was focused on plunging as much of that squishy tongue down his neck. His cries were stifled as Gloria went in, easily filling that little mouth of his and venturing down his throat. Dave felt the squirming, slobbering tongue push down his neck far further than he could've ever imagined it to be. It nearby reached his stomach before Gloria withdrew herself. His jaw slackened as she pulled her tongue back out and when she let go of his head he simply laid there, whimpering. Both monsters knew a troublemaker like him wouldn't learn so quickly. The moment he'd catch his breath he'd be spouting abuse again.

Before he could form a coherent sentence Dave looked up to see Gloria's massive, stinky butt approaching. It loomed over him ominously, threatening to drop down and squash him flat. But the monster tormenting him had a far crueler idea. A distant rumble gave Dave the slightest warning, but long before he'd deciphered the meaning Gloria let it rip. She blew an immense, lengthy fart down on him, making him gag and cough. Even from several rooms away you could hear it. You almost feel sorry for siccing this smelly beast on your little brother, but Dave more than deserved it. You dread to think what the gnoll might do to you once she's finished with him.

Gloria steps back to admire her handiwork and both her and Tia smile. She'd effortlessly reduced the boy to a shivering, stinky mess.
1553344113112.title: Gloria takes Dave and tortures him with her stink

choices: Um… feet…
Deodorant
15533441131121.content:
Dave could barely talk, he simply shivered and whimpered on the basement floor. He couldn’t fully get his bearings as Gloria’s stink had clung to him, so even after she got off of him and stepped away he was still a victim of her stench she left behind. Before Dave could form a coherent sentence Gloria was back to tormenting him. She walked up to him and knelt down, looking him in the eyes. Her huge paw came down onto his head as she playfully ran her claws through his hair. She giggled, “Not so tough now, are ya’ short stuff? Don’t worry, once Tia and I are through with you, you’ll never misbehave again. Scout’s honor. Now since I’m a nice babysitter I’ll let you pick what I do next to you. Sound like a deal?”

Dave simply shook his head and whimpered, his eyes watering a little. Gloria simply cooed, lightly pinching his nose, “Aw, you human kids are so cute. Even you brats. Now you can either get a face-full of my nasty feet… or… I’m going to turn you into my deodorant stick. And if you don’t choose one I’ll just do both. So, what’s it gonna be?” Dave knew well at this point that no amount of verbal insults was going to get him out of this. He could only hope to play the gnoll’s game and hope she and Tia go easy on him. Dave started to say…
15533441131121.title: Gloria isn't done yet

choices: To bring you down to the basement to meet Tia
To snuggle up and watch a movie with you
15533441131123.content:
While Dave tries to get a grip on his bearings and Gloria tries to think of what to do with him next, a sly tentacle slither’s it’s way across the basement floor. It quickly wraps around Dave’s leg and starts pulling him back towards the writhing mass of tentacles. Dave fights as best as he can against the tentacle, but he was fighting something with a grip force of around a few tons, there was no way he was winning any battles of strength with this massive sea creature. Dave screamed, “Hey, stop, quit it, get off!” Tia cooed, “I’m sorry little one, but momma’s hungry.” The kraken’s tentacles wrap around poor little Dave, ensnaring him in a huge tangle-web of strong, muscular, slimy coils.

Tia brings the struggling boy up to her huge, yellow, glassy eyeballs. Each eye was nearly the size of his parent’s SUV. Tia eyes the wiggling Dave and chuckled, “You look so cute Dave. I’m surprised none of the monsters under your bed or in your closet haven’t tried to eat you yet.” Dave squeaked, “There are monsters there?” Tia chuckled, “Of course there are. Maybe tomorrow night you should try to meet them.” The sea monstress licked and smacked her beak noisly at Dave as he squealed and screamed, fearful of the prospect of being kraken-food, “No! Don’t do it. Don’t eat me. I’m not food.” Tia teasingly slapped Dave’s cheek with a slimy tentacle and cooed, “Yes you are. Watch this!”

Tia tilted her huge rubber head back and opened her beak nice and wide. She started to unwind her tentacles from around poor Dave. He squeaked and whimpered but to no avail. He even tried to grab onto one of the tentacles that previously bound him, but it was no use. The poor boy lost his grip on the slimy and rubber flesh and fell, he was headed right towards Tia’s fishy-stenched maw, “MOMMY!” That was the last thing Dave said before SPLAT, CHOMP! Dave plopped right onto the kraken’s tongue and she slammed her beak shut, trapping him. Tia took her time tasting her prey. As Dave screamed and fought her tongue the huge pink muscle slapped him around her maw and tightly squeezed him.

Tia moaned in joy, “Such a sweet boy. David, did you know you’d probably go great wish soy sauce… or maybe some mustard.” This clearly didn’t make Dave feel better as his crying got louder. She continued to poke him around her beak and taste him until she got bored. Tia cheerfully teased, “Well sweetie, it’s snack time. Hope you’re as excited as I am!” The kraken tilted her head back and with a powerful GULP sent a shrieking Dave down her powerful esophagus and into her belly. Tia let out a satisfied belch as she chuckled, “Excuse me, kids give me gas.” Gloria grins happily, having fed her friend and successfully punished Dave she heads back upstairs…
15533441131123.title: Tia grabs Dave, she's feeling hungry

choices: A shower together with the babysitter
A solo shower for the gnoll, a tongue bath for you
The game gets interrupted by something
155334411313.content:
"I dare you to take a shower."

The gnoll looked surprised. Of all the challenges she expected you to throw at her, this one was certainly unexpected. A sly smile cropped up on her face. The little guy didn't specify what kind of shower. She could pop to the monster world and shower in raw sewage. To be fair, she'd been slacking off on that lately. Might be a good excuse to get out of the house too. The little brat was already in Tia's care and this kid seemed responsible enough to handle himself whilst she was off getting the shower he dared her to get.

"But, it has to be our shower, in this house."

Dammit, he was onto her. The smelly beast furrowed her brow. Showering with clean water was anathema to her kind. She'd need to roll in filth for hours to get her proper stench back. Gloria shot you a pleased smile. You weren't making this easy for her, and she loved herself a challenge.

"Are you sure that's gonna fit? I'm a big girl." You could smell her bullshit from a mile away, much like the rest of her. You weren't having any of it.

"I've already seen you hiding in it, you know it's big enough. but if you can't stomach a shower..." A low snarl rumbled out of the gnoll. You were afraid you'd pushed your luck a bit too much. The last thing you wanted was to piss off your babysitter. You could see Gloria mulling over her options. She concludes with a sigh that she didn't have any other choice. But if she was going to endure a human shower, perhaps she could spice things up a bit.

"Alright, ya got me. I don't back down from a challenge. But let's say we make things interesting. Your parents asked me to make sure you got a shower in too. Now I know I'm getting ahead of things here since your Dare ain't done, but how's this for mine... I Double Dare you... to join me."

You didn't quite have the words to react. Your gut feeling was to stay away from that reeking gnoll as far as possible. But if joining her got her in the shower. Wait, she was right, she'd not finished her challenge yet. Technically you could refuse. Cautiously you ask Gloria what might happen then.

"Well, if you're gonna make me shower all by my lonesome, I'll change my Dare so something a bit more fitting. Oh, I know. You're making me get clean the human way. So if you refuse, then I'll dare you to let me clean you the traditional gnoll way, with a tongue bath."

Your eyes widened with shock. She couldn't be serious, right? Already Gloria smiled, licking her chops. No shower was going to fix that foul maw and she was keen to slobber all over you. The thought of being soaked with gnoll spittle made you feel queasy already. Suddenly sharing the shower didn't seem all that bad. But what if it was a clever trick?

"If I shower with you, you're not gonna dare me to get licked anyway, right?"

"I promise, gnoll's honour." You didn't know if gnolls had a concept of honour, but Gloria seemed sincere enough. Now the hard choice was on your shoulders. Do you join the gnoll as she takes a shower and endure her up close? Or do you let her shower alone and give you a tongue bath? Neither option felt particularly good for you, but the lesser of two evils was...
155334411313.title: Double Dare

choices: Gloria wants to play more games with you
Gloria reminds you it's her turn in Truth or Dare
It's bed time, Gloria tucks you in
1553344113131.content:
Anything sounded better than a tongue bath from that rancid monster. Reluctantly you agree to join her as she takes a shower. You could see her gleeful smile grow. She wasn't going to like the upcoming cleaning session and she was determined to make sure you would loathe it every bit as much.

"Alright then, little guy. Let's get this double dare over with." You both stood up and walked to the bathroom. You couldn't get more than a few steps in before Gloria's large arm wrapped around your waist, hoisting you off your feet and carrying you up the stairs. The smell was unbelievably foul, but the goal of getting her in a shower made you persevere. Your nose was held close to the beasts' sweat-soaked clothes. It smelled like a pair of worn out sneakers dipped in sewage. The caustic stench stung your nostrils. With little care the gnoll dropped you on the bathroom floor before beginning to undress herself. You blushed brightly as she swung free her fuzzy boobs. Her big gut gave her some difficulty getting her pants off, but soon she was standing before you, completely naked. Pudgy gut aside she didn't look too strangy. Much to muscular and inhuman for your taste, but you could imagine any gnoll boys in your position would be quite delighted.

"You gonna shower with your clothes on? C'mon, lose em." Gloria huffed impatiently. The sooner she got this infernal shower over with the better. She tapped her foot as the frightened human quickly shed his little outfit. Soon he was standing in his birthday suit, blushing brightly. His hands were covering his crotch, making the gnoll woman smirk a little. He was far too young for her to try anything. Far too clean too. The hulking gnoll stepped into the shower, surprised by how spacious it is. Now that she wasn't hiding from prying eyes she could appreciate it. She quickly got the hot water flowing, shivering with disdain as layers of carefully built up filth washed away.

You couldn't believe that your babysitter was taking a shower right in front of you. You didn't get much time to linger as a large hand reached out and pulled you into the shower. Immediately you began to regret your decision as Gloria's wet fur smelled even more awful than normal. The heat and moisture are washing away ancient deposits of filth, unleashing their foul stink onto you. More pressing matters were the lack of space and her brutal way of dealing with it. The gnoll made it inescapably clear this was her shower. She pressed her hefty gut into you, pinning you against the wall. Periodically she would lean on you, squashing you flat and crushing the air from your lungs. After a few more minutes of torment she stepped back a little, hoisting you up in a gentle hug.

"I'm just messing with ya, you big goof." The painful squeezing you endure felt anything but goofy to you. Hopefully she knew how easily someone as strong as her could hurt you. With yourself lost in thought you don't hear her call out to you straight away.

"hey... HEY! My eyes are up here you little pervert!" You had unwittingly been staring at her gently swaying tits all this time. You blush so brightly you're convinced your head is glowing red right now. "That's right, you keep staring and I'll let you give mé a tongue bath. The mere thought of having to service her whole body with your tongue shocked you right back to reality. Since you'd already gotten her here, why not push your luck a little further?

"Does shampoo work on your fur?" You ask innocently, occasionally eyeing the bottles next to you. Gloria sees where you're taking this and responds jokingly. "Oh yes, we spend a lot of time worried about personal hygiene." You took a bold step, popped open one of the shampoo bottles and handed it to your babysitter. "What do you want me to do with that?"

"Wash yourself of course." You added condescendingly. The gnoll sounded irritated. "That's not what we agreed on." You simply smiled and replied. "Then how about we spice things up a bit. What if I Dare you to shampoo your belly and more if you like.

"Oh, you're on." the gnoll said with a sneer. She squirted the contents of nearly the whole bottle onto her belly and began to rub. As expected the shower was soon filled with bubbles of all sizes. To your surprise she was actually beginning to smell nice. The perfume in the shampoo was working overtime to conceal the rotten stench the gnoll produces. During all this she played painful little games with you, squashing you against the wall with her large body or using you as an improvised wash rag. Getting you clean as well seemed all the way down at the bottom of her list. When she's done using your face as as towel you both dry yourselves off and pull your clothes back on. You swipe together a few old shorts and T-shirt from your parents' room to avoid Gloria from ruining her cleanliness with those filth-soaked rags.
1553344113131.title: A shower together with the babysitter

choices: Let the gnoll give you a slobbery good night kiss
Let the gnoll sleep under your bed
Gloria dares you to do both for an extra reward
15533441131312.content:
Gloria was amused how seriously the human took her cleanliness. He'd even dug up some of his parents' clothes for her. She didn't really have the heart to tell him what'd happen to those the moment she returned to the monster world. but if he was to be believed, they wouldn't be missed. She simply shrugged in response, for there were far more important things to discuss. First she guided him back to the living room. Next she excused herself for a minute to check on Dave.

The gnoll opened the basement door and smiled broadly. Nearly the entire room was filled with thick tentacles, coiling and winding around themselves. Amidst the writhing mass was Dave, wrapped up tightly. He could barely breathe in the tight grasp of Tia, the kraken diligently making sure he stayed silent by crushing the air from his lungs every time he tried to speak. Dave's tenacity was remarkable. She'd been repeating this for at least half an hour and still he tried to insult her at every opportunity. But stubborn boys in need of more tentacle hugs were her favorite. Once she'd squeezed the fight out of him she would take her time to swallow him whole. Saliva already flowed down her cheek. The kraken briefly looked up to Gloria and winked. Everything was under control down here. The gnoll nodded and closed the door again.

"Alright, Tia and Dave are having lots of fun together." Your babysitter said gleefully as she entered the living room again. You'd dug up an old plastic bag and put her dirty clothes in it. She smiled at the thoughtful gesture and sat down next to you on the couch.

"Now then, little man. I think it was my turn."

Turn? What did she mean? Suddenly you realize she was still thinking about Truth or Dare. And with your dare in the shower she was indeed up next. A shiver ran down your spine. You could tell she wasn't too happy about being clean. You could only hope she would show mercy. With a massive, smug grin the gnoll leaned close. She'd already squashed you between her fat gut and the bathroom wall during her shower, what more could she have in mind?

"Tell me the truth, boy..." You gulp loudly, further widening her smirk. "Do you think... I'm cute?" You look at her, baffled by the question. Was she really hitting on you or was this part of her game? If you said yes it'd give her reason to smother you with her adoration. But if you said no she'd take umbrage and punish you. You had to choose your words very carefully, since neither her overwhelming love nor her gleeful punishment sounded good to you.

"If I were a gnoll, I'd say you're the cutest thing I've seen." You stammered out, making Gloria sit back a little. She was blushing brightly, flattered by your suggestion. She decided to keep prying.

"Would you... kiss me?"

"I would open my muzzle wide and slobber all over that cute face of yours." You made sure to remind your babysitter this was all some hypothetical scenario in which you were a gnoll, but Gloria didn't care. She leaned back, subtly lowering her arm around your back and pulling you close to her. You bump into her big belly. The smell was surprisingly bearable, a distinct gnoll stink covered up by a bottle's worth of shampoo.

"You know just what to say, little man." She said with a smile as she snuggled up to you. "What else would you do on our first date?"

Date?! You really hoped she was still thinking about your imaginary gnoll man. The mental image of that kiss alone was enough to make you feel a bit queasy. You wouldn't last ten minutes in a gnoll date. With a weary sigh you continue.

"First, I'd take you to swim in the city's sewage plant. Then we go for dinner to the finest restaurants to dive through their dumpsters. Finally I'd take you to the city dump and look at the stars with you whilst sitting atop the biggest mountain of filth we can find." With each line she hugged you a little tighter. Finally she looked down with pity.

"Human girls are lucky to have you. You're a real romantic." You smile awkwardly in return. You just tried to think of the most disgusting things to do on a date, figures the gnoll would be all over it. At least she didn't want to take you out on such a date. Gloria yawns loudly, her foul breath washing over you. Inbetween the games, the shower and your little chat just now bedtime had arrived.

Gloria gently cradles you in her arms and takes you to your bedroom. She tucks you in lovingly and sits on your bedside. A devious glint popped in her eye and she looked down at the little man in his bed.

"One last dare..." She whispered. You rolled your eyes. Of course she'd want to keep playing around. Her competitive spirit wouldn't allow anything else. You feared for the worst, but Gloria's soothing smile calmed you down a little. You wouldn't have expected a literal monster to be so friendly. Granted, she'd squashed you mercilessly in the shower, but by her standards that seemed almost insignificant. You were spared a lot of stinky torment. You kept your cool and managed not to make Dave's mistakes. You almost pitied him, right up to the point where you remember what a gigantic asshole he is.

"I dare you... hmmmm..." Gloria falls short, causing you to raise a curious brow. "I've got two options for a dare and I like them both. I know, I'll let you choose." You gulp a little and nod. "First, I could dare you to let me kiss you goodnight. A gnolly kiss though, if you know what I mean." She licks her chops in anticipation. You shiver at the thought. "Orrrr... I could dare you to let me sleep under your bed." That didn't sound so bad. "Of course, monster rules say that if I see any limbs dangling over the side I get to grab them and drag them and whoever is attached to them under the bed too for some... monstering." Her smile grew a mile wide at the word 'monstering'. What did it even mean? Gloria refused to elaborate and laid out the choice before you. A gnoll kiss or having a monster under your bed preying on you?
15533441131312.title: Gloria smiles mischievously at you

choices: A huge kraken with a bulging belly
Dave struggling in her tentacles
155334411313121.content:
The last thing you wanted was risking getting dragged under the bed by Gloria for her to do who knows what to you. Plus, you had no control over whether your sleeping self slings an arm or a leg over the edge of your bed or not. Furthermore, you had to guess ‘monstering’ meant she’d probably eat you whole, and the last thing you wanted was to spend the night in a gnoll’s belly. You looked back up at Gloria as she grinned toothily down at you, “Um, I’ll go with the goodnight kiss please.” Gloria’s grin grew wider as she clasped her paws together and licked and smacked her huge, rubbery black lips, “Wonderful. Now hold still!”

Gloria bends over and puckers her drool soaked lips as she starts to smooch your forehead, leaving behind an oozing trail of gnoll saliva. She opens her jaws and buckets of drool seep out onto your face, getting in your eyes and even some dripping into your nose. You cough and sputter as her tongue slurps its way across your face. Her hot garbage breath wafts through your nostrils. She licks your cheeks, your nose and even slobbers her tongue across your mouth as she lightly nibbles your cheeks and kisses your nose. By the time she’s done your entire face is soaked with gnoll spit, and some spittle even founds its way onto your pillow, making your pillow dampened and smelling of gnoll saliva.

She playfully waves at you and coos, “Night, night, don’t let the werewolves bite.” She giggled as she exited your room, winking and smiling at you on last time before shutting the door. Once she was gone you grumbled to yourself. You were still shocked that you were just tucked in by a monster, but annoyed that she had to just gross you out before bed. Plus, with her drool and breath still lingering on your pillow you doubted you’d get a peaceful nights sleep tonight. Gloria walked downstairs, happy with how her job had been going so far. Then she remembered Dave and her friend Tia. The gnoll smirked, wondering how they were ‘getting along’. Gloria crept to the basement and opened the door. The hyena monster stepped down the creaky staircase to find…
155334411313121.title: Let the gnoll give you a slobbery good night kiss

choices: You get swallowed whole
You manage to escape somehow
155334411313122.content:
The last thing you wanted was for this gnoll to slobber all over you and stain your blanket and pillow with her nasty drool. You’d rather risk her pulling you under your bed for… ‘monstering’. Plus, your bed was pretty close to the floor, you doubt it would be comfortable down there for you, let alone a large monster woman who’s twice your size. You looked down towards the floor and gestured to her, “Would you mind sleeping under my bed?” Gloria chuckled and winked at you, “Not at all sport.” Gloria laid down on her stomach and started crawling under your bed without any hesitation or issue.

You were about to peer under your bed to see how she managed to squeeze herself under there but you feared she’d grab you and pull you under. You instead decided to yell out to her, “Are you ok down there?” You heard Gloria chime in, “Of course, it’s nice and roomy down here.” You decided not to question it and soon you were fast asleep. After what felt like hours of sleeping, but was really only about forty minutes you awoke to the feeling of something rough and leathery around your leg. Your eyes widen in fear as you look down and see Gloria’s paw tightly clutching your leg.

She shouts in a teasing, sing-song manner, “Gotcha!” You scream as you are forcefully dragged out of your bed and onto your bedroom floor, before you’re pulled under the darkness of your bed. You’re swiftly flipped over as you come face-to-muzzle with your grinning gnoll babysitter. She smirked at you and noisly licked and smacked her chops, her hot drool dripping onto your face and pajamas. You heard a low, bassy growl emit from her belly and your blood ran cold. Gloria giggled, “Time to do what monsters do best.” You nervously chuckled, “Um… letting me go?” Gloria laughed a high-pitched hyena laugh, “No, silly. I’m gonna eat you.” You try to squirm away but one of her heavy paws slams on your chest and pins you down.
155334411313122.title: Let the gnoll sleep under your bed

choices: Plenty of room for two monsters under your bed
She'll hide in your closet instead
She'll have to protect you from Tia and sleep on top of you.
155334411313123.content:
Before you could even think of a response to her dare, the gnoll raised her hand, as if asking permission to speak. "Oooh, oh, I got an idea. Why don't I dare you to do both?" You raise a surprised eyebrow. Were you really going to have to explain the obvious to her?

"Because that's against the rules?"

"So what if I put in a little something extra to sweeten the deal?" Gloria said with a devious smirk.

"What could you possibly offer me to accept both those dares?" You had no idea what the hell she had in mind, but you had to admit you were certainly curious.

"I could give you my phone number. If your little brother is being particularly dickish you've just gotta call and he'll be getting a smelly nighttime visit from yours truly. How's that sound for a reward?" Holy shit, that actually sounded great. The ability to make Dave's life hell, just a phone call away. The little prick usually asked for it, but you somehow always managed to get in trouble with your parents the moment you pushed him away. He even managed to get you grounded a few times pulling this shit. You seriously began to consider the gnoll's challenge.

"Okay, suppose I agree to this, what next?"

"Oh, you know what's coming next." Gloria said with a toothy smile, leaning down. She took hold of your head with two muscular hands, drool trailing from her maw onto your chest. She only needed the slightest confirmation to get started and there was no going back now. Seeing that big maw approaching and smelling the horrid breath washing over you filled you with regret almost immediately. She was coming in for that kiss.

Gloria loved feeling the little guy squirm in her grasp. Not all the showers and shampoo in the world could undo her gnollish breath. A kiss might not be much, but she'd make sure he'd remember this one for the rest of his life. She opened her maw a little and flopped her tongue down onto his neck. Slowly she dragged the soggy muscle up along his face, leaving a thick trail of smelly spittle. In just two more slow licks his entire face had been glazed with gnoll drool. But where other gnolls might consider that a job well done Gloria eagerly went for a few more licks, just to be sure. The boy still wasn't very tasty, unlike the little delicacy that was his brother. The gnoll almost felt bad for tricking him. She could only hope her phone would ring soon so she could spend some time tormenting Dave before gobbling that delectable little brat up.

Slobbering all over your face was just the beginning of this nightmarish kiss. You wanted to cry out for mercy, but you knew the gnoll wouldn't give you any. You also really wanted to avoid any of that slimy saliva from entering your mouth. You hoped those stinky licks were the gnollish equivalent of a kiss, but Gloria was there to show you how wrong you were. Two thick lips pressed themselves on your mouth and she began smooching your face. The look in her eyes made it clear. She wanted in and she would keep on slobbering all over your face until she got the kiss you owed her. There was no other way out of this, but you had one last trick up your sleeve. Her eyes widened in shock as she felt your hand on the back of her head, holding her steady as you opened your mouth and let her in.

The large gnoll tongue plunged in without hesitation, spreading the rotten taste of gnoll spit all over your mouth. It was so horrible you started to convulse in sheer disgust. Gloria didn't seem bothered in the slightest by your twitching and thrashing. She was far too busy plastering the inside of your mouth with her saliva. The large tongue coiled around your own and drove itself deep into your throat, playing freely as you were hanging on for dear life. For a moment you began to feel lightheaded, the gnoll's passionate kiss leaving no air for you to breathe. With a wet pop she finally detached herself from your face. You were on the verge of passing out, your breathing shallow and your heart racing. You clumsily wipe the worst of her kiss from your eyes, looking up to see the world's smuggest grin on your babysitter.

"I pity the human girl that has to top that." She said proudly, looking at the drool-soaked face of her victim. Gloria sat back a little to let you recover. You managed a wry smile, content in the knowledge that this was probably the hard part of her dares. After all, having her lurk under your bed for a night couldn't be all that bad, right? As long as you kept your limbs on board she'd have no reason to drag you under and unleash a 'monstering' on you. And the grand prize of her phone number would make it so worth it. You had to suffer one kiss, Dave would be on the receiving end of so much more and so much worse. You reached for your shirt to wipe of the foul spit, but Gloria gave you a hand, grabbing your shirt for you and roughly rubbing it on your face.

"Alright, part one complete. Now for the real monster magic." Gloria got down on all fours and peered under your bed. She began to crawl underneath, the darkness below your bed playing tricks on your eyes. How else was it possible for this pudgy gnoll to even begin to fit under your bed. She was easily four times fatter than the gap she was now effortlessly slipping into. Suddenly she stopped and pulled back, looking surprised. She poked her head under your bed one more time before speaking up.
