"Tia? What are you doing under there?" A second voice rang out from under your bed. "Oh, I got a bit lonely. This little brat isn't doing much talking anymore." Gloria covered her maw, snickering loudly. "Hah, you gotta see this." She said, beckoning you over. You lean down and look under your bed. Beneath it was a seemingly endless expanse of darkness. In the dark you could vaguely identify the humongous mass of writhing tentacles that was Tia. First the gnoll and now an entire sea monster, all under your bed? And without it even lifting a little? What other monstrous trickery could they perform? The kraken cheerily waved her slimy tendrils and pointed at her body. Amidst the slithering mass her smooth skin turned transparent, revealing your little brother struggling in her stomach. You weren't sure how to react. Dave was a prick, but you were literally watching him digest alive. Gloria saw your concern and tried to soothe you.

"He'll be fine. We can't actually hurt him, just scare him. This is all a bad dream to him, and in a few minutes he'll wake up."

Tia smirked. "Yeah, wake up good and scared. Your little brother is amazing. He just wouldn't stop shouting as I wrapped my arms around him and squeezed his little bones to dust. And his taste... so good. I felt him squirm the entire way down my throat. The best meal I've had in years." Her enthusiasm was unsettling, but it did raise a question. If under your bed was already occupied, what would Gloria do? And would she ever explain what the hell 'monstering' meant? She kept avoiding the latter topic, but on the former one she had a few ideas.
155334411313123.title: Gloria dares you to do both for an extra reward

choices: Eating you of course
I’m gonna coat you in my stink
1553344113131231.content:
Gloria cocked her head to the side, “Say Tia, you think we could both squeeze under there?” The huge kraken smiled, “Of course. There’s more than enough room under hear. Let me just moved my tentacles a bit.” The huge sea monstress moved her body around until there was enough room for the gnoll. Gloria smiled, “See, this is why we’re best friends.” The huge, chubby gnoll easily slide her way under your bed. You were still surprised that someone who would probably have trouble sleeping in a bed meant for a small human could somehow easily fit underneath it, with a sea monster in tow.

You tried to fall asleep but you just couldn’t. Whether it was your nagging curiosity or the ever-present slimy sound of Tia’s tentacles writhing under your bed you couldn’t tell. You cautiously pull off your covers and peer over the side of your bed, “Gloria? Tia? How are you two even fitting under my bed? Let alone comfortably?” Gloria giggled, “Oh, you best stay in bed kid. Move any closer and I could easily grab your little head and pull you down here.” You didn’t like the sound of that so you got back into your resting position, pulling your covers back on and tried to sleep. After a few horrible hours of hearing the two monsters chat, plus those slimy tentacles and the ear-piercing laughs from Gloria, you fell asleep. The last time you looked at the clock it was around 1:12 A.M.

You groggily reawaken, a few hours later, you stare at the clock and see that it’s 4:38 A.M. You lightly feel the need to go to the bathroom, but then you realize something that makes your blood run cold. You gasp as you feel a large, powerful gnoll paw tightly grasping your leg. You hear the feminine giggles of the two monsters under your bed. Gloria blurts out, “Gotcha, small fry!” You are swiftly pulled out of your bed, you slam against your bedroom floor before you’re pulled under your bed. Once underneath the darkness beneath your bed you’re pulled towards a mischeviously grinning Gloria, “Now time for a good monstering!” You whimpered lightly, about to wet your pants, “W-what does that mean?” The gnoll smirks, finally answering your question…
1553344113131231.title: Plenty of room for two monsters under your bed

choices: Gloria bursts out of the closet and chases you
You feel a tentacle wrap around you
1553344113131232.content:
Gloria knelt down and inspected underneath your bed, “Hmm, I don’t know… a kraken could squeeze her way down there but… I don’t know if there’s room left for me.” You started to perk up at this, “Really? So, no more dare?” Gloria chuckled and slapped you on the shoulder with her heavy paw, “Ha, don’t get too excited kid. You ever heard of the monster in the closet?” You gulped and nodded. Without another word the gnoll crept into your closet and shut the door on herself.

You were both confused and scared. What would she do just hiding in your closet? It’s not like you’d intentionally go in there, you knew what was waiting for you in there. Then again, the smug look on her muzzle told you she had some kind of devious plan. You try to forget about it and get comfy, trying to forget that there was a sea monster under your bed and your gnoll babysitter in your closet until…
1553344113131232.title: She'll hide in your closet instead

choices: You wake up in Gloria's arms
You wake up all alone
1553344113131233.content:
"Well this just won't do." Gloria spoke up. You were part curious and part terrified what this crazy monster would think of next.

"I can't have you whisked away by some betentacled horror." She announces grandly. From under your bed you can hear a perturbed. "Hey!" Apparently Tia does not approve. But you were still none the wiser to the gnoll's plan.

"I shall protect you from her." With a slight tremble in your voice you ask the babysitter how she would accomplish this. She looks you in the eye and her smile turns a mile wide. You already know you're not gonna like this, but it doesn't look like there's any stopping this gnoll.

"I will stop any of your limbs from hanging over the edge of your bed." Gloria was a champion at keeping you guessing, though you were not expecting her next move. She took off her shirt and got closer. "Prepare yourself kiddo, I'm coming in." The gnoll struck a T-pose and let herself fall forward. You yelp in surprise as her pudgy form collapses on top of you. In an instant she had you smothered up to your neck, utterly incapable of moving. Her tawny fur brushed against you as you tried your hardest to just breathe beneath her. She wasn't crushing you as heavily as you feared, but the massive weight did make every breath a struggle. By far the worst aspect of this was her head landing right next to yours. She pulled you close, the air slowly filling with foul gnoll breath.

"Gloria... too much... please..." You stammer out. Mercifully she adjusts herself, shifting a lot of her bulk off of you. Instead of her big body, now her arms were wrapped around you to immobilize you. They held you firmly, pinning you against her fuzzy body. It almost felt like spooning, but the gnoll had a different picture in mind.

"There, like a cute little teddy bear. Don't worry human, I won't let you fall prey to Tia's tentacles."

"Awww..." The sulking kraken under your bed replied.

"Oh shush you, you already had the other one to play with. Don't be greedy." The gnoll countered, drawing a tiny giggle from Tia. Your heartbeat quickened as a thin tentacle rose up from under your bed. It glistened with slime and squirmed with anticipation. Did you already leave a limb exposed? No way. Was Tia breaking the monster rules? Fortunately, the kraken had far less sinister plans. She waved the tentacle at you. "Good night, little human. Maybe we'll get to know eachother better another time."

Gloria held her little teddy human close. His smooth skin felt soft and his worried heartbeat was funny. She snuggled up to him tightly, trying her hardest to reassure him. But perhaps it was precisely because a gnoll woman nearly twice his size was hugging him that his heart was racing. She simply murred softly, enjoying the moment, as her eyelids started to grow heavy.

You slowly began to accept that this crazy night was just going to end like this. With you in the arms of your babysitter, who was falling asleep in your bed holding on to you like a human-sized plushie. Also of course the giant mythological sea monster that now somehow managed to fit her enormous body under your bed. The same monster who proudly showed you she'd eaten your brother, but not really? You still had so many questions about Gloria and Tia. In a strange way you hope they'll come babysitting again. For a smelly beast, Gloria was surprisingly gentle. Though you were under no illusions that part of her appeal was the fact you dared her to shower and use up an entire bottle of shampoo. This would be far less pleasant had she still carried her usual stink. You shudder to think of her rotting sewer-like smell seeping into your bed.

As the gnoll's body calmed down and Gloria began to drift off, you too began to feel at ease. In the gnoll's grip there'd be no chance of you accidentally shuffling a limb over the edge of your bed. You're almost surprised she'd not just crawl under your bed anyways. If the darkness under your bed can fit an entire kraken, how hard would it be for a gnoll to fit in too? Maybe this was her plan all along. She was close friends with Tia after all. Your got more and more drowsy as you fall asleep on the soft pillow that is her chest. You blush a little, realizing the gnoll's chest is probably this soft because your head is resting on her boobs. Oh well, when life gives you a gnoll babysitter, use her tits as a pillow, right? With a broad smile you fall asleep.

The next morning...
1553344113131233.title: She'll have to 'protect' you from Tia

choices: She looms over him and unleashes a monstrous fart
She smothers him beneath her big butt
Ding! Surprise wrestling match!
15533441131312331.content:
You wake up to an unfamiliar sound. At first it sounded like that obnoxious neighbour on his loud motorcycle. But when it fell still only to start up again seconds later you began to realize this wasn't the heavy rumble of an engine. You slowly put one and one together and concluded that the source of the noise was still in your bed. You felt the comfortable hold of Gloria on your body. She hadn't moved an inch all night, snuggling you like her big human teddy bear. She did however start snoring like a chainsaw. You catch a glimpse of your alarm clock. Thankfully it was already morning. You couldn't hear anything over the noise. Wasn't she supposed to be gone anyways? Surely your parents were home by now.

Your nose is the next to sound the alarms as you notice the shampoo has lost the war against her natural stink. Already she was smelling a lot more unpleasant and she hadn't even been near any source of filth yet. This was just her default. You began to gently wiggle in her arms, hoping to leave the monster asleep as you went to look for your parents. But she was on the verge of waking up too and within your first few wiggles the snoring was suddenly interrupted.

"Huh... wha... hmmm... oh, hi there. Did you sleep well?" She asked groggily.

"Yeah, you're surprisingly soft." You replied with a smile, making the babysitter giggle a bit. Probably best not to mention the smell for now.

"Heh, with my cuddly protection there'll be no tentacles snatching you out of your bed and into the depths. Oh my, is that the time? We should get some breakfast sorted out." Gloria sat up, placing you beside her on the bed. You were glad to be clear of her smelly body for now, but you immediately worried how much of that sweaty stench had soaked into your bedsheets. With a big yawn the gnoll got up, stretching her back. Her hands easily reached the ceiling, making her giggle for a second. She got down on all fours and peeked under your bed. As she expected the dark depths beneath your bed were empty.

"Heh, Tia's already back home. Speaking of, I should probably hand you back to your parents." You absentmindedly nod and follow her to the living room. In your head you were already working out how to most effectively air out your room. You walk down the stairs to an eerie silence. It seemed like you and the babysitter were the only ones home. It made you wonder something else too.

"Gloria, where's Dave?" You expected him on the couch, swearing at his videogames.

"Last you and I saw him was in Tia's belly. So he's probably shivering in his bed. To be honest, I'm more confused by the lack of your parents. Do you know where they are?"

You shook your head. "No, they're real early birds. Hopefully they're alright."

You both yelped in surprise when the phone rang. Gloria immediately walked to it and picked up.

"Parker residence, this is the babysitter speaking... Oh hello Mr. Parker, how are you... They've been fine. Dave and I had a little trouble seeing eye to eye first but nothing a little perseverance and discipline couldn't fix." You chuckled at the gnoll's idea of discipline. Throwing your little brother to the mercy of a sea monster was definitely a way to instill obedience.

"Yes... Yes... Yes?... Let me think, I should be able to... Alright, I can do that... Not a problem... Have a good time... Goodbye Mr. Parker." She hung up and smiled at your increasingly curious look.

"Your parents had so much fun celebrating their anniversary they've gone and planned a little holiday for the weekend. They just called to ask if I could stay a bit longer, and my agenda is completely empty for this weekend. So now I'm going to watch over and play with you for the next two days! This is going to be so much fun!" She giggled with glee. You froze in place. Another two full days with this smelly beast stinking up the house? Surely you were still asleep and lulled into a stinky nightmare by the gnoll. You pinch yourself to wake up, but nothing happens aside from Gloria raising a curious brow.

"I know right, this must be a dream come true! It's not often I get to babysit someone nice. Now come on, let's get you some breakfast." You tell the gnoll to take it easy. Being fourteen meant you could sort your own breakfast. With a cheeky smirk you offer the gnoll the contents of the trash can in the kitchen for breakfast.

"Aw, you're so kind." She cooed before sitting down in front of the can. She popped the lid off and gasped. "Oh my word, this looks delicious!" You gag a little at the thought alone as she smells the pungent rotting food. Without another moment's pause she digs in with both hands, greedily devouring the trash. Your stomach turns a little as you prepare a sandwich. You both finish your breakfast at about the same time, Gloria contently patting her belly and letting out a big burp. You're glad you're not near it, since you fear it would smell so rotten it could strip paint. At least you didn't have to take out the trash anymore. The foul beast got up from her meal and looked at you. Suddenly a devious smile grew on her face.

"You wanna prank Dave? He doesn't know yet I'm still here." Another opportunity like this wasn't gonna happen soon and you wholly agreed that little brat could use some more misery in his life. You sneak upstairs, Gloria proving to be surprisingly stealthy for a big, pudgy gnoll. You opened the door to Dave's room to find him still sleeping. He seemed peaceful enough, his night with Tia must've really tired him out. A pity he was in for a rude awakening. What did Gloria have in mind?
15533441131312331.title: You wake up in Gloria's arms

choices: She invites some of her monster friends over to meet you two
She wants to play more games with you two
155334411313123311.content:
Gloria stealthily got up onto Dave’s racecar bed, planting a footpaw on either side of him to prevent escape. She bent down and made sure her big furry butt was right up in his face. She moved a paw down to his nose and gently flicked it, stirring him from his sleep. She speaks in her most motherly tone, “Sweetie pie? Honey? Time to wake up for school.” Dave seems to grumble in his sleep before he gets a whiff of a nasty smell. His eyes shot open and he shrieked in terror. Gloria giggled, “Momma’s back-in-action and fully loaded!” She teasingly slapped her butt as Dave before letting out a huge gas blast on him.

The fart was so powerful it made your ears ring. The gas blast filled the room with a thick green fume. It was so thick you could taste the fart. You pulled your shirt over your mouth and nose but it did little good as you kept gagging. Dave got the full-on assault of the fart though and was left to roll around and gag in his bed, coughing and sputtering, “W-why are y-y-you still here?” Gloria giggled, pinching Dave’s cheek as he swatted at her paw, “Your parents extended their trip, so you two are spending all weekend with me.” Dave put his hands over his nose and mouth, “Ew, gross. I’m gonna vomit.” This made Gloria giggle, “So what should we do today?”
155334411313123311.title: She looms over him and unleashes a monstrous fart

choices: Dave was knocked out
Dave begged for mercy
Dave started swearing and shouting
155334411313123312.content:
The gnoll looked down on the puny sleeping human. He just looked so inviting, so... soft. She'd been in this situation before. Her personal mantra of 'the early gnoll eats the best' hadn't let her down let. Just when kids think the long scary night is over she'd strike, dragging them under their beds and gobbling them up. But for Dave, she wanted something a little different. If she ate him first thing in the morning she wouldn't be able to play with him all day. And besides, she just ate already. Thankfully she had plenty of other ideas in store for the sleeping boy.

You stared in awe as she stood beside her bed and turned around to present her massive ass. Seeing it loom over Dave almost made you feel bad. In spite of you not doing anything you felt a little complicit in encouraging the gnoll to do this to your brother. But then you remembered the time he stole your headset and broke it on purpose. Her butt couldn't come down hard enough. Gloria looked over her shoulder at you and with a devilish smile you nod. Time to wake Dave.

The smelly beast raised her butt up high before simply hopping back and sitting down on the bed. With a heavy WHUMP she sank about halfway into the mattress, making little Dave disappear beneath her. Through what could only be described as a miracle the bed didn't collapse completely under her pudgy mass. The wood creaked and groaned, but held on. The only evidence that the gnoll wasn't just sitting on an empty bed were one of Dave's hands and feet poking out from under the flabby cheeks. They trashed wildly, joined later by a soft, muffled screaming echoing out from where his head would roughly be. The babysitter just sighed with relief, feeling her victim squirming beneath her. She looks over her shoulder again to see you standing there with a big grin on your face.

"How's that for babysitting?" She asked with the biggest, goofiest smile as you groan at her shitty pun.

"You know, little Dave here might make you look good, but you barely hesitated when a half-ton gnoll offered to sit on your brother. Maybe the apple doesn't fall that far from the tree after all." You gulp. What did she mean by that? So far she seemed to treat you better because by her own admission good kids taste gross. But if letting her do this made you bad, did that mean you were slowly putting yourself on the menu? Gloria continued. "And daring a poor gnoll to use shampoo... that's cold, man." She wasn't really still upset about that, right? You had to save face somehow, lest this smelly monster might think about sitting on you next or worse, eating you.

"Didn't I also offer you a bin full of our finest garbage?" You counter, hoping your limited understanding of monster logic would save your skin. Gloria begrudgingly nods, salivating a bit at the memory of that meal. Her wide smile soon returned. "Just watch yourself, buster. I can be a bad influence on kids. Speaking of which, before I forget. Here." She pulled a small business card out of her pocket, handing it to you. It had a phone number as well as a bit of text. 'Gloria - professional stench connoisseur - high-impact babysitter - experienced child handler' You look up to her and ask with a smile: "High-impact babysitter?"

Gloria laughs. "I don't know about you, but I think Dave's feeling the impact of my babysitting quite a lot." You chuckle in agreement, whipping out your phone to store the gnoll's number. "You just call me whenever you want Dave's day to be a little more miserable and a lot more smelly."

"Can I call you just to talk?" You asked, hoping to show you didn't want to just use her as a tool to punish Dave. Maybe she'd understand you weren't the bad kid she thought she was turning you into. At first it seemed to work, the gnoll raising a curious brow. She even stopped wiggling her butt and grinding Dave beneath her. But when she responded in a sultry tone you immediately feared you'd given her entirely the wrong idea. "Oh, I can pop out under your bed too if you want. Maybe chat a little, see where the night takes us..." You had a sinking feeling this was going to bite you in the butt almost literally at some point. For now you kept your best smile and looked down at Dave.

The gnoll leans back one last time before getting up, looking down at the flattened boy.
155334411313123312.title: She smothers him beneath her big butt

choices: But first she has to show him her finishing move
Gloria decides what she wants to do with you two today
155334411313123313.content:
Gloria grins and loudly claps her paws together, “Wakey, wakey, Dave. It’s time for some fun.” Your little brother was still incredibly tired from a night spent wiggling inside a monster’s belly. His eyes slightly flutter open as he groans, “Hmmm, I’m tired. Five more minutes mom.” Gloria cackled, “Oh, that’s precious. You think I’m your mom. Come on Dave, get up! It’s a bright, beautiful Saturday morning and we’ve got lots to do. How about a little exercise with your ol’ gnoll babysitter to get the blood flowing.” Now Dave’s eyes shot open as he stared up at the huge gnoll before him, “What!? You’re still here!?” Gloria nodded, “Yep! Now time for some much needed exercise!”

The huge gnoll lunged at Dave, knocking him out of his bed. She easily grabbed the squirming boy and put him in a headlock that conveniently pressed his face against her armpit. Gloria cackled, “Nothing like a whiff of some gnoll pits to wake you up in the morning.” Dave thrashed and wiggled in her arms, of course that did him little good since the gnoll’s forearm was easily twice as thick as Dave’s torso, “Let me go. I give, I give. I’m tapping out. Please let go.” Gloria rolled her eyes, “Geez kid, you didn’t even put up a fight. Then again I am probably fifteen times your weight. Alright I’ll let you go.” Gloria unwrapped her arm around Dave and set him on his bedroom floor.
155334411313123313.title: Ding! Surprise wrestling match!

choices: She is hungry and Dave is looking tasty
Time to clean you both with a tongue bath
She invites more monsters to your home
1553344113131233131.content:
"But if you think you're getting away that easily, you're in for a surprise, mister. You barely let me do anything, so you're going to have to endure the finisher."

Dave protested, but Gloria gave him no opportunity to run. She wrapped her arms around his waist and hoisted him off the floor. His head bounced against her jiggling rack, saved from slipping between them by her shirt. The gnoll steps back to a mostly clear part of the room. You quickly realize what is happening and that you might be in the splash zone for this belly flop. She didn't seem to notice or care until she freed one arm and raised it grandly.

"And now, the Belly Bomb! Best clear the range because this one's coming in heavy." With those words she gave you a big pat on the back. So big that you stumble forward onto the ground. When you look behind you to see what the hell had gotten into her you scream. Towering over you was the gnoll's enormous gut, Dave held tightly against it. Gloria had already jumped up and like a fatty blimp she was hovering over you moments before gravity would bring her down on you. Everything seemed to slow down as your body was buried beneath her big gut. The impact was heavy enough to make the joists in the floor creak, her belly completely smothering you and Dave. Distantly you could hear her voice echo through.

"Now we're even for the shampoo."

She wiggled a little to grind you and Dave into the ground and into eachother before she got up, smiling as the two squashed boys before her crawled onto their feet. Your little brother was coughing loudly from smelling her pits whereas you just felt like a steamroller had run you over. Seeing the two boys on the ground, side by side, Gloria had an idea.

"And here's the encore." She announced proudly as she turned around and presented her ass. Both you and Dave scream as she flattens you up to your necks under her massive bottom. One cheek for each of you, enough mass to make you fear your bones would snap at any moment. You cry out for mercy and thankfully the giddy gnoll only squashes you two for a few seconds. She looked back at the kids, smiling broadly. "Sorry boys, I just couldn't resist. You looked so inviting down there. Let's just say it was part of the finisher." You shudder and groan in pain as a response.

After this surprisingly painful start of the day, what does the gnoll have in mind for you and Dave?
1553344113131233131.title: Dave's not off the hook that easily

choices: Dave was just the appetizer, you’re the main course
Gloria wants to explore your human neighborhood
15533441131312331311.content:
Gloria teasingly smirked as the two boys groaned on the ground, trying to recover from her attacks. Then a loud bassy rumble could be heard from Gloria’s belly, it was rumbling, hungry for more food. The gnoll rubbed it with her paw, with a disappointed look on her muzzle, “Really? Hungry again? I just had breakfast too.” The gnoll caught a whiff of something tasty and delicious, she followed the scent and turned her head to Dave. Her kraken friend may have gotten a taste of Dave last night but now it was her turn. With a devious grin, the gnoll walked up to Dave, she happily chimed, “Heya Dave! Wanna see something cool?”

The boy was not at all happy with his huge, fat, stinky monster babysitter, “What is it you smelly freak?”Without even answering, Gloria hip-checked the boy, sending him back on the ground. The next thing Dave saw was Gloria’s wide, drooling maw, “Not again-“ That was the last thing Dave said before his entire upper body was shoved in the gnoll’s muzzle. Gloria murred in pleasure, enjoying the squirming boys flavor, “Mmm, tastes like chicken!” The hyena monster tilted her head back, sucking in the struggling boy even more.

By now his head was in her tight esophagus, making her furry neck bulge out as all that was left outside was his kicking legs. Gloria slurped up Dave’s leg’s like a pair of noodles before on last GLURK sent a little-brother-sized bulge down her throat. The gnoll let out a bassy belch as your brother plummeted into her belly, turning it from a chubby gut to a full on jiggly dome of a belly. You have to stifle a laugh, it looks like Dave just makes good monster-food! But what is your gnoll babysitter’s next move?
15533441131312331311.title: She is hungry and Dave is looking tasty

choices: She suckles on your head like a human lollipop
She gives you an extra long tongue bath
She devises another punishment for you
15533441131312331312.content:
The fat gnoll was standing proudly over the two teenagers she'd just flattened into submission. Both you and Dave were on the ground, shivering and groaning a little, recovering from her painful butt squash. Your whole body ached and the smell of Gloria's butt sweat had clung to your nose. As you try to sit up and regain your composure, you hear the babysitter mumbling to herself.

"Alright, breakfast's done. They're awake and I got a little morning workout out of them..." Suddenly she looked you both in the eye and spoke up. "I know, it's time for your bath. But none of that horrible human stuff, you're getting a bath the gnollish way. C'mere you." Whilst Dave was still confused you knew better than to just lie there. She'd already exposed you to that foul tongue once before, you were in no rush to meet it again. With your little brother already in her grasp she stumbled after you.

"Hey, hold up. Don't be like this. I'm only gonna wash your face, otherwise this is gonna take all day. If you stop running right now I'll get you a treat." Try as she might, the gnoll couldn't catch up to you whilst carrying Dave around. With a frustrated sigh she gave up the chase and set about resolving this problem.

"Fine, just wait there, I'll get you in a moment. First I'll take care of your brother." You almost pity Dave, listening to the loud, wet slurping echoing down the hallway. She was being very thorough with her tongue bath. Though her delighted murring gave you the suggestion she was only being this meticulous because your little pest of a brother tasted so nice to monsters. Greedily she dragged her big, squishy tongue all over his face, savouring the taste and leaving behind thick layers of gnoll drool. He tried to fight off the slobbery assault, but against Gloria's strength there wasn't much he could achieve. When she was finally done with him, the gnoll set him down in the hallway. One down, one to go. As the slurping noises stopped, you knew she was done with your brother. Desperately, you try to bargain with the smelly beast.

"Can't I just use the shower?" You offer, but she just laughs. "Oh no, not a chance. I need you to be clean, no excuses." Heavy footsteps followed, far faster than you'd ever expect from someone as pudgy as her. Without Dave slowing her down, the gnoll was upon you before you could reach the end of the hall. She grabbed your arm and pulled your horrified face close. The stench of fresh gnoll sweat was horrid, but her breath was even worse. Her short chase had worn her down a little and she was panting loudly right in your face. After a breakfast of the kitchen trash can, you weren't surprised it was this bad, but even then it was almost impressively foul. A burning dumpster would smell heavenly compared to the gnoll's breath.

With you in her grasp, what does the gnoll babysitter do?
15533441131312331312.title: Time to clean you both with a tongue bath

choices: She gets bored after just a few minutes
She watches an episode of something, only an hour long
She watches a movie, staying seated for over two hours
155334411313123313121.content:
Gloria opens her smelly maw wide and leans in, filling your vision with discolored pink flesh and rows of sharp gnoll teeth. The stench of her foul breath became a hundred times worse as she took your whole head into her mouth. Gently she closed her jaws around you, her thick lips shielding you from her sharp teeth. You whimper and wiggle, but you're at her mercy. Gloria starts your punishment with a throaty belch. The nasty, caustic stink burns your nose, but it's just a precursor for the hell she's about to put your through.

The gnoll hoists you off your feet and carries you with her, loudly slurping and suckling on your head. Feeling you wiggle and squirm pathetically in her tight grip was a delight. Especially after you so rudely ran away from her. Now she could give you a tongue bath for the ages. But as her tongue began to slither all around you she thought of an even better punishment. Why not just keep him where he is now? She began to loudly hum to herself, enjoying the sensation of her tongue tormenting you. With each lick it deposited another payload of fetid gnoll spittle on your head until you feared you might drown in it.

With her human lollipop securely in her arms she walked back and picked up Dave. He was still recovering from her savage tongue bath earlier, drool leaking from his twitching body. He wasn't permitted the time to process the horrors he'd endured as Gloria had bigger plans for both of you. With a satisfied smirk she kept you in position with just one strong arm pinning you against her belly and chest. The other meaty hand grabbed Dave and pulled him up. He barely struggled as she carried you both down the stairs. With a heavy grunt she dropped him onto the couch and pointed at him to stay seated. With a horrified expression your little brat of a brother was forced to look at the babysitter treating you like a toy.

"Hmmm, youw wrotheh tashte like craph, but he feelsh nice." She spoke with her maw full. Gloria never even paused her tongue's slobbery assault as she kept laying on the punishment. With every lick you feared you might just break down crying. Either because of the stench or the creepy notion that she was secretly trying to French you. That tongue lapped by your mouth far more than anywhere else.

Gloria slurped and suckled for minutes straight, your body twitching and struggling in all kinds of cute ways for her. Only when she feared the stench might finally knock you out did she release you. A loud, squelching pop signaled the end of your tongue bath as she proudly showed off her handiwork to Dave. You looked ghastly, every part of your head was utterly soaked in thick, pungent saliva. Your hair was matted down and your eyes seemed hollow. The gnoll was quick to pick up on your dead-eyed stare.

"Aw, does the poor widdle human need a moment to recover? Maybe next time you're offered a tongue bath you won't be so rude about it. But it's okay, we can take a break. Let's watch some TV. Human programs are always so funny."

She set you down on the couch. You exchange a horrified look with Dave, who looked practically pristine compared to you. A bit of TV was probably nice after the nightmare she put you both through. But you were celebrating too early. Both you and Dave let out a panicked scream when you see Gloria's wide bottom come crashing down towards you. With a loud THUMP the gnoll fills almost the entire couch with her big butt. The two teens were completely smothered beneath her. A single, massive buttcheek had you pinned, leaving almost no room for you to breathe. You had no way of telling, but you couldn't imagine Dave doing much better right now. both of you wiggled as best you could to unseat the pudgy beast, but Gloria was having none of it. She ground her massive cheeks from side to side, pressing you into the couch even more and drawing a chorus of pained groans from under here.

"Now you boys stay put, you hear me. Or I'm going to have to get real nasty with you." She spoke threateningly. Her belly rumbled as if it had been waiting for this moment. The prospect of being subjected to farts on top of the heavy punishment you were already enduring was enough to scare you motionless. How long does the gnoll remain seated?
155334411313123313121.title: She suckles on your head like a human lollipop

choices: Gloria plays videogames with you and Dave with a gnollish twist
Gloria watches a romantic movie, holding you closely
Dave gets belligerent again, Gloria handles him
1553344113131233131213.content:
Gloria leans back and relaxes as the opening credits of a movie begin to play. It's one of her favorites, an old-fashioned monster flick. She laughs herself silly at all the strange creatures on the screen. How could humans get this stuff so wrong when there were so many monsters out there. When a haggard looking were-bear rips a man to pieces all she can think of is her old ex having a really bad hair day. Her bellowing laughter shakes her whole body, ensuring you didn't miss a single funny moment.

You and Dave were not so cheerful. The immense gnoll butt had you smothered completely, a large buttcheek for each of you. The weight was enormous, but thankfully you could just about manage to breathe. How you hadn't suffocated yet was a mystery, but it wouldn't surprise you if Gloria had some strange trick up her sleeve to make sure the naughty kids she sat on lasted nice and long under her big bottom. She probably loved your faint wriggling as you tried to no avail to find an ounce of comfort underneath her. Intentional or not, she managed to squish you just a little bit more every time she burst out laughing. And though you couldn't tell what the hell she was watching, you could hear her laughing and you could feel her body shaking whenever she did. All you could do was hope it was just a short comedy sketch she was watching.

Two excruciating hours later you were finally given your reprieve as the movie's credits rolled, only to be cut off by more commercials. Gloria turned off the TV and stood up, eager to inspect the teens who've been keeping her company throughout the movie. Your newfound freedom was met with loud, pained groans as you tried to rub some sense back into yourself. Getting compressed under the gnoll's massive but had left you sore all over. Things took a turn for the worse when you looked over at Dave. He wasn't there anymore, just a small dent in the couch where he used to be. Immediately you fear the worst. He'd ended up stuck in her buttcrack, maybe even shoved up the gnoll's butt completely.

Gloria too notices Dave's absence, but she hadn't pulled him in. She scratched her head until the obvious solution hit her. She reached behind her and peeled your younger brother of her asscheek. He'd been smushed so thoroughly he was plastered onto the soft surface. She dropped him back on the couch and loomed over the pair of you.

"That was fun, boys. Maybe one day you'll put some real monsters in your movies. Wouldn't that be something... Can you imagine. Gloria, movie star!"

Both of you were too knackered to do anything more than nod. Even Dave couldn't manage a snarky response.

"Now what shall we do next..." The smelly gnoll ponders aloud.
1553344113131233131213.title: She stays seated on top of you for over two hours

choices: Gloria feels amorous, she wants a kiss
Gloria feels playful, she wants to cuddle
Gloria feels hungry, she orders you to get her something to eat
15533441131312331312132.content:
"First, I'm going to hop back to the monster world and take a shit. I don't think your parents would appreciate me clogging your toilet. You stay here for a few minutes, boys. I'll be right back." Gloria cooed as she walked up the stairs. She didn't have to worry much about either of you getting up to much. Both you and Dave were still worn out from enduring her heavy butt for two hours. You were steadily trying to rub the circulation back into your limbs. Dave did the same, loudly grumbling about the gnoll.

"Who does that damn bitch think she is?! This is such bullshit man! When mom and dad get back they'll have her arrested for abusing us."

"You really think so?" You answer sarcastically. "Mom and dad were the ones that ordered her, remember? I doubt you find a website to order monster babysitters by accident."

"Well, whatever happens, I'm not taking anymore orders from that smelly mutt. I'm packing my things and heading over to Johnny until our parents are back. Fuck spending another minute here getting tortured by her." As much as he was a little shit, your younger brother had a point. At this stage Gloria didn't seem to care that she was hurting you too, in spite of you trying to give her the benefit of the doubt. You didn't respond to him. You weren't sure why you felt the need to keep quiet, but you had a gut feeling all his ranting was about to bite him in the ass.

Dave quickly grabbed a few cans of cola from the fridge and a packet of crisps, throwing it all together in an old shopping bag. He put on his coat and walked to the front door. You tried in vain to talk him out of it. So far the gnoll had been playful, you dread to think what she'd do to him if she got angry.

"I don't give a fuck!" Dave shouted, swinging open the door. He didn't manage to take a single step before colliding with a large, hairy belly. Before him stood Gloria, smiling from ear to ear with a fearsome, toothy grin. Your brother yelped in fear before she threw back her butt and thrust her big gut forward, bumping your brother clean through the hallway. Before he could get back on his feet, a large hand grabbed him by the throat. The gnoll carried her prize back in to the living room and dropped Dave on the floor.

"They always try to run... I love it when my prey tries to run." She growled. Your little brother tried to get up and run but she grabbed him by his coat. He shook it off, but it was too late. Her hand found its way around his neck again and she lifted him off the ground.

"And fighty to boot. I've got a special place for you. Promise you'll keep squirming, okay?" Gloria's savage grin managed to get even wider as she brought Dave close to that big, toothy smirk. She opened her maw wide and let Dave peer down her ravenous gullet. He only offered a last loud "fuck you!" as she slammed him down her throat. For a moment your brother seemed to have gotten stuck halfway down the monster's neck, but with a low growl Gloria persevered, gulping him down whole. She followed it up with a satisfied belch whilst rubbing her big belly. It was barely visible to you, but she could feel Dave pushing against her stomach. With your pesky brother out of the way, the gnoll's attention turned back to you.

"That's a good kid. You wouldn't try to run from me, would you? I had to put your little brother in timeout for today, but now I've got even more time to play with you. And I know just what I'm in the mood for."

"You ate my brother!" You stammered, gobsmacked by her casual tone.


"He deserved it, for trying to run and for saying those horrible things about me." You felt disturbed, but also validated. Your gut feeling had been on point, she had heard everything you two said in her absence.

The gnoll babysitter walked over to the couch and motioned for you to clear out lest she'd sit on you again. As she sat down Dave's dangling legs were pushed up her butt effortlessly. She grabbed you and wrapped you in a warm, if intensely smelly, hug. You squirm for whatever distance you can get from her rancid body odour, but against her strength it's of little use. She switches the television over to a romantic movie and starts to watch it intently.

You're not sure what's worse. The disgustingly cringy movie or the sewer-like stench Gloria was almost certainly soaking your clothes with. You like this shirt, and now you'll probably have to burn it. But given the brutal display you've just seen, being held tightly to her smelly chest seemed like a mild annoyance. As the romantic scenes roll by on the screen you begin to feel more and more awkward. Mostly because you feel the fat gnoll babysitter ruffle your hair, stroke your neck and even once giving the back of your neck a small lick. Finally the lovers on screen start kissing and the movie is over shortly thereafter. But being pressed against her chest you felt the gnoll's heartbeat rising all this time. You fear for what she has in mind next.
15533441131312331312132.title: Movie night with the smelly gnoll

choices: Just an hour, she wakes up hungry
Several hours, she wakes up just in time to put you in bed
She sleeps the day away and doesn't wake until the next morning
155334411313123313121322.content:
Gloria's full attention is on you now. She had you wrapped in a hug and judging by her amorous stare she wasn't planning on letting you go anytime soon. You're not sure what she was doing, just sitting there and looking at you. Was she thinking about eating you too? Or possibly even worse... kissing you? She'd kissed you last night on a dare and it made it pretty clear to you that you didn't want to repeat that for the rest of your life. Now she might be contemplating doing it again without any rewards attached. You squirm a little, but she just absent-mindedly hugs you tighter, making it hard to breathe. Eventually she eases off, but not before mashing your face against her sweat-stained shirt. Were it not for the stench, this would've been adorably cute and comfortable, but right now the only thing you want is to stop this nightmare and get away from her.

The gnoll was barely paying attention to the squirming human in her arms. She was busy daydreaming about the movie. If only you were a little older she wouldn't hesitate to replay every scene with you. Every sloppy kiss, every tender moment. She would carry you to the bedroom and do things to you that would make every human girl on Earth seem inadequate. In her amorous trance she held her human close, squeezing him into her soft, pudgy belly and chest. Finally she snapped out of her daydreams and saw you slowly starting to pass out from her overwhelming hug. She eased off and teased you.

"Aw, gnoll girl leaving you breathless?" Her flirty tone sent a shiver down your spine.

"J... Just a bit" You wheeze out, struggling to breathe mostly because of the smell.

"It's okay, I'll be gentle." Gloria loosened her death grip and rolled back, laying on the couch with you draped on top of her. "So... did that movie give you any... ideas?"

"Yeah, that I'm not the target audience for that stuff... what a snorefest." You reply jokingly. Gloria catches on to your tone, but seems a little disappointed nonetheless. As much as you don't want to upset her, you really don't want her to think you're into getting romantic with her either.

"It's okay, I'm sure my gnollish charms will sway you sooner or later." You gulp. She seems disturbingly motivated to woo you. You remind her of your age, but that just puts a churlish smile on her face. "I'm a patient girl."

"You do also know I'm not a gnoll, right? I appreciate that you're being patient, but I'm not sure I'll ever be into gnoll romance." You say, feeling a little creeped out by now.

"You'd be surprised how little difference there is. But let's not have an argument now. You're far too sweet and soft to argue with." Gloria coos, dragging you a little bit further up along her body. Her soft chest feels incredible, like a fuzzy waterbed. You can feel the soft fur through her shirt and she giggles a little when you try to bounce up and down. Her jiggly body is kinda fun to play with. It still stinks in ways you can barely describe, but since she's not letting you go, you might as well make the best out of a bad situation. The gnoll watches with a smile until she tightens her hug a moment to get your attention.

"You think that's fun, watch this."

The fat beast sits up a little before spinning herself around. She slowly leans forward, her big belly already pinning your feet and steadily covering more of you. Like a blubbery steamroller you feel the gnoll's big body advance, enveloping more of you. That soft chest is looming over your own, pressing down on it gently before completely smothering you. The gnoll stops herself from engulfing your face too, looking down on her pinned human with a big smirk.

"In Soviet Russia, belly bounces on you." She said with a heavy fake accent. You roll your eyes and groan at her shitty joke, but she was being more literal than you imagined. The gnoll rocked her body, making her big belly sway up and down, bouncing on top of you. It felt surreal, like a giant flabby hammer smashing you into the couch before lifting off you again. She only did it a few times, but it was enough to knock the wind out of you, leaving you gasping for breath as she settled her mass back on your body. You gag a little as every deep breath you try to take is suffused with her rancid body odour. In a rare wave of pity the gnoll raises her belly. But her smile tells you this act of kindness has some strings attached.

"Here's a little game for you, human. Crawl out from under my belly as fast as you can. If you're fast enough you can watch some TV or play some games whilst I take a nap. Or... you could stay put and let this big, warm gnoll smother you and take a nap with me."

You shot into action, scrabbling towards Gloria's face in a desperate rush to avoid her smothering you as she was napping. She hadn't fully lifted her belly and the heavy mass made progress difficult. You nearly reached your goal when you felt something grab your ankle. The gnoll put on her biggest devious smirk as she pulled you right back under her and flopped down on you.

"Aw, too slow. Thanks for joining me, human. You're nice and soft too. Now be an angel and keep still down there" The fat gnoll yawns loudly. "Babysitting is so tiring, I'm just gonna..." Her sentence trailed off as the fell asleep.

How long does Gloria's nap last?
155334411313123313121322.title: Gloria feels playful, she wants to cuddle

choices: You and Dave defeat the babysitter together
Gloria barely manages a win
Gloria completely dominates you both
1553344113131233131213223.content:
The sleeping gnoll had you pinned under her weight and no matter what you did, she wouldn't budge. Like it or not, you were stuck under the heavy, sweaty gut. With all other options exhausted you try to push past the horrid stench surrounding you and catch some sleep yourself. You weren't even tired yet, but it was better than laying around unable to move. You listened closely to the gnoll's steady heartbeat. It was that or concentrating on the stench and your poor nose practically begged you to do anything else. You felt her shift a little with each breath she took and eventually you managed to drift off to sleep yourself.

You awoke several times that night as the horrible, sweaty stench of the gnoll got too far up your nose. The odd fart didn't help much either. Even when pinned under her gut the smell somehow managed to reach you. In the bits of sleep you do manage to get you're haunted by the strangest dreams. Most of them make little sense and are forgotten the moment you wake up, but one of them sticks with you.

You were stood inside the living room, but your perspective had changed. You were taller, nearly big enough to hit the ceiling. You looked down to see a massive hairy belly and an impressive pair of tits on you. You raise your clawed hands and yelp with surprise as you realize you're looking around from Gloria's perspective. Right on cue Dave walks in and immediately you feel a hunger emanating from within your large belly. With every second spent looking at that tasty boy you find it harder to restrain yourself. Just as you lunge towards him you wake up. You were still completely pinned, but there was a strange taste in your mouth. Was this what the gnoll tasted when she ate your brother? You're almost surprised she hadn't eaten him sooner, the taste was delicious.

Gloria's big belly had you completely isolated from the world. It was impossible to tell how much time had passed, but your gut feeling told you that you'd been under here for a very long time. When the gnoll finally sat up again your hunch proved correct. The living room clock was nearing eleven in the morning. She'd slept for nearly fourteen hours! You're surprised you didn't die of stink and boredom beneath her. She groggily stared at you, still only half awake. A smile crept up on her face and she peeled you off the couch.

"Good morning. Heh, I see you slept well too." She said, looking at your thousand yard stare. You tried to shake yourself out of it, the realization slowly sinking in that the nightmare was over. With a grunt you move your aching limbs.

"Hope I didn't squash you too much last night, you were just so comfy." Gloria blushed a little, making you feel even more weirded out. She set you down on the couch and stood up, stretching her limbs before giving you a hungry look. You perk up quickly. She'd already made a meal out of Dave, was it your turn now?

"Do you have any more of that delicious garbage for me?" She caught you off-guard with her question, but you were more than happy to point her to the bags waiting for garbage day to roll around. She smelled them and let out an enamored sigh like one would do sniffing a fine perfume. With zeal she tore into the bags, leaving nothing behind as she made them into breakfast. You make a sandwich for yourself and both of you finish you breakfast at the same time. With the putrid stink of garbage on her breath she takes you back to the living room, just in time for Dave to come down the stairs.

"Did you sleep well, Dave?" Gloria cooed.

"Oh shove it." He grumbled. His eyes suddenly bulged out as he realized his mistake and fearfully stared at the growling babysitter.

"Now now, be nice. Tell you what. How about we play some video games?"

Dave reluctantly approaches the smelly beast before stopping in his tracks. He squints and asks: "Hold up, what's the catch?"

"What do you mean?" The gnoll feigned ignorance.

"There's always a catch with you. What, winner eats the loser?" He moped.

"That's a good one, but I was going for the slightly more tame 'winner sits on loser.'" She smiles. Gloria had already proven she had an ass big enough to smother both of you beneath it. Being pressed beneath that sweaty, stinky mass again was not high on your wishlist. But Dave didn't seem intimidated. Judging by his cocky grin he had a plan.

"Fine, but only if we play humans vs. monsters."

"two against one, I'm not sure that's fair..." The gnoll mumbled.

"If you're not up for a challenge..." Your little brother said with a smirk. That got the smelly beast fired up. "Fine! You're on! You okay with Call of Duty?"

"Hah, I'm twelve, Call of Duty is my life." Dave boasted. He wasn't wrong. The number of hours he spent playing it was only eclipsed by how often he screamed at the people he was playing with. Your little brother handed everyone a controller and soon the game was on. Two humans versus a gnoll, who would win?
1553344113131233131213223.title: She sleeps the day away and doesn't wake un...

choices: You take the bet and win
You take the bet and lose
You decline the bet and just relax with Gloria, with Dave remaining under her
15533441131312331312132232.content:
The game was a close one. Both teams were almost even in terms of score. At least, half your team was even. Despite Dave's boasting, it turns out that time spent playing didn't immediately correlate to skill. He had this idea in his head that just sprinting around the map and shooting only when someone got in front of him was a bad idea.

Gloria kept outmaneuvering him at every turn. Every time she shot him in the back or timed her grenade throw perfectly to get him, Dave would leap up with a string of curse words and insults for the knoll babysitter. If this was how he played all the time, then all the screaming you would hear s starting to make sense.

Meanwhile, you were killing Gloria at every opportunity. By the time she even knew where you were, you had already killed her. Unlike Dave, you had actually taken the time to learn the game and play smart. It showed as the game was winding down and you still had no deaths yet.

The score was tied even. Whoever got the next kill wins. You frantically search the map for Gloria before Dave got himself killed again. Then, time seemed to slow down as you heard the sniper shot. DEFEAT. It read one your screen. Dave had died once more, meaning your loss and what was about to happen was on him.

Gloria sighed in relief as she stretched. "Well, that was a close one. Alright you two. You know the bet. Lay down, face up." Dave reluctantly did as he was told, while muttering a string of what you assume to be curse words. He lays down on the couch as instructed.

When you try to join him however, Gloria puts a hand on your shoulder. She shakes her head. "Not you my little love bug. You almost won. You might have too if he didn't drag you down with his little 'two on one' rule." Before Dave could complain, she sat down on his face, muffling him. "Aahhh. That feels nice. I'll tell you what. One more game, one on one, you and me, double or nothing. If I win, you get down under me with your brother, as well as you both agreeing to do whatever I say for the rest of the night, no questions asked. You win, and I'll let him go, you both get to sit on me, and I'll leave you both alone for the rest of the night. You in?"
15533441131312331312132232.title: Gloria barely manages a win

choices: Pucker up, she wants a kiss
She traps your head in her foul armpit
She sends you to the kitchen to cook her a fancy dinner
155334411313123313121322322.content:
You were uncertain about Gloria's proposition. The price for losing was steep. Having to obey her every desire for the rest of the night would be a challenge to say the least. But she did have a point. Were it not for Dave you might well have defeated the babysitter in that match. She got so many easy kills off him that were this a free for all you might've come out number one. And winning now meant you would be spared from her smelly presence for the rest of the night. With a confident smile you nod.

"You're on. One v one, no tricks."

A sly smile crept up on her face. The human was learning fast. She put her hand on her heart and agreed. "Very well, let's see how good you are without your brother."

The match starts and you've barely stepped out of the spawn point before a shot cracks from long range and you're sent right back. First blood to the gnoll, whose sly smirk had turned to a steely gaze. She was concentrating hard, barely having time to enjoy Dave squirming beneath her. Where he would provide distractions by dying to her she now had her full attention on you. Your flanks were met with shotgun blasts to the face and any sniping attempt quickly found you in the same room as a grenade. Your every plan was quickly torn apart as the gnoll always seemed a step ahead. Far too late you realize the trap you've fallen into.

"Are you alright?" The gnoll coos insincerely. "You seem to have lost a bit of your edge. Were you expecting me to go easy on you again? I'm afraid that with such a prize ahead I may actually have to try and win." She quickly supported her argument with a clever sniper shot to the face from out of nowhere.

This was bad. You tried your best to adjust to your opponent, but she always seemed to be a step ahead. You'd feared her using her disgusting breath or burps to distract you, but that was child's play to what she would be allowed to do if you lost. Dave too would be forced to obey her every whim, but that barely mattered to you. In part because he's a little prick that could use some humility in his life, but mostly because it felt like she was going to do all those disgusting things to him anyway. You were far more worried about the special treatment she had in mind for you. Calling you her 'little love bug' sent a shiver down your spine.

As a final humiliation she shot you down to a single point of health and finished you off with a grenade. Not the explosion, but the physical impact of the grenade hitting you in the head was enough to seal the deal. The match ended with the gnoll doubling your score. You look up to the winner and see the single most satisfied and smug grin on her face.

"Looks like you lost, human. You know what that means."

You hang your head in defeat and motion for her to lift that fat ass so you could get under there. "Alright, let's get this over with." You added with a reluctant sigh.

"Haha, you're adorable. Let's skip the sitting and get straight to the good part." Gloria licks her chops as she holds you close to her. You gulp loudly, squirming against her foul-smelling body. What did the slobby beast have in mind for you?
155334411313123313121322322.title: You take the bet and lose

choices: A big goodbye hug
A big goodbye kiss
15533441131312331312132233.content:
The game loads up and Dave quickly sets up a deathmatch between the two of you and the pudgy babysitter. He can barely contain his giggles as he imagines himself finally dominating her in something he's good at. But even in the face of challenging two teens to a game of Call of Duty Gloria remained calm. Did she have a trick up her sleeve? Hopefully she wouldn't cheat. But without resorting to doing something like letting out smelly farts or wrestling Dave into submission you didn't expect the gnoll to stand a chance. It took only a few minutes for her to completely remove those concerns.

No matter what weapon you and Dave used or what angle you tried to flank from, the gnoll was always a step ahead. With razor-sharp reflexes she managed to answer all of your best laid plans with precise rifle fire and a quick game over for you. Dave didn't fare much better, slowly losing his mind as he barely managed to put a scratch in the gnoll before she blew him away. You both managed to whittle away at her enough to get a few kills in, but she singlehandedly wiped the floor with you both on the scoreboard. With every passing minute her lead grew and so did her smile. You played like your life depended on it, desperately trying to avoid the forfeit you'd agreed upon. You didn't want to go underneath that fat ass again. But where you managed to get a little bit more accustomed to her style, Dave got worse and worse. His classic strategy of shouting at the screen was not doing him any favors, especially when Gloria began to pick on him.

"Fuck you, you bitch! You're cheating!"

"You sound a little mad. Here, have a grenade." The gnoll snarkily replied before adding another kill to her tally. "I told you two against one wouldn't be fair. Now be quiet or you get to be my cushion early."

To your surprise your little brother actually listened to the babysitter for once. Focusing again on your own play you manage to avoid her bullets and nearly eke out a kill before she surprises you with a grenade. As the match comes to a close you finally swallow your pride.

"How did you get to be this good at the game?" You ask. Gloria smiles. Even if this was just a trick to distract her, she was so far ahead it wouldn't make a difference. Maybe the little human really was curious. "Well, when you're used to playing with other monsters that have far faster reactions than you humans you just kinda... get good." She responds with an awkward grin. "You should see Tia play some day, she's even better than me and with all her tentacles she can play four characters at the same time." You chuckle at the idea of the kraken holding four controllers with her slimy tendrils. The match ends with the gnoll having won by a landslide. You managed to hold your own decently well near the end, but Dave's strategy of getting angry had predictably not worked.

"Okay boys, you know what this means." Gloria said with a wide smile as she stood up. With a reluctant sigh you threw up your arms and shuffled over to one of the dents her asscheeks had make in the couch's surface. Dave grumbled loudly, but did as the gnoll expected, knowing her punishments for disobedience would probably just be even worse. The gnoll chuckles and tells you to lay on your bellies instead, that way your arms and heads would be spared the weight of her butt. "I still want you to be able to play, sillies. Don't worry, I'll go easy on you next round."

You do as she asks and the pudgy beast sits back down, smothering most of you under her fatty buttcheeks. You wiggled a little to free up your arms. The gnoll's rank body odor was beginning to fade to the background. Whether you were beginning to get accustomed to her or your nose was simply seizing to work you didn't know, but it worried you all the same. 155334411313123313121322332313.content:
Minutes turn to hours but nothing seemed to happen. Whilst your brain gladly turned every gust of air and creak of the house into a potential nightmare scenario, the reality was far more dull. Eventually you were simply too tired, finally closing your eyes and falling asleep. The thought of calling her never crossed your mind. It had been so long you'd forgotten you even had Gloria's number. More than ever before you're convinced that strange weekend was just a fever dream from a particularly bad flu or something. With the last hope for something different to happen shattered life resumes as normal.

In the following years you finally make the big move and leave your parents' house, finding a tidy little apartment for yourself. You spend some time studying in college, where you learn all about industrial design as well as the many varieties in which one can enjoy some weed. You've finished your diploma a few months ago, but the job market is proving a challenge. Thankfully time goes by with ease as you sit in your home, stoned out of your skull most days. With some patience, a job opportunity will surely present itself. Until then, you were occupied with eating record amounts of pizza and staring at the walls.

Your new lifestyle has a profound effect on your surroundings, as your home begins to get increasingly messy. Even after your parents announced they wouldn't visit such a pigsty anymore you felt no motivation to clean it. To the contrary, it only sped up the growing volumes of clutter stacking up in every corner. The tower of empty pizza boxes was already nearing the ceiling, a second one soon starting alongside it. This overall messiness extended to you as well. Your unhealthy diet had added a number of extra pounds, not enough to be considered morbidly obese but enough to give you quite a paunch. Your clothes were greasy and grimy, rarely ever getting changed anymore. No matter how much people told you that you looked awful or reeked of stale sweat, you greeted it all with supreme indifference.

One night you were sitting on the couch, staring with empty eyes at the television. You weren't following whatever vapid reality show was on there, far more enamored by the colors and lights of it all. Your brain was thoroughly infused with weed and you felt pleasant. Nothing much could bother you and you didn't feel like summoning a single ounce of care for anything. But somewhere in the back of your head there was something gnawing at you. An aching boredom and a desire not to be alone. With a broad smirk you grab your phone and begin flitting through the contacts. Many of the names wouldn't do. They'd already made clear they didn't want anything to do with you anymore. But then you came across Gloria. You tried as hard as you could to remember who the hell this girl was, but you only drew blanks. You sit for minutes, staring at your phone.

Whether it was the weed talking or just your own curiosity, you decide to give this strange unknown contact a call. It takes a while, making you fear that whoever this Gloria was, she'd already gotten another number by now. But eventually the monotone beeping is interrupted by a voice.

"Hello?"

The gnoll cackled at your expression and gentle bumped you with her hips, “Don’t worry I’m sure they’ll all fit in your house just fine.”

You retort, “Gloria that’s not what I mean, you can’t just invite a horde of monsters to my house, my parents are gonna kill me and-“ The doorbell rang, Gloria sprang up, “That must be the first slew of them! You had to do something to flush Gloria’s guests out of the house. You run inside and…

You cautiously look under the bed to see it empty, with no little-brother-eating-krakens in sight. You got out of bed, wondering if it was all a dream. You shrug as you look around your room, completely in order. Maybe it was all just a dream? You certainly had no proof of Gloria being real, except… her phone number! You dive into your bed and search for the slip of paper she had given you. You searched and dug around, you even threw off your blanket and pulled your bed sheets of your bed… nothing.

You knew it was too good to be true. It was probably your young mind over-exaggerating things. You groaned, defeated, “I guess monsters aren’t real after all.” You then look down and notice the slip of paper Gloria had given you. You smile ear to ear as your eyes light up. The note read, ‘Here’s for putting up with my stink all night. I know you humans and your puny senses of smell aren’t use to it. Ha ha. Anyways my number is 1-945-SCARE-YOU. Call me anytime Dave is acting up… or if you just wanna talk. You’re a cool kid. Thanks for letting me be your babysitter. Big hugs, Gloria’. You smiled at the note until a gust of wind blew it out of your hand. The note blew under your bed.

You quickly got on your hands and knees to try and retrieve it. As you move your hands around in the darkness under your bed your blood runs cold once your hand lands on something big, fleshy and hair. Your eyes widened and you nervously chuckled, “G-gloria? Is that you?” You get a stern, deep and bassy, “Nope!” Whatever monster was under your bed grabbed you by the hands and pulled you screaming under the bed. Everything was a blur after that. You opened your eyes to a dark night sky. You got up and realized you were in some kind of cemetery in a creepy neighborhood. You noticed Dave on the side of you, also knocked out.

You shake Dave awake and after he curses you out he realizes you two aren’t home anymore. Dave asked, “Were you pulled under the bed too?” You nodded, “How long were we out. It’s night-time again?” You two were unaware that you were not in the human world anymore, but the Land of Monsters. Here, it’s nighttime all of the time, you two just couldn’t tell. You nervously look around, “We have to find a way back home.” You two go up and exited the cemetery, walking around the neighborhood filled with old, dilapidated houses.

Then you noticed someone walking towards you, once they noticed you two they sprinted towards you. The person, or monster in question was a tall and curvy Ogress in a police uniform, “Halt, humans!” You look up at here with fearful eyes, “What’s w-wrong officer?” The Ogress was huge, casting a giant shadow over you two, her thighs were thicker than either of your bodies, she had an hourglass figure and flowing white hair, she also stunk to high heaven, almost as bad as Gloria. She grimaced down at you, “You should know well enough humans aren’t allowed here. Regardless of age, a human caught in the Land of Monsters faces immediate jail time without a monster guardian to accompany them.” You worriedly sputter out, “B-but we didn’t just come here, we were dragged here. The monster under our beds dragged us here.” The Ogress ponders your words and responds…

Soon enough, they were sitting at the dining room table, their arms locked together… although it was a little difficult, considering just how huge the gnoll’s arm was compared to his! That means you gotta do whatever I want!” Her huge teeth were bared as she smiled, and Dave looks around nervously, having not heard this rule before. “Don’t worry. Gloria excitedly shoves open the back door with her hip before dragging you and Dave into the backyard. Her eyes widen at how spacious it is.

"You wanted to stay cooped up inside with all of this room outside? Not a chance. We need to get those puny bodies moving. I know, let's get you some exercise, gnoll style." She rubs her hands together with gleeful anticipation. There wasn't a hint of malice in that big smile, but you were unsettled all the same at the prospect of gnoll exercise. With a slight tremble in your voice you ask her to elaborate.

"Don't worry, it'll be fun. Us gnolls don't really do your usual workouts. We just tend to fight... okay, not really fight, more like wrestling. Just a bit of rough fun between friends to get our bodies going. And well, the results can be seen..." She flexes her arms. In spite of her somewhat pudgy gut and cuddly appearance, it's clear those arms put even the strongest humans to shame. "Whoever taps out or loses consciousness first loses. Real easy, I'm sure you'll love it." She was just exaggerating, right? These monsters just beat eachother up until one of them was knocked out?

Gloria paced back and forth around the garden, trying to picture a space for wrestling. She grabbed a few old pieces of wood from the shed and rammed them into the ground with nothing but her great strength. In spite of her looking all over the little shed, nothing useful could be found for the ropes that might be strong enough to handle Gloria's bulk. You were just going to have to imagine those. Amidst all of this Dave tried to sneak away, but the babysitter didn't miss a beat and hauled him right back to the side of the ring, promising she'd sit on him if he moved another muscle. Dave was uncharacteristically obedient after being faced with Gloria's looming butt. With the work done the gnoll stepped back and looked proudly at her improvised wrestling ring. You figured telling her it was only four pieces of wood sticking out of the lawn might not be the wisest move.

"That'll have to do. The sooner we get started the better. I mean, just look at you two. All skin and bones, not a muscle in sight. Since you're both so weak, I won't bother with one on one. Both of you, get in the ring and show me what you've got!" With a shiver running down your spine you approach the babysitter, Dave following just behind you. Gloria held out a paw and cheekily motioned for you to get a move on.

"Don't worry boys, I'll go easy on you. Just don't hold back and give it your all." You hesitantly nod and charge forward, barging your shoulder into her thigh and trying to use that momentum to sweep her leg and knock her on her ass. It all sounded so good in your head, but in practice your mighty charge didn't cause her leg to move a hair. You grappled and pulled as best you could, but your adversary was simply too big and strong. Dave went at it with about as much spirit as he put into anything else. He grabbed hold of Gloria's other leg and tried to move it, throwing feeble punches and a few half-hearted shoves. It all looked pretty pathetic, but if the gnoll's toothy smile was anything to go by, she appreciated the effort.

"Oof... it's worse than I thought. You two noodles really don't know what you're doing." She almost pitied you, especially knowing what was about to happen. "Oh well, my turn." Your heart sank and you brace yourself for the worst.

“W-water! Water! I need… water!” Her already huge eyes were starting to widen. She leaned against a counter for support as she hunched over, panic starting to overtake her for some reason. She looked like she was on the verge of having a panic attack!

“O-okay!” You quickly nod, before scampering off. You had no idea why she was panicking so much! You expected a monster to be scary and mean, not… frightened! You rushed into the kitchen, going to grab her a glass of water… but the moment she hears you filling the cup in the sink, she waves a hand dismissively.

“N-no! Not THAT water!” She gasped out, letting out a little choking noise as she has to hold back her rising panic. “I need… I n-need… to SWIM!” You pause there, with the glass of water in your hands, dumbfounded. You thought she was just deathly thirsty or something, but… really, she just wanted to swim?

“We could take her to the pool!’ Dave said, actually seeming a little intrigued by this turn of events… and endlessly amused by the woman’s suffering. You consider it for a moment. It was really the only place for her to ‘swim around’ in this neighborhood… just letting her soak in the bathtub probably wasn’t going to do much to calm her down.

There was just one problem. “We can’t take her to the pool!” You insisted, turning to him. “There’s people there! If they see something like… this… they’re gonna freak out!”

“P-p-p-pleeeaaase!” Joyane begged you, a few tears streaming down her face as she seemed like she was on the verge of hyperventilating. You sit there, grinding your teeth in anxiety. You couldn’t expose her to the public… you had no idea how they might react! On the other hand, you DEFINITELY couldn’t just let her suffer like this!

“Alright! C’mon! Quickly, quickly!” You relent, Dave giggling at just how bizarre and messed up this situation was. You pull open the front door and walk out, the massive reptile woman lumbering along behind you, trying to take deep breaths to calm herself down. From the noises she was making, she was really panicked! You felt so bad for her.

You hurried down the sidewalk towards the neighborhood’s swimming pool, which was only a few blocks away. Those blocks felt like they stretched on forever, though, with Dave constantly harassing you along the way. “Were you really going to turn down my suggestion at first?” Dave teased, trying to make you feel bad. “This poor woman’s gasping like a caught fish, and you were just going to let her suffer! Shame on you!”

“Shut up, Dave! YOU’RE the one who freaked her out!” You growled through grit teeth, your anger only making the bratty boy laugh louder. You can only pray that the pool is empty right now… but at this time in the afternoon, you doubt it, even on a weekday. You hold your breath as you finally reach the local pool...
