After walking a few more blocks you round the corner to your local swimming pool. You gulped as your fears became true, it was summer after all, so a lot of people from your neighborhood were still around night swimming. As soon as Joyanne stumbled her way through the gate the multitude of human’s in the pool freaked out and started to run. You even noticed amongst the crowd some of your neighbors and friends from school. They all scrambled towards any other exit in the area. Joyanne didn’t pay much mind though as she nearly tripped into the deep end of the pool. She re-emerged with a toothy smile and a sigh of relief, “Oh, that’s much better.”

One of your friends from school, Mike, a boy one grade behind you ran up and pulled on your arm, “Come on man, run before she eats us.” You shook your head, “I can’t.” Mike shrieked, “Why not?” You shrugged, “She’s my babysitter.” You blushed, embarrassed to admit you were being babysat but this really didn’t register with Mike, “J-just… stay safe then. Try not to get to close to its mouth.” He turned around and belted out of the gates. You groaned, tonight was going to be interesting that’s for sure. Then you heard Dave whine, “Hey fish-lady, can I use you as a pool floaty?” You groaned, “Dave, quit it. She’s a person, not a pool toy.” Dave bickered, “She’s not a person, she’s a monster.”

Joyanne raised her voice, “Enough boys. Shush. You’re making me anxious, and the only way for me to calm down is to eat.” Dave rolled his eyes, “Well, what do you eat then, fatty?” Joyanne smirked, swimming towards the in-ground pool’s edge, “For starters little brats like you.” All of a sudden you heard police sirens and lights flash behind you, “Stop! Police.” You gulp, realizing how bad this night was going to turn out for you three. You turn around and gasp when you see a… monster in a police officer uniform. Two monster police officers, one ogress and one male basilisk stood before you. The basilisk showed his badge, “I’m officer Benjamin Scale and I’m here to arrest Ms. Joyanne for showing herself to humans in a public setting. I’ll need to take you two in for questioning as well.”

Dave complained, “We didn’t do anything wrong.” The ogress raised a brow and grinned, “That’s understood, but we still need to figure out why this monster woman was walking around the human world with no further Monstrous Supervision.” The two monsters hoisted the Bunyip out of the pool and put her in handcuffs, Officer Scale brought Joyanne to the car while the ogress pulled out some kind of locket charm and opened a strange portal with it, “Would you two cuties mind coming with me? Don’t worry about Joyanne, the most she’ll get for this is a fine and some community service hours. We have no previous offenses on her record.” Dave shouted, “Our parents told us never to go anywhere with strangers.”

The ogress rolled her eyes and put her hands on her hips, “Kid, we’re the police, you’re technically breaking the law if you don’t follow police instruction.” Dave stuck out his tongue, “No way. You’re a monster. Plus you smell bad and look ugly. Why don’t you go back to the swamp with Shrek!” This made the ogress officer fume with rage, an angry grin formed on her face, “Wow, how discriminatory. Typical human. I always knew humans were stuck-up and speciesist, but I never knew they started this young. Alright kid, here’s the deal, you’re either going to come with me in piece, or I’m shoving you two up my butt crack and taking you with me. So what’s it gonna be!?”
1553344221.title: The people there panic upon seeing Joyanne!

choices: Gina the Frost Giant
Feya the Fenrir
Chel the Cerberus
How long does this go on?
15533444.content:
Gina - Looks like a normal human teenager, except for her blue skin and snowy white hair. She is a frost giant, capable of growing or shrinking herself to whatever size she pleases. A bit of a tomboy, who likes to rough house and party.

Feya - A gigantic Fenrir, basically a huge talking feral wolf. Despite her intimidating appearance, she is actually quite nice and friendly, but she has her limits on how much crap she'll take from anyone.

Chel - A large anthro Doberman with three heads, otherwise known as a Cerberus. Each head has its own personality, one is cheerful, one grumpy, and one gloomy. They take turns each day on who controls the body.
15533444.title: More!

choices: You both agree to go with her to the party
Just stay home for the night
Dave says something to offend Gina and gets punished for it
155334441.content:
You open the door to see an odd sight indeed. She looked like a normal teenage human female, except her skin was a lightish shade of blue, while her hair was as white as snow and went down to her waist. She wore a black tank top, denim jeans and sandals, and smiled at you when you answered the door.

"What's up, dude? I'm here to watch a couple of kids for the night." Figuring she probably had some kind of weird genetic condition that gave her her strange appearanc, you let her inside.

"Name's Gina, by the way." She says as she enters your home. You tell her your name and that your brother is in the next room. She steps into the living room and sees Dave engrossed in his game.

"How's it going, little man?" Dave turns and bursts out laughing when he sees Gina. "What's wrong with you?" He says "Are you some kind of smurf or something?" You expected her to get offended st his rude comment, but instead she chuckles and says "Good one, kid. So, what did you guys want to do tonight? Hey, I know! There's this party I know of that I was invited to but I had this job tonight. Maybe I can take you guys with me there, if you two promise not to tell your folks when they get back. I guarantee we'll be back before they are. How about it?"
155334441.title: Gina the Frost Giant

choices: Well since you asked, let me show you how big I can get
I promise I’ll show you later, party time is now!
1553344411.content:
You’ve never been too a party before, you would be the coolest kid in school if you went back in on Monday and told everyone you went to a party for older teenagers and college kids. Dave also liked the idea, it would be the perfect place for him to cause mischief. You both nod at Gina’s request and you smile up at her, “We’d love to go.” Gina smiled back at you, “Cool. Cool. Let’s go. The party’s already started.” Dave asks, “Where is the party? Is it far?” Gina giggled, “Don’t worry little man, I’ll get us there.” Gina pulled out a small plastic case, it looked like make-up. She pulled open the lid and pinched some of the grains from the container. She rolled them in her hand and blew them towards you two. The grains expanded into a thick, foggy smoke.

You and Dave both cough as the smoke envelopes you three. As it starts to dissipate, you realize you can hear faint bass-heavy EDM music in the distance, and people talking. Once the smoke is all gone you and Dave look around and realize you’re at the old McWheller Mansion, a huge house on the edge of town, shrouded by a thick patch of forest. It was a huge estate that was abandoned after its owner became obsessed with hunting monsters and was hospitalized for psychiatric examination. All of the mansion’s lights were on and party music was pumping through every room, but what made you gasp in shock was the party attendants. There was not a person like you or Dave in sight, conversing, dancing, drinking and partying in every room were monsters. There were tons of different monsters from folklore, movies and everything in between. You spotted some vampires, werewolves, wendigo, witches, dragons, cat people, snake people, basilisks, the loch ness monster, zombies, wyvern, and everything beyond and in-between.

You had a weird feeling in the pit of your stomach. Part of you was amazed, another part excited to see all these creatures and be invited to their party, as well as a horrifying fear that one of these beasts might turn you into a party snack. You tap Gina on the arm, “G-gina? Is this a party for…?” Gina interjects with a warm smile, “Monsters? Of course, I mean I’m a monster after all. I wasn’t gonna invite you guys to a human party!” Gina giggled as if this wasn’t out of the ordinary, or unexpected. You and your little brother gapped at Gina, “You’re a monster?” She smirked and raised a brow, “Uh, hello kid… blue skin? Not really typical for humans. What’s wrong? Never seen a Frost Giant before?” Dave asked, “If you’re a Frost Giant, why aren’t you really big?” Gina smirks and replies…
1553344411.title: You both agree to go with her to the party

choices: Gina comes by and helps has you mingle with some monster guests
While searching for Dave you bump into a group of monsters
1553344412.content:
You scratch the back of your neck nervously. Usually you would take this opportunity in a heart beat but you worried that if your parents did catch you out after dark they’d hire a babysitter for now on. Plus, you couldn’t imagine the trouble Dave would get into after hours. You chuckled nervously, “Sorry Gina, do you mind if we just stay in tonight. Watch a movie together maybe.” Gina smiled, putting her hands on her hips, “Aw, come on. You kids don’t wanna have fun? Party’s are awesome! You don’t wanna stay cooped up here all night. What fun is that?” Giving her some serious sass Dave sneered, “Um… we have videogames duuuh! Are you stupid or something?”

That got to Gina a bit, she narrowed her eyes at him, “Listen kid, I just wanna show you kids a fun night. Who knows, if you like me enough maybe your parents will hire me again despite the whole… ‘monster’ thing.” You felt really bad now, you grab Gina’s hand and reply, “We’re really sorry Gina, you’re not a monster. You’re just as normal as Dave and I. Maybe we can figure something out?” Gina shot back a puzzled look, “Normal? Kid, I’m a monster. Frost Giant to be exact. I don’t think you understand, I’m literally not human.” Dave snapped, “Monster? Those aren’t real. Next you’re gonna say you eat little kids.” Gina smirked and licked her lips at Dave, “Well… I do actually… specifically annoying one’s that are mean to their sitters.” That shut Dave up really quickly.

You tried to make it up, still feeling a bit sad for bringing down your sitter’s chipper mood, “Hold on, we can still have fun Gina.” The Frost Giant snapped her fingers, “You’re right, we can! That’s fine if you don’t wanna go to the party… but that doesn’t mean I can’t bring the party to you!” She pulled out her phone and called someone, “Hey Darla, mind changing the location of the party? I gotta babysit tonight and… ya’ know, girl’s gotta do what she’s gotta do to pay the bills. But these kids are so starved of fun, I thought I’d show them how we monsters party.” She paused and nodded, “Great. I’ll text you the address.” Gina quickly texted the address and put her phone away, smiling happily at you two, “Alright, let the fun times roll!”

As if on queue, your doorbell rings. Before you could stop Gina she is already prancing to the door and opens it up. This time your jaw drops wide open. Standing on your front lawn was a sea of every possible monster you could imagine and then some. Gina squealed, “Hey everyone, come on in.” It took a few minutes but eventually the swarm of supernatural creatures filtered into your house. Eventually loud dance and electronic music started blaring through your house as multiple monsters both flooded the kitchen with their own cases of alcohol and raided your parent’s liquor cabinet. You and Dave started to get lost in the huge crowd of monsters, almost all of them being at least a foot taller than you two. Wait! Where did Dave go?
1553344412.title: Just stay home for the night

choices: Dave is actually intimidated into behaving
Dave continues to insult Feya, so she makes him her personal chew toy
155334442.content:
You open the door, only to scream and close it again. What you saw is sure to give you nightmares tonight. It was a gigantic wolf with glowing yellow eyes and covered it black fur. The thing must have been bigger than your whole house!

Then, to your surprise and confusion, you hear a chuckling sound coming from outside, and a female voice says "It's alright, kid. I won't bite." You open the door a crack and peek outside. "Wh...wh...who and what are you?" You timidly ask. "Feya is my name, and I'm a fenrir. Basically a giant talking wolf. I know I look scary, but I won't do anything to you...unless you piss me off."

You gulped. Just then, you heard your brother from behind you. "Is that the stupid babysitter or what?" He says, opening the door to see Feya. "Our parents hired a giant dog to watch us?" He says, and Feya growls. "watch it, kid. I'm not a dog, I'm a fenrir. Be nice to me, and I'll be nice to you. But get me mad, and you'll regret it. Understand?"
155334442.title: Feya the Fenrir

choices: Spit you out
Swallow you
1553344422.content:
Despite the giant wolf snarling at him, your little brother pressed on, “Listen, I don’t take no orders from some oversized dog. Why don’t you go pee on a fire hydrant or something?” Feya growled, a grin forming on her muzzle, “Fine! If I’m a stupid dog, than you’re my chew toy!” Dave’s eyes widened in fright,”What!?” CHOMP! Feya eats your brother in one big bite. To her, he was just a little bite-sized snack. Feya moaned happily at your brothers flavor as she noisely licked your protesting brother.

She was going to give your little brother the exclusive tour of her mouth. Her fat, pink tongue that was twice the size of your dad pushed and squished Dave up against the sides of the wolf’s cheeks, “Mmm, what a delicious boy you are. You know what they say in The Land of Monsters… rotten kid, tasty snack.” Feya giggled as she pressed Dave against the roof of her mouth and squashed him under her tongue. Feya giggled, “Wouldn’t it be funny if I started chewing on you?” You could hear your brother, muffled underneath Feya’s thick, black lips shriek, “No!” Feya chuckled, “Fine… I guess I’ll just have to…”
1553344422.title: Dave continues to insult Feya, so she makes him...

choices: Dave meekly nods
Dave is still rude, Feya swallows him
Dave is still rude, Feya punishes him some other way
15533444221.content:
The giant wolf grumbled. As much as she wanted to just be done with it, she couldn't deny how tasty he was. It'd be a shame to swallow him now, unable to taste him for the rest of the evening. She stood tall, easily towering over your house and eyeing your backyard. Carefully the fenrir stepped over your house. All the while she kept dragging Dave from one corner of her maw to the next, frequently brushing him against her big, sharp teeth. His terrified whimpering convinced her that he might have learned his lesson.

You close the front door and dash through the house, Feya's ominous heavy footsteps echoing all around you. You hoped none of those heavy steps would smash through the house, or your parents were going to throw a fit. Did they know they hired an enormous wolf to watch you? Were they in on this or are they none the wiser? Questions for later as you threw open the back door just in time to see Dave again.

With a powerful gust of smelly wolf breath Feya blew Dave to the front of her maw before letting him slide past her thick lips and onto the grass. He was completely drenched in slobber and twitching erratically. As he regained his senses he tried to stand up, but the slippery drool and his dizziness limited him to shakily getting on all fours. With an imperious tone the looming wolf spoke up.

"Now, are you ready to respect your babysitter?"
15533444221.title: "...spit you out"

choices: The cheerful one, who just lets it slide
The grumpy one, who punishes him
The gloomy one, who bursts into tears
155334443.content:
You expected to see a teenage human standing at your front door, but instead you are greeted by an unbelievable sight. Before you is a seven foot tall Doberman standing on its hind legs, but even weirder than that, it had three heads! One smiled at you while another gave you an angry sneer, and the third just looked as though it really didn't want to be there right now.

"Hi!" Said one of the heads "We're here to watch a couple kids for the night." The middle head grunted "You didn't say they were human." The cheerful head looked at the middle and said in a reprimanding tone "Well I didn't know. Besides, what difference does it make?" The left head didn't say anything, it just looked like it was kind of sad, as though it lost its only friend.

While this was going on, you just stared dumbfounded at the strange creature. "Never seen a Cerberus before?" The right head giggled, and you stammered "N..n..no, miss... what's your name?"

"Just call me Chel, sweetie. Aren't you gonna let me in?" You stand aside and allow her in the house. She steps into the living room where Dave is, and when he sees the big three headed dog, you lets out a cry of surprise, before saying "Who let the mutant mutt in the house!?"

Which head is currently in control of Chel's body, and how do they react to this remark?
155334443.title: Chel the Cerberus

choices: She sits on Dave.
She uses Dave as a chew-toy.
She gives him a head start and then "hunts" him.
1553344433.content:
Unlike your brother Dave, you're not so mean (or stupid) as to suddenly insult those you don't know, particularly those who are large, powerful and in possession of very sharp teeth. As it turns out, the cheerful head simply rolls its eyes (apparently willing to let it go) and the grumpy one bares its teeth. The gloomy one bursts into tears, Dave's comment apparently having hurt her. You fear the grumpy head, now staring daggers at Dave, but you find yourself more upset by the gloomy head's reaction.

"Seriously, Dave?" you say with a shake of your head, already reaching for the box of tissues and cautiously approaching the gloomy head, "Here, don't take it personally, he's a jerk to everybody."

Dave smirks at the effect he's having on the new "babysitter" even as you attempt to dry the eyes of the gloomy head. The cheerful head gives you a smile and a nod, evidently grateful for your show of kindness. Even the grumpy one glances to you and seems, if not happy, then at least approving of your actions before returning her glare to Dave. Soon, you have the Chel's gloomy head actually resting on your shoulder as if wanting you to hold her (which you do, somewhat awkwardly as you're not sure of the protocol of this sort of thing).

"That's no reason to put up with it," grumble's Chel's grumpy head.

"I have to agree," says the cheerful head, "that was a very uncalled-for remark. I think we're owed an apology."

"Too bad, Franken-pooch," Dave retorts, actually raising a middle finger, "you're a freak, so accept it."

You swallow hard, unseen by Dave who has turned back to watching T.V. You really don't want to be caught in the crossfire here and attempt to give a placating look to Chel. However, you can see that's futile. He's gone too far. The grumpy head glances at you.

"Sit!" it commands, making you jump.

"Ahem," admonishes the cheerful head before addressing you, "could you step aside, sweetie? It's time to teach your little brother some manners."

"But you can hug me some more afterwards," the gloomy head whispers in your ear, actually licking your cheek and ear with a surprisingly broad tongue.

You know better than to stand in the way and you do sit down as Chel begins to approach your little brother (who isn't even paying attention at this point). The question is, what will she do to him?
1553344433.title: The gloomy one, who bursts into tears

choices: Fay it is!
Keep going
155334444.content:
If you read my old story, Monster Academy or its current reboot, you might be familiar with this next one.

Fay - A very energetic and somewhat oblivious rakasha. Basically an anthro tiger with magical abilities. She's actually quite fond of humans, and love to snuggle and lick them to show her affection. She's quite hyperactive, and enjoys running around on all fours chasing things to burn off her excess energy.
155334444.title: Special Guest Appearance Option

choices: Ferise
Zola
Antoinette
I need MORE!
1553344442.content:
In the midnight hour, babe, more, more, more...

Ferise - A petite, 5'4" Harpy woman who's actually hugely into gaming! She's excited to play some games with you, just to see how humans compare to monsters in terms of skill. She doesn't want to play any boring human games, though! Instead, she's brought along consoles and games straight from The Land of Monsters! Unfortunately, as you can imagine, the video games monsters make tend to be a little... weird. ESPECIALLY their virtual reality consoles!

Zola - The legendary Ninki-Nanka... basically, a gigantic, 20' amber dragoness with a line of fluff along her back! Hailing from the fetid swamps, she smells absolutely atrocious. She's one of those monsters who's entire job is to punish unruly children... which basically makes her the babysitter of your nightmares, especially given her penchant to use her gross nature to deal out these 'punishments'. She is extremely kind towards obedient children, however, often giving them magical gifts.

Antoinette - A feared White Lady, an apparition who's suffered from a terrible tragedy in life. She appears like a normal-ish 7' woman wearing a white dress at first, but it doesn't take long to notice her snowy white skin, ghostly aura, and ability to phase through walls. She's usually extremely quiet and demure, almost fragile in her demeanor. However, if you speak rudely of her long lost family, or any of the tragedies she endured in her life, she's likely to fly into a rage!
1553344442.title: Keep going

choices: Ferise!
Dave!
You!
15533444421.content:
The moment you pull that door open, you’re immediately surprised to find yourself looking your sitter directly in the eyes! Apparently, she’s the exact same height as you, and about as scrawny as you are, although her face makes her look like she’s about 19 or so. Of course, it doesn’t take long for you to notice something orders of magnitude more shocking… her wings!

She boasted MASSIVE, gorgeous wing-like arms, with long talons instead of heads and vibrant orange feathers, just the same color as her hair! In addition, her legs from the knees down were covered in similar feathers, and also boasted talons instead of feet! On a more mundane level, she had dark skin, a petite figure, and she donned a blue hoodie and some jeans.

She smiles at the stunned look on your face! “Ha! It seems my reputation precedes me!” She laughed. “Yup! You’re looking at the highest-ranking esports player in The Land of Monsters!” You realize she doesn’t think you’re stunned because she’s a harpy… she thinks you’re stunned because you’re a fan of hers! You’re too shocked by her appearance to correct her, of course, and she happily let's herself into your foyer while you’re frozen up.

“So, your mother tells me you boys are big into video games?” She said with a sly grin. “Well, you’re in for a wild night! I’d love to play with ya… although I gotta warn you, I’m the best gamer around! I’ll go easy on you, though… heh!” You keep staring at her wings, wondering if she’s wearing some kind of costume. But from the way she moves them… they have to be real! But how!? Didn’t she something about The Land of Monsters?

Of course, it wasn’t long before Dave trotted in just to make this whole situation even more frustrating and confusing then it already was. “What the hell?” He raised a brow. “Who invited the birdbrain?”

“Oh, yes! I almost forgot to introduce myself!” She lifts one of her feathered feet into the air like a flamingo as she does a curt little bow. “I am Ferise! Your mother hired me to babysit you for the night. Don’t worry, I’m not one of those boring sitters. We’re gonna have a TON of fun!” Dave seemed ready to retort rudely, like he always does… but his tune changed when he noticed that bag she was carrying was stuffed with electronics.

“Wait a second...” He paused. “Did you bring some games?”

“Oh, I brought along a TON of games! Even some prototypes that haven’t even been released to the public!” She smiles, opening the bag and showing off all sorts of consoles and titles the two of you have never seen before. Dave’s eyes light up!

“Oooh! I like this sitter already!” He laughed.

***

Later… “Eugh? What is THIS?” The harpy gags, as if disgusted, when she walked into your room and saw the video game you had been playing earlier still open.

“Uuuhhh...” You paused, staring at the screen. “God of War?”

“These graphics are absolutely TERRIBLE! I can hardly even tell what I’m looking at!” You let out a little gasp when Ferise pretty much rips your PS4 from the wall, wires trailing behind it as she tosses it away onto your bed. Before you can complain, though, she plops down another console right where your old one had been sitting! This one, well… it looked amazing! You had never seen anything like it before!

It was solid black, and it almost looked like it was in the shape of a penrose triangle… but surely, that was impossible, right? You were further impressed when she plugged the console in and turned it on, and the whole thing lit up like a lava lamp! “Ladies and gentlemen, I give you… the Trimonster!” She smiled, announcing it just as the word ‘Trimonster’ appeared on the screen. “It’s a super outdated console by monster standards… but way better than anything you humans have!”

You stare at the home screen in awe. It was one of the most beautiful menus you’ve ever seen. You sat down on the couch next to the harpy, as she handed you two, similarly cool-looking controllers. She, on the other hand, was using a controller specifically designed for her monster-like hands. As she showed you how the games menu looked, Dave pointed at the screen. “Hey! What’s that game?” He asked, pointing to the logo for the game currently in the console.

“Oh, that’s Gluttonfest! That’s one of my faves. Here, let me show you what it’s all about!” Ferise smiled. She tapped the icon… and the game INSTANTLY loaded up! You were almost startled when the theme music started playing… and the graphics blew your mind! It looked EXACTLY like real life! The frame rate was impeccable, the models were so unbelievably detailed, the fur physics were incredible… it was hard to distinguish this from the real thing! You both watch, excited, as she clicks on the multiplayer mode.

Eventually, you came across some sort of character select screen, featuring literally thousands of different monsters. “Go ahead! Pick your monster!” Ferise said. You quickly picked a big werewolf woman, admiring its incredible model and textures while Dave chose a huge ogre. Ferise chose a harpy, of course. Now, you didn’t know what this game was about… but when she clicked ‘random map’, and the game loudly announced a map named ‘Birthday Party’, you really started to wonder.

The match begins with an incredible, highly-detailed cutscene of a birthday party, in the backyard of a suburban neighborhood. It seems mundane at first… at least, until you jump a bit, startled, when monsters suddenly come crashing through the fence! It was the ogre, harpy, and werewolf you three had picked! Frightened, the children at the birthday party immediately fleed… and the match began! “You ever played hungry, hungry hippos? Well, this is sort of like that,” Ferise explains as you start to figure out the control. “Whoever gobbles up the most youngsters, wins! Although be careful - the more are in your belly, the slower you move, so you have to strategize.”

Wait, WHAT!? You were immediately horrified at the premise... but Dave just laughs! “Haha! Cool!” He chuckles, moving his ogress around now that he knew the control. He moved over towards a kid who had been trying to hide under a table, and with a click of a button, his ogress reaches under the table and snatches him. In only a second, the ogress dangles the boy above her mouth and drops him in, the boy completely disappearing into her huge stomach. The photorealistic graphics only made the sight all the more horrifying!

“Nice one! Different monsters have different stats and abilities, so try to experiment!” Ferise smiled, before demonstrating, her character flying towards a kid who was trying to hop a fence. The harpy moved MUCH faster, and could fly… but on the other hand, it took her much longer to swallow somebody, and it slowed her down more. You watched them both laugh and get to work, trying to gobble down as many people as possible!

Eventually, you realize you were way in last place! This game was horrifying to you… but you still didn’t want to lose! Hesitantly, you moved the werewolfess you were playing to chase after the fleeing partiers. You noticed that your werewolf was about inbetween the ogre and the harpy in terms of strength and speed. All monsters have the ability to plow through walls and fences while sprinting, which is useful.

Your werewolf has its own special ability - Pounce - which you use to pin a boy who was rushing into the woods! You hesitate, feeling a little nauseous, as your finger hovers over the button to eat him… before finally pressing down. With that, the werewolf’s maw descends on him, and when she stands up, there’s a pair of kicking legs dangling from her jaws - which quickly disappear down into her belly.

Like that, the match continues. There are about two dozen targets in total, and all three of you compete to see who can have the most in their belly by the end of the match. Once they're all gone, the winner is revealed...
15533444421.title: Ferise

choices: The VR Version!
Another game entirely!
155334444211.content:
Dave let's out a frustrated cry when the winner is announced… Ferise! “No fair!” He said, tossing his controller onto the floor. “You've played this game way more than we have, birdbrain!” He crossed his arms as he sat back on the couch, pouting. This childish display would probably piss most sitters off… but Ferise only giggles.

“Well, I TOLD you I’m the best gamer around!” She laughed, playfully punching him in the shoulder.

While they were bickering, though, you were more interested in what was going on onscreen. You thought this whole game had been extremely morbid in premise… so you sighed in relief when the round-ending scene was of the monsters spitting the kids out, unconscious unharmed, and tallying them up. “Wait… so…” You tilt your head, relieved and confused in equal measures. “They didn’t digest them?”

“Oh, no. Of course not. Why would they?” Ferise replied, waving a wing dismissively as if it was a stupid question. “Kids are tasty, but monsters don’t just go around digesting them for no reason. That’d just be cruel!”

The way she talks about them… it almost seems she considers monsters to be real. “Okay, wait. I think… I think we’re going to have to clear something up here,” you nervously reply. “Monsters are… real?”

She laughed out loud, rolling her eyes. “Well, duuuuuuh! There’s a monster standing right in front of you! Are you blind?”

You let out a little grumble as you shake your head. Sure, the harpy might technically be a monster… but really, she was basically just a human with winged arms and feet. The monsters you’ve seen in this game, though… they’d be horrifying to ever actually encounter! “No, I mean like… that werewolf… and that ogre…!” You clarify

“Oh, yeah. Those are definitely real, too. Pretty much every monster you’ve heard of is real” she nods, as if this was all totally normal. “And they’re hungry buggers, too! I once saw an ogress just like that gulp down THREE DOZEN little brat-”

“Wait, so…” You pause. “Monsters can actually swallow people!?”

“Well, yeah,” she shrugs nonchalantly. “I mean, I’m a little… small, but monster standards. So I couldn’t swallow you without shrinking you first. But I can invite a friend over, if you wanna know what it’s like!”

“N-no thank you…” You shudder, shaking your head. She only laughs in response.

“Alright, enough talking! I want a rematch!” Dave loudly and obnoxiously protests. Ferise smiles as she starts a new match, this time choosing the map ‘Summer Camp’. Ferise chose to play as a ghost, Dave chose to play as a demoness, and you chose a dragoness. All the while. though, you’re silently considering what you’ve been told. So… monsters are real, it seems. That was a lot to process. How many people knew about these things? Ferise didn’t seem all that tight-lipped about it, so it couldn’t be much of a secret.

Soon, another match began, and you shuddered as the screen was filled with more photo realistic depictions of beasts of all sorts gulping down youngsters. As you half-heartedly played along with them, you quietly though about how things like this, apparently, happen in real life. Monsters can eat people, after all, or at least according to Ferise. At least they don’t digest them… but still, it can’t be very pleasant to be swallowed whole by a smelly ogre or something!

Before you know it, the match is over again, and the winner is declared once more… Ferise! “Aaauuuggghhh! This game is stupid!” Dave practically screams, throwing his controller violently against a wall. Luckily, it was apparently extremely durable. “I wanna play something I can actually win!”

Ferise blinks, apparently undisturbed by his outburst. “Well, I don’t know about that. But if you want to try something else, there is something we can play.”
155334444211.title: Game Over

choices: Story mode, you’re all monsters again
Free-roam-mode, Ferise is a kid character while you two are monsters
1553344442111.content: Ferise got up and grabbed her bag of videogames. She rummaged through it until she pulled out some headsets, “Tah-dah! There’s a VR option to this game that I’ve been dying to try. Wanna test it out with me boys?” Dave didn’t need to be asked twice as he snatched the headset from Ferise and strapped it onto his head. You took the headset from her claws and thanked her. Once you all had your headsets on and sat back down in front of the television Ferise started to explain, “The cool thing about GluttonFest is you can play on various different modes, the VR option making it even more fun. We just played as monster characters but you can also play as human characters and try to outsmart and escape the monsters. There’s also a story mode and a multiplayer free-roam mode, which is what we just played. Wanna try a different game mode?” You decide on...
1553344442111.title: The VR Version!

choices: Summer Camp
School
155334444212.content: Ferise’s eyes widened as the winner was announced, it was Dave’s ogress who won. Your little brother triumphantly pumped his fist in the air, “Yes! I win.” Ferise grinned down at him, “Wow, you’re not so bad kid.” The harpy happily patted him on the back. Ferise leaned over a bit and asked, “So, how about another go?” You weren’t sure if you were up for it. You didn’t have much of a choice as Dave cheered, “Yeah, let’s do another one so a can whoop you again!” Ferise chuckled as she sifted through the maps, “Alright, let’s see here…” Which map do they pick?
155334444212.title: Dave!

choices: She torments him with her stinky body
You try to convince her to give him a second chance
15533444422.content:
As soon as you opened your front door you were assaulted by the most ungodly smell of your life. It was like pit-sweat, mixed with hot poop, with a dash of toejam. You nearly gag before you hear a voice from overhead, “Hello there, boy.” You look up into the grinning snout of an Amber-colored dragoness, towering over you at nearly twenty-feet in height. You squealed in horror, putting your hands in front of you, “Please, please don’t eat me!” The dragoness chuckled to herself, “Oh, don’t be so afraid kiddo. I won’t eat you… unless you make me angry.” She licked and smacked her large, scaly lips at you, giving you an added wink for good measure. She ducked down to slowly squeeze her huge form into your house, “My name is Zola, I am a dragoness and your babysitter. Technically I’m a Ninki-Nanka, but I’m a close relative to your typical dragon, just a much…PPPRRRBBBTTTT… ah, stinkier one.”

A huge, green cloud of dragon-fart wafted past you. You tried to wave it away with your hands but the stink practically clung to you. Zola chuckled, “You’re gonna have to have a higher tolerance for stink around me little guy. I’ve had quite a few babysitting gigs where the family had to vacate their house for a few months to get it vacuum-cleaned.” Did she just say what you think she said? Your blood ran cold. The dragoness happily stomped her way deeper into your house where she encounters your little brother, “Hey kid, what’s up?” Dave would probably scream in fear at the dragones, if she didn’t stink so bad, he pinched his nose, “Geez, you stink. You ever heard of a bath before?” Zola snorted and raised a brow, “You’re gonna regret that kid!” Zola quickly snatched your little brother in her claws, glaring down at him…
15533444422.title: Zola

choices: Krampus
Keep going
15533444424.content: Krampus - You might have heard about this one around the holidays, the demon that accompanies Saint Nick on his yearly flight around the world and punishes the naughty children, usually whipping them with birch branches. However, there are three little known facts about krampus you probably never knew. Firstly, Krampus is actually female, believe it or not. Second, since she only goes with santa one night a year, the rest of the time she has to take whatever jobs she can get, hence the babysitting thing. And finally, she still punishes bad kids even when she's off duty, not because of any malicious intent, but because she geneuinely cares for children's well being.
15533444424.title: Christmas Came Early This Year

choices: She spanks him and reads off all of his misdeeds
She gives him a time out by sitting on him
155334444241.content:
A brisk gust of wind blows past you as you open the door. You shriek when you see who’s standing at the front door, a towering, goat-like, female demon. She had muscular goat-like legs, thick fur over her whole body, claw-like hands, a pointed tail, a curvy feminine figure, a snout lined with sharp teeth, glowing yellow eyes and two devil-like horns protruding out of her head. Her huge clawed hand descended down on you. You winced in fear, thinking she’d pull your head off, but she simply ruffled your hair, “Ho-ho-ho, merry… well, not Christmas.” The huge demoness giggled as you looked back up at her, “Are you-?” She interrupted, “Krampus? You bet, kid! Old Saint Nick can’t keep me on the payroll all year so a girl’s gotta go out and work the other 364 days. Plus, I love working with kids. A babysitting gig just seemed right.”

You were still stunned looking at the ten-foot demoness, she waved her claws in front of her, “Don’t worry, we’ll get along fine. You’ve been on Santa’s good list for years now. You’re brother on the other hand… well… he’s kind of had a hot-streak of being on the old man’s naughty list. I think I’m gonna have to straighten him out. May I come in?” You moved out of her way as she walked in, her hoof-like feet stomping against the wooden floor. You followed Krampus into your living room, she stood over Dave with her sharp fangs bared, watching him turn around to look at her she roared at him. This made your little brother scream and nearly wet his pants, “Don’t hurt me, please. Eat my brother instead.” You rolled her eyes as Krampus looked down at Dave disappointingly, “David, my name is Krampus. I’m here to set you straight, you’ve been a very naughty boy all year.” Dave spat at her and replied, “How would you know?” Krampus smirked, “Remember how Santa sees you when you’re sleeping?” Dave retorted, “Isn’t that spying?” Krampus growled, “You’re trying my patience David, now it’s time for your punishment. Hopefully you’ll learn from this and be a better boy.” What does she do to punish Dave?
155334444241.title: Krampus

choices: A whimper of "Yes ma'am."
"I'm telling my mom and dad you sadistic bitch!"
1553344442411.content:
Krampus reaches behind her back, and pulls out a stack of paper several pages thick, and a whipping rod made from birch branches. Your brother's arrogant face quickly fades, and is replaced by one of worry and fear. Krampus hands hands you the stack of papers. "Read that out loud, would you please?" You start to read the first page. It stated your brother's full name, and listed his various instances of bad behavior since last Christmas.

Lying to parents on multiple occasions
Always trying to get older brother into trouble
Throwing tantrums
General bratty behavior
Excessive cussing

Those were just a few of his offenses, the entire list must have been at least fifteen pages! "Krampus stared down at Dave with a disapproving look as you read the list, before saying "Now then, I think one lash for each instance of bad behavior is fair enough as punishment, don't you?"

Your brother looked at you with pleading eyes, silently begging you to have mercy. Which you might have considered, if you could remember a single time when the two of you got along. But ever since Dave learned to speak, he had been making your home life a living hell.

You look at Krampus, and nod. "Yeah, I'd say that's fair." Before Dave can react, the next thing he knows is he's laid out across Krampus's lap with his pants pulled down to his knees as his backside is repeatedly whipped by the demon's branches. After several minutes of lashing and your brother crying, Krampus finally sets him on his feet as he rubs his sore bottom. "Now, I hoped you learned your lesson, David. I only did this for your own good."

How does Dave respond?
1553344442411.title: She spanks him and reads off all of his misdeeds

choices: She shrink him to mouse size and put him in a cage
Trun him into a animal
Another punishment
15533444424112.content:
She looked at him with disappointing and said it's seems you didn't learned your lesson look like I have to punish you another way.

What type of punishment did she do?
15533444424112.title: "I'm telling my mom and dad you sadisti...

choices: Apologize
Refuse to apologize
1553344442412.content:
As answer to the demoness, David stick out his tongue at her.
Krampus wasn’t amused at all.
“Very well, David. I see you need a strict hand.” she says, catching him by his t-shirt collar with her left hand, and using her right hand to give him a sound slap on the bottom.
David lets go an exclamation of pain, while you can’t resist giggling.
“You just earned yourself a time out.” Krampus scolds him. Then, the demoness lays him down on the floor and sits on his back.
“Ouch! You are crushing me, goat-head!” he yells.
“But if I'm not even weighing on you, little liar.” she says, looking at him “I’m just making enough pressure to prevent you from getting up. You’re in time out, David.”
“You’re strict.” you tell her “But I think he deserves it.”
She looks at you, saying “I think that too. Of course, if you don’t behave you will be punished too. Old Saint Nick has you on the good list, but this doesn’t mean that you can misbehave and go unpunished. It’s that clear, Richard?”
You nod, a little afraid of her threat.
“Let me getting up, monster!” David yells.
Krampus sighs, saying to him “David, if you don’t behave and stay calm during your time out, I warn you that I have my Ruten with me.”
“Ruten?” he says, not understanding the word.
“A bundle of rods, a cane, a birch. Call whatever you like it.” she explains “I call it Ruten, and I use it to deliver spankings to naughty children. Are you that naughty, David, or will you behave?”
“If you dare spank me, I’ll tell mom and dad!” he exclaims “They will sue you!”
“Sure, kiddo. They will sue a demon the world believes to be a fairy tale.” she says “Go ahead, David, test my patience. I’m not Saint Nick, I don’t have that much of it.”
Maybe seeing that she is right, David decide to shut up.
Looking at you, the sitters then says “And you, Richard? Are you going to stay there looking at me?”
“Umh ...” you say “... are you really going to spank us if we misbehave.”
She nods, replying “Naughty children must be spanked. It’s an ancient tradition. If there are so many brats, nowadays, it’s because parents no longer believe in a good, sound spanking. Corporal punishment it’s always the best thing to do to raise respectful children. Naughty brat must be straightened with a firm hand. On the other hand, I heavily despise child abuse, and there are no reason to be too strict with a normally well behaved child.”
You are not sure you agree with the demoness, but you think that if your parents had spanked David, he would have been grown to be a more respectful boy.
“If you don’t mind, can I see your Ruten?” you ask her.
The sitter nods again, and takes out from the basket she has on her back a big and scary bundle of birches, united by red strings.
“I use this only on real bad children.” she explains, shoving it in the hair “Normally, I prefer time out or a spanking without implements. My favourite type of punishment, the one that I think it’s most effective on many children, it’s laying the bad child over my lap, baring his bottom, and spank him soundly with the bare hand until his buttock it’s bright red.”
You see David shaking at her words, and you giggle.
“You know, Richard, I don’t like that you laugh at your brother.” she scolds you “Apologize to him, or you’ll get a spanking.”
1553344442412.title: David's punishment: Time out

choices: Eat
Refuse to eat
15533444424121.content:
You imagine yourself lying down over the demoness knee, while she spanks you with her strong hand or with the scary Ruten. You turn pale, look at David and say “I’m sorry. Maybe you deserve this, but it’s not a thing to laugh at.”
The demoness smiles, saying “Good boy, Richard. You can wait for me in dining room, if you want. I will stay here a little longer to keep David in time-out, then we will both come there too, and I’ll prepare you a tasty dinner.”
You nod, and you reach the dining room, sitting at the table.
After 15 minutes, you hear Krampus speaking from the other room: “You can now stand up. After dinner, you’ll get your punishment.”
“Punishment?! I was in time out just now!” he hear him yell.
The yelling is followed by the sound of a powerful smack, that you identify as a spank.
“Not rise your voice at me, boy!” the sitter scolds him “Your time out was for disrespecting me, but you will get a spanking for been such a bad boy during the year.”
“It’s not fair!” David says, aloud “You cannot spank me for something I did in the past!”
“Stop complaining, David.” Krampus says, as you see them both appear at the door of the dining room “You’ll get your spanking after dinner. Accept it and you can have it with my hand. Continue complaining and I’ll use the Ruten.”
He sits down in front of you, whispering “Not fair, not fair, not fair ...”
Krampus reaches the cookers, takes a pot out from the kitchen furniture and fill it with water. Then, when the water is warm, she puts two glasses and two other things that you don’t see in it. After little time, she take all out, putting your dinner in front of you.
Both you and David open wide your eyes: she has put in front of both of you a glass of baby food and a plastic baby bottle full of milk.
“We are not babies!” David exclaims.
“Too bad.” the sitter replies “Old Saint Nick always says that this is a healthy dinner, and you’ll have it.”
David, in response, takes the bottle and throw it at the sitter.
Krampus is furious. She takes David by a hear and takes him to a chair, where she sits down. Then, she drags him across her knees.
“I’ve decided that you really need the Ruten.” she scolds, taking down his pants and underpants and taking the dreadful implement in her right hand, while using the left one to keep David firm on her knees pressing on his back.
The demoness mercilessly proceeds to spank David with her weapon, while he kick and squirm. After some lashes, however, he begins to cry and apologize.
“Will you be a good boy now?” she asks, sternly.
David promises that he will behave, and the sitter lets him getting up and taking up his trousers.
She then looks at you, saying “What about you, Richard? You need a trip across my knees too?”
You look at the disgusting baby mush and at the baby bottle, thinking that you’ll never eat it. But then you look at David, still rubbing is behind.
You ...
15533444424121.title: Apologize

choices: Yes. Go to Monsterland.
No. Stay home for now.
155334444241212.content:
You look at your dinner, and in a fit of pride you exclaim “No. I will not eat it. I’m sorry, miss, but I think I need something that fits my age.”
“You are polite and I like it, Richard.” Krampus says “But you will eat the dinner I prepared, or you’ll get a spanking before eating it anyway. The choice is yours.”
You bite your bottom lip, but you decide to stay on your position “I don’t mean to disrespect you, miss, but I refuse to eat it.”
Krampus sighs and approaches you, saying “Very well. It’s a shame to have to spank a polite boy, but you leave me no choice.”
Before you can do anything, she catches you with her strong hands, she sits on the chair and drags you across her knees.
In a blink, your trousers and your underwear are at your ankles, with the demoness that scolds you “You need to learn to obey your elders, Richard. Being polite it’s good, and will save you from getting the Ruten, but it is no enough.”
Immediately after, her hands falls heavily on your bare buttock. It hurts. It hurts terribly. And it’s just her hand. Now you see why Davis is still crying after getting the Ruten. After few slaps, you are already crying yourself.
The spanking goes on for some time (almost a minute, that in your mind seems like an hour) till your bottom is bright red.
The demoness lets you stand up and takes up for you your underwear and your trousers, saying sternly “Will you be a good boy, now?”
You nod, still sobbing.
You and David both sit at the table, and start to eat the baby food. It’s quite humiliating, but you must admit it is tasty indeed. After you have finished the bottle too, Krampus smiles satisfied.
“There. Was it really that difficult? Couldn’t have you done it without a red bottom?” she says.
Wanting to avoid the subject, you ask her “Exists other monster, forgive the word but I don’t know what other word use instead, or are you the only one?”
The sitter smiles, replying “Monster is okay, Richard. We call us that ourselves. And no, I’m not the only one. In Monsterland, the place where I come from, there are a lot of different types of monsters: werewolves, witches, succubi, vampires, shapeshifters, slimes, nagas, centaurs, ogres, nekos, gargoyles, trolls, kitsune, dragons, poltergeists, mermaids, driders, sphinxes, gnolls, bunyips, ahools, frost giants, feral wolves that can talk, three headed anthro dogs, rakashas, harpies, white ladies, goblins. There is even a strange dragon called Ninki-Nanka. And I’m sure I’m forgetting someone.”
“And you?” you asks “There are other of your race?”
She shakes her head, answering “Nope. I’m unique.”
“Can we visit Monsterland?” David asks, suddenly excited.
“Sure. But you must stay next to me all time.” she says, and takes out from the basket on her back two strings that you immediately recognize: they are baby reins, like those that are put on children and are basically a human version of a dog leash.
“What!?” David exclaims “I don’t need them!”
“Believe me, child, you do.” Krampus says, sternly “Monsters are not evil, but the can turn hostile to an unaccompanied human. If you stay next to me, and with these I’m sure you will, nothing can happen to you. With these one, the worst think that can happen to you is getting a spanking from me for misbehaving in public.”
Despite the reins, Davis is still excited to see Monsterland, and you are curious yourself. However, do you really feel ready to there?

info.brief_description: You and your little brother are about to have a very interesting night.
info.description:
(This story is now under new management.)

You and your annoying little brother are left temporarily all alone when your parents go out for their anniversary. I say temporarily because they hired a babysitter who will be arriving at any moment. Despite your protests that you are fourteen years old and don't need a sitter, your parents hired one anyway from a website they found called Super Sitters. You expect tonight to be boring and mundane, but little do you know you are dead wrong.

Rules

1. No gore or excessively graphic content

2. The sitter is always to be female, but make her whatever species of monster you want.

3. Please no toilet stuff

4. Also, please no killing the characters

Any additions that violate these rules will be deleted, I may add more rules as needed. Other than that, enjoy!
